Okay so the doctor didn't 'order' these but I read about a lot of their benefits and love adding them to smoothies etc. The product came fresh and is definitely a good buy- will be ordering again!
Title says it all, a Excellent quality product and Excellent service at a fair price. Product came ahead of time and as expected.
This is the first time I ordered these and they blend right into my smoothies! They seem a good quality and a decent price!

I add these Chia seeds to my Scottish oatmeal. Nutritious and yummy.

Do I have more energy? Yes and I am attributing it to the Chia seeds.

I tried the chia seeds because I was told they are a great source of fiber and have all the omegas in them.I am very pleased with the product and they give me enery. Would highly recommend them to anyone.
I highly recommend the hearty satisfying Chia seeds, for a snack or a meal, packed with protein and fiber - I often add it to waffles and other recipes!
I add this to my morning steel cut oats and its awesome! A little in my smoothie is really good and I also put this in my Banana Bran muffin recipe too !

We use these in smoothies, pancakes, waffles and even our vegan burger patties.  You don't notice them, but they add a great consistency and texture and it also helps as a binding agent in place of eggs.
I'm very happy with this product. It was less expensive here than at my local Whole Foods and having purchased other Navitas items, I can say that it is quickly becoming a favorite brand.
I add a teaspoon to my protein powder for additional nutrition and because they have no flavor the chocolate taste is not affected plus Chia seeds thicken my concoction.

I just love these seeds, got them second time and use them more often. They gel way faster and better than flax seeds and you can substitute these in many dishes (i am vegan and I am allergic to dairy products)... Love the quality of this product!
I really like them, I add them to my smoothies for lunch and it makes them more filling and I like the flavor!
I bought this product not that many months ago and loved it BUT no longer buying this brand because it doubled in price! I bought it for $10 originally. Will buy another brand.

I bought these to put in smoothies and they do not totally grind up in the blender.  I am going to try to grind them by hand before i add to the blender. It all depends on your texture preference.  I do not mind seeds from fruits but these bugged me!
These may last forever at 1T every day in my morning shake since I'm having trouble finding recipes for other ways to use these seeds, but they will keep (in a sealed plastic container).
If you love BBQ Oysters, this is the original west coast BBQ sauce! After 30 years, it's nice to be able to buy this outside of Pt Reyes.
I bought the Wilton Cookies and Cream Brownie Crunch for decorating cake balls, and it was a hit.  I can't wait to try it on top of brownies.  YUM!

As far as I can tell, this is the only organic "ready to feed" formula on the US market (Earth's Best only comes in powder form).  It's about time!!!!  It's CHEAPER on Amazon than from the Similac online store.
I switched from Similac Advanced to Organic when my daughter was 1 month old. She is almost 5 months now, no problems at all! She loves it!
i love the fact that i can get this delieved to my house with no delievy charge.it is so hard to find organic formular

My daughter played this game at school and just loved it. She wanted to have it at home to be able to play with her friends and family. Its a really fun game until you have to eat one of the terrible tasting jellybeans !!!

This was purchased as a game for my thirteen-year-old daughter's Harry Potter themed get-together to celebrate the release of the final movie.  The jelly bean game is loads of hysterical fun, and fit very well with our theme.  :)
This product arrived very fast and perfectly new.  The kids had so much fun playing the game.  It is a birthday party they will never forget!

I bought a few boxes of these as gifts for my Daughter and her family at Easter time. They were the hit of her household, when family and friends came by, they all enjoyed spinning and trying out the flavor beans they won. Awesome fun!!!
Both dogs love these treats and they have healthy components.  The only reason I gave 4 instead of 5 stars is that these are made in China and that worries me.
I've tried several of the different FLAVORS of Folger's - this is the best - the old stand-by!  It makes a good cup of coffee every time.

Folgers is good coffee, we order it regularly. Prefer the mild-medium flavors. Coffee is always fresh tasting, good to the last cup! Even after setting for a time it does not taste bitter. Get many cups of coffee from this size.

I think Folgers is an excellent coffee choice. I have been drinking it ever since I have been drinking coffee, about 30 years. It is good at the beginning of the pot and just as good at the end of the pot.

I use this coffee with my toddy cold press system and it makes a very smooth cup of coffee. I so far have only used Folgers coffee with the system and see no reason to change as the end result is so very good.
I sent this to some friends who helped me out when I had surgery. It came and was beautiful. All of the items were really good and shipping was fast. VERY PLEASED!!!
This ediable image is easy for anyone to use. My man is into bass fishing so this was the perfect cake decor. He LOVED it!

Excellent product. This is the first time my seven year old has had an ice cream cone in three years. When I brought them home, I thought she was going to jump out of her skin! After she had her cone, she asked for more and even upon receiving a "no," she still had the biggest smile on her face.

We have two large dogs whose urine yellows our lawn. We give them the recommended dosage with their dinner and it has significantly stopped the yellowing of the grass. Good call.

Bottom line- buy it.

I have had persistently high cholesterol for years.  Allergic to statins, zetia made me sick--nothing pharma came up with worked for me (I am a workout fiend and half vegetarian).  My total cholesterol was always 220 or higher.  After one month of chia powder, it was at 187.  Nearly miraculous!
I ordered and got seeds.  Called, got a refund and reordered... got seeds.  I'll have to order the sprouted chia seed powder elsewhere. :)
Gave it to my daughter who uses it in recipes but I wanted to use it in smoothies.  It tasted to bad to me.
Ugh, this stuff may be good for me but it's not appealing.  I mixed it in my oatmeal for a while, and it was fine that way (but sticky).  But I didn't notice any obvious effect and I've slacked off.

This is a good miso base. I make true miso soup, by adding nori seaweed, cutup scallions, tofu, etc. I almost didn't buy it, based on the poor review on a similar product, but I'm glad I did. It's tasty!
This is a very good value.  I use it to put in many Asian recipes instead of chicken or vegetable broth.  The result is a more authentic Asian taste to my recipes.

I love this product, very convient serving packages and only needs some ginger and cayenne for healthful benefits. Miso & ginger helps with clogged arteries & good general tonic, Besides being a very yummy cup a soup.

We love Miso Cup soup!  We use it to flavor our ramen. It is much healthier and tastier than the usual salt and MSG! The price on Amazon is great too! Less than half the price we were paying in a local health food store.  Thanks Amazon!
I did not enjoy this soup; I will try a different brand next time.

This coffee is smooth and is not bitter at all. It is wonderfully aromatic and a rich flavor. I personally bought the beans in Jamaica but it was only $12 for 12 ounces, I have seen such inflated prices on the internet for this product and truly it is not worth it.
There is a reason they serve this coffee at the White House.  Its the smoothest, best coffee ever produced.  Low acid, smooth in the mouth, and it has the most intoxicating aroma.  Worth the price.
We heard about this coffee before leaving for Jamaica so we pick up some and have fell in love with it.  The best we have had yet smooth without that bitter after taste so many other coffee have.

I bought this coffee in Jamaica ($15 for 1 lb bag).  While I liked and enjoyed it, I prefer several coffees from my local shops at about the same price.  I think that it may have been worth the $15/lb, but no more.  Certainly not at these prices.

I recently ordered the 16 oz., 3 Pack.  When my FedEx order arrived on December 26, 2008 there were only two 16 oz. bags contained in my order.  I would like my missing 16 oz. bag to be sent to me or at least be refunded 1/3 of my $105 charged price.
I don't get all the hype over this coffee. Not much of a head on it. Doesn't taste that great. What's the big whoop?
I love this stuff!  It tastes like ice cream, just not cold.  Seriously, if you haven't tried this, you have to!!
Great chesse to make snacks with. Melts so easy and has a wonderful flavor. This is the ultimate in american comfort cheese.

Our Wal-Mart use to sell these pork rinds, but they haven't for probably 5 years. I hunted all over the place for them, until I finally found them. My husband loves them, he works so hard, I figured I'd get him something he loves.
I love both orignal and spicy flavored, great any time during day or night.  Fresh and warm a treat that is usually only available cold and with two flavor choices.
Very good if you want to be on a Paleolithic diet. Very tasty when warm. Cooks great.  A great fast snack.

eating my first bag as i type.  awesome.  some puffed up to be light and puffy; others didn't puff up as much and are much more crunchy.  Which i like!  might be the best pork rinds i've had (outside of central america street carts)
These are so much better than the pre-packaged ones.  Not too many calories.  I cook mine for 2 min and 20 seconds in a very small microwave.

Tasty, spicy, and good. Became quite the conversation piece at work. No one have ever  heard of microwave pork rinds before. They tasted them and love them. Only draw back depending on type of microwave as to how they will cook.

I absolutely love these. A friend had found them in a random store down in Oklahoma a long time ago, and I thought they were awesome. But as I don't live in Oklahoma, and can't find these anywhere in the MN area, Amazon having them is awesome. They're low carb and taste pretty great.
We own a small neighborhood bar and the patrons enjoy having the novelty of fresh, hot pork rinds served to them with their beverages.
These are the best pork rinds around, near and far.  They are warm and just melt in your mouth.  This is a dangerous addiction, you've been warned!  ;)
Awesome!!  I love 'em cracklin out of the microwave!!! This snack is also not nearly as bad for you as, chips or other snack!!

Why am I just learning about these? They are delicious.

Enough in each individual bag for 2 people to share.

Low cal, low fat, but not low flavor. Highly recommend.

Will be back for more.

I love these bacon curls or pork rinds as some call them. I was so happy to find them again. Easy, delicious and high protein snack --- I eat them every night watchng tv. Never had a bag that didn't perform well........LOVE THEM!!!!!
My husband loves pork rinds...a little too much!!  The perfect fathers day gift was a case of Lowerys pork rinds!
Outstanding snack, super fast and lives up to the review I saw on the food network.  Just make sure you shake the pkg really good before microwaving.  All in all SUPER!

Can't find this product anywhere except on-line. I guess no-one enjoys them as we do. Same kind of hicks that don't like boiled peanuts I guess. Anyway, product is wonderful and was shipped promptly. Hope to continue buying from this seller.

Really easy to prepare and very yummy. With my microwave I put them in for 1:40 and they turn out perfect. Warm, crunchy and tasty. And without the carbs, they don't impact your blood sugar which is a real boon for us diabetics.

I saw these in a bar in wyoming somewhere.  My buddy loves the hotnspicy pork rinds and when I saw these microwavable ones I had them sent as a joke, however he said they were great and tasted just like the ones in a bag.  Nice

My husband loves these so much he never wants to run out. I've always thought pork rinds are disgusting, but when he 'pops' a bag in the microwave the smell and the sizzling and the warmth and the crunch ... I have to admit they are really good!

Lowrey's Bacon Curls Microwave Pork Rinds, Hot & Spicy,are the best thing since microwave pop corn. especially for diabetics(0 carbs)pop one in the microwave and vanquish that craving for a crunchy snack.
These r great, only problem is easy to burn. Needs close attention while cooking. Follow the directions!! I only needed to cook these for one minute in my microwave.

I was sceptical at first but after I tried the first bag, I was hooked.  Very easy to prepare.  I microwave these for a minute and a half and they come out perfect.  Nice and salty.  Fresher than the ones you get in bags at the store.  The hardest part is waiting for them to cool.

The microwave Pork Rinds are a new product to me, but they are awesome!! buying a carton of them

was a good deal and they have far less fat and carbs than chips

Love the taste! Has a good flavor and very crunchy! Different then your normal pork rinds! Yummy!
I would definately buy again! Great buy also!

Wonderful! Two mins in the microwave and I have a crispy, hot snack to have with salsa and Gucamole. Great for low carbers or those who want to avoid chips. Less than 4 carbs for the entire bag. The non flavored ones are also very good, but I like the spicy kick to these.
A terrible product we follow the intructions and did not get the the pork rinds.  We only got pieces of pork skin

I finally tried these noodles and cooked them in chicken broth and added to my stir fry.  Everyone liked them and commented that it was like eating ramen noodles.  Once I got past the fishy smell rinsing them I was happy with the result.
I discovered you can use ketchup or any other condiment - bbq sauce, mayo, mustard, etc. for a great alternative to french fries.
The convience of micorwave popcorn, 1 carb and lightly salty, well seasoned goodness.  If you never have eaten fresh pork skins, these are a must.
these are so addicting that i have suscribed to them.  cannot get these at the grocery stores around here.  it's a hit for movies, parties, or just even a snack.  give it a try!

I did not find the smell to be anything but inviting.  Warm pork rinds is a concept that was new to me.  I found the taste to be very good.  I had no problems with the cook time and the bag did not collapse on the product.  My only complaint is that there was just too much salt.

I like spicy snacks and this product fills the bill nicely. I will not buy another bag from the store after tasting these. A minute twenty seconds in the microwave and they are done. When my stash gets low I'll be buying more.
This is a great alternative to microwave popcorn. This is a quick and easy snack. It's got a great spicy flavor.
Takes at least three minutes in my Micro, and some are singed while some are still old maids. Good flavor but just a little salty for me. I do not recommend.

Too salty. But that was not even the worst of the problems. It has a weird texture (I cooked it perfectly) and tastes horrible. If you haven't eaten pork rinds before, please stay away. Even the worst popcorn tastes better.

Lowrey's Bacon Curls Microwave Pork Rinds, Hot & Spicy, 1.75-Ounce Packages (Pack of 18).
Pork Rinds are great with beer. Love it!
Calling these "Bacon Curls" is a bit of a stretch, but they are in fact tasty pork rinds. I am fairly certain only bacon can be bacon.

For anyone who likes pork rinds and a decent spicy flavor these are the way to go!
Super easy to cook in the microwave and less cost than buying regular ones.
Great taste! Easy and not bad on carbs and fat as well!
i own a bar and this product, along with the regular rinds, is a very good seller. keeps customer at the bar for snacks plus puts something in their stomach for the liquor.

I got these for my low carb diet. I plan to eat them with tuna salad and/or guacamole. I cooked some last night just to see how it works. They were pretty good plain, but I'm looking forward to trying them with dip.

These are great.  Just like pork rinds out of the bag, but fresh and hot whenever you want them.  Beware they really are hot and spicy but I love the heat.  Make sure to read and follow the directions before microwaving!

Amazon,we'll be back!  My daughter and I just started a very low carb diet and were searching for a snack.  The Lowrey's Micro Pork Rinds really fit the bill.  We both enjoy this snack and our diet loves it too!

I have a G.E. 1,000 watt microwave-i cooked 6 bags before i got it right-if you like them soft and light-puffy-not hard and crunchy-try 2 min 30 secs-no hard pebbles -just light , fluffy, and totally what you want-full power 2 1/2 minutes and you will thank me....
Great taste/flavor, medium spicy, crunchy, easy to prepare! Could be a little less expensive- approx cost is $1.00 per bag. Serving size is good.

I bought several brands of microwave pork rinds and Lowrey's is the best.
They're very quick to heat (pending microwave) and the rinds actually
take shape. Available in original and hot & spicy. Good deal through
Amazon.com
they are easy to prepare, great to eat and so much better hot also add hot sauce for added spice
This product was very easy to prepare and was actually good tasting. Had the guys over for football party they loved them!!!!

way too much sodium.These are great for dieters 'cause they are low carb but the high salt content offsets that somewhat.They taste great and I'll still continue to buy them but cut back on how many times I eat them.

I have not been able to find these in any grocery stores in Montana.  They are a great late afternoon snack with just the right amount of kick!  If you follow the directions on the package, they really do puff up nice!
Very good flavor and easy to prepare.  Compact for storage. Friends said they really enjoyed them and wanted more. I can't find them in local food stores.
My husband has been looking for this product in the store and it is nowhere to be found. He is a happy camper.
Yummy-they are still crackling when you take them from the bag!  Fresh and delicious, high in protein!  Be sure not to overcook them.

My husband & I discovered this item while shopping a while back and fell in love with them.  they are so fresh when you take them out of the microwave.  We like the spices on them.  You just have to remember to take them out of the microwave as soon as the bag rises.

I have tried every kind of pork rinds on the market and Lowrey's microwave pork rinds are the best I've ever had.  I've given friends some to try and they totally agree with me.  The only problem is that they are hard to find.  That's why I ordered a case from Amazon.
I used to get this product at Walmart but in there great wisdom they stopped carrying it. I love this product as it is light, easy on the diet.
was really dissappointed in product... too salty and poor flavor....Convenience is what makes product worth purchasing if you like pork rinds...

My husband and I love these. They taste soo good fresh from the microwave. I was pleased to see these as a pack of 18. I can only find 3 packs at my local grocery store and they are not as economical.

What an awesome snack, super easy to make and doesn't disappoint whatsoever. The flavor is totally there, they come out perfectly hot, crispy, light and stays fresh throughout the week..if you are in the mood for something salty, its the ideal snack!  Love these, they are addictive!

I am so glad we can get these from Amazon! Our family loves these microwave pork rinds and we can no longer get them from local grocery stores. If you like pork rinds you love these fresh popped ones.

This is a snack that is great any time of the day! Just enough to share with a friend! It is an unusual snack that I cannot find anywhere else except amazon.com.
I am so happy that it is available!
How can pork be bad? Truly a technical food marvel. People are stunned and amazed at microwave pork rinds. Delicious!
These are really easy to cook in the microwave and are fresh and warm every time. They are part of my low carb diet and this is a great price.

This is a delicious product. It starts out as little dry hard bits of pork rind, you microwave them for the few minutes it states and poof they turn into light tasty fresh pork rinds. really cool how it does it. love them!!
I normally eat one of these every other day, they are very delicious and better than any of the pork rinds you can buy at the gas stations.  The whole family loves them!
Microwave pork rinds. Hard to find at the store, made easy on Amazon. Fast and delivered to your front door at a better price.
I have recently had gastric bypass surgery and these are a good source of protein that are quick and easy to make.

A great alternative to Carb full popcorn!  Warm and satisfying snack.  Salty and crispy.  Remember to watch carefully in the microwave, the bag does not pop up so its a little trial & error the first time or two.  You'll know when theyre done when you open the bag and everybody looks fluffy.

These are hard to find in the store and my hubby totally loves them. Bought by the case you get them cheaper than else where. Great for those on low carb. diets. Crispy, crunchy, spicy and salty. I cannot complain about this quality product.

This is an excellent product for curbing the appetite without the abundance of carbs.  They are crisp, fresh and great tasting.  Since I started eating these pork rinds, I dropped some unnecessary pounds.
Hot, fresh, salty, delicately crisp, porky deliciousness in a minute and a half.  Can't beat that with a stick!

I received my shipment today, and tried to microwave four bags using different time settings. Only one or two out of each bag microwave correctly. I even put the unpopped on a plate as someone suggested and nothing. I carefully followed directions for each bag. If I could rate this, a zero I would.
This product is the best! They cook up in about a minute and a half, nice and hot and crackling! Plenty of flavor to them! :o)

I saw this product demonstrated on The Food Channel and knew I had to order it as I LOVE pork rinds but the bagged ones are usually old and sort of stale or processed tasting.  Follow CAREFULLY the directions with these for a spicy, fresh and tasty snack every time. YUM!!

I am a big fan of eating microwave popcorn.  A friend of mine suggested pork rines I thought she was crazy.  Little did I know that they are best microwave snack that I have ever eatin in a long time . Now i can chose between microwave popcorn and pork rinds.
we bought these after seeing a show called unwrapped, we have never heard of microwavable pork rinds, we absalutely love them!! and order them regularly.

You have pork rinds auto shipped to your house - but I dont care - having these low carb snacks readily available is great - and doesnt impact my insulin usage. These are not your fathers pork rinds - awesome hot out of the sack

Found this item in the grocery store a few years back and then it seemed to just disappear...found it here and sooooooo happy that I did!  Everyone that tried it loves it too!  Good thing it comes in the big pack!!!!

What a thrill to receive in their stockings - no kidding. I can't see it myself, but the rest of the family is utterly wild about these little things. Just like a mini-trip to the State Fair, warm and crackling from the microwave.

Bought these for my brother and he loves them.

Hot out of the microwave and some beers.

I tried these and wanted to like them, but just couldn't.  They did not seem to "pop" very well (a lot of wasted product in the bag) and they didn't taste very good.  I will not be buying these again.

If you like pork rinds these are the best...... I buy these for the bar that I own and they are a favorite with the customers. So simple, pop them in the microwave for 2 minutes and you have fresh hot pork rinds. I have these on scheduled delivery so I will never run out, nice option. Great snack.
Yuck, these do not taste good and they are quite tough. Better off buying the bags of rinds already prepaired.
These are wonderful and they are approvesd snacks for the weight loss program I am on.
These are very tasty - easy to fix.  A great snack for diabetics.  No carbs!
Quick and easy snack.  Consistently tasty and good quality.  They do, however, require different cook times in different microwaves. Actually healthier than potato chips.
Great product and good price. Husband loves the taste and they are very flavorful when warm.
These rinds are so good! If you eat one, you may want to keep on buying them! Great price for a cased product!
love it, i always try to tell my friends so they can buy them too

These are the best I've had! The flavor is amazing and they crisp right up in no time. I've tried other brands before and they just don't cut it. I will be buying a lot more of these. I wish walmart still carried them.

We love these and will order again soon!  All of our friends that we shared with had to have a bag or two so are almost out.

If you like pork rinds... You'll LOVE these!  I got them while doing "thrive" and they were so good. I've introduced them to several others and now there is about 7 of my co-workers that love them too! Try them you WILL love them!

we used to buy these at an area store and then suddenly they didn't carry them anymore.  THIS is the way to eat pork rinds...just the right amount and way better than a bag from the grocery store.  and even with the shipping and handling, the price is better.  enjoy!
Couldn't find these in the local stores anymore so I was glad to find them at Amazon  This is a great tasting low fat snack

I found these Pork Rinds several years ago and just love them. I didn't believe at first that they would really pop in the microwave but they do, just like pop corn. They are so great because you get to eat them warm instead of just out of the bag ! !

Wow. It's amazing how so simple a snack can be so tasty. I wanted something crunchy that wasn't a carb. You might want to eat only bland veggies the rest of the day because it is high in fat and sodium. But a great guilty pleasure nonetheless.

A delicious product, can't seem to find it in the stores these days. I recommend to try if you like pork rinds.
Quick Delivery and great to have for guests.
IF YOUR A PORK RIND LOVER THIS IS AN AWESOME PRODUCT FOR THOSE WONDERFUL TASTE BUDS. THEY MELT IN YOUR MOUTH BEFORE THEY GO DOWN. MMM MMM GOOD.

It cooks in microwave so fast, and it's really good right after you cook, but unfortunately it has MSG in it. Nonetheless, the fat and sodium content on this is not too bad when compared to regular pork rinds. I uploaded a photo of the nutrition facts so you can see the ingredients too.
I can't find these in the local store so I order them.  They have much better flavor than the already prepared kind.  Microwave like popcorn.  Low carb.  Be sure to shake the package like it says.
I love these both kinds once you try them you won't be able to eat the prepackaged ones ever again. They are crispy spicy and fresh

I've been eating these (regular and spicy) for several years.  They are definitely superior to the non-microwave kind.  Shake the bag as directed to make sure they are not stacked on each other and I put them on the popcorn setting in my microwave.  Soooo good.
We originally found these at Wally World.  When we could no longer get there, I hit the internet.  Both are quite good . . . we prefer the spicy.
I'm so glad these are finally available again.  My boyfriend loves these!!  I try to buy them every month for him.

the next best thing to fresh!

if youve never had fresh pork rinds, this is something youve got to try!
These pork rinds are the bomb!  They're excellent coming out of the microwave.  Yum!
I like the texture to these pork rinds more than any others.  There's something special about have these hot and fresh cooked.  Try dipping them in nacho cheese with jalapeno slices.
my husband loves these! right now we are currently stationed overseas and it just brings back a little of home to him. amazon has been the only place that i can find that sell these.
The Ortega microwave port rinds pop up like popcorn and they taste fresh and has excellent flavor.  The shipment arrived in great shape and was shipped promptly.
This is a very tasty snack although a little too salty, otherwise I love them.

If you enjoy pork rinds like I do, you can't miss this product.  A minute and a half in the microwave, and you've got warm, crunchy deliciousness.  There's just the right amount of spice, too.  This is a great product.
NO CARBS  This is my favorite snack -  very light and crunchy.  Not as dry as the packaged pork rinds.  I love these -  Been getting these for 6 years and still order them every 2-3 months.
I love these things, warm pork rinds that tast fresh and the size of the bag is just the right size
A friend of mine sent me some of theese, and I thought it sounded kinda gross. But found they were quite good for a snack, but the only place I've found them on the west coast is online
If you like pork rinds you're going to love these. They come out of the microwave so warm, light and crispy. Great snack if you're on low carbs.
Lowrey's chicaronnes are probably the best pork rinds available in the USA, always fresh after proper time in the micro-wave.
I wouldn't have these every day but I found them to have plenty of flavour and kind of fun to cook.
At first, I thought the product was a joke, but not so, delicious and fresh!!! Try them.

I tried both the Original and the Hot and Spicy, both are marvelous.  Only problem I have is that both are a little on the Salty side.  2 Minutes in the Microwave and you have cracklin pork rinds.  I can no longer find any in my local super market, this is a wonderful substitution.

i can no longer find these in our local stores.my whole family loves these.my kids love to hear them "pop".the taste is very good.we prefer these over popcorn.very happy to find these.I will buy more!!
Not thrilled with this one - threw most of it away.  For some reason, the result ended up being "gummy" which isn't something I expected from this type of product.
Someone at work cooked these and the smell is now making everyone sick. Smells kinda like puke. Hopefully the smell does not last overnight. Not recommended.
Terrible. Half of the rinds don't cook and the ones that do are gummy and shrink. Contacted Lowrey's about the defective product but they failed to respond.

I had trouble finding just the right amount of time to microwave Lowrey's Bacon Curls Microwave Pork Rinds and now that I have they're okay, but I doubt I will buy them again...I ruined quite a few in the process.
I expected better. Flavor is o.k. But half of the rinds do not puff up no matter what the timing in the microwave.

MY wife is definitely not a chocohalic and is not fond of most sweets. In fact Werther's is the only candy she really likes. So instead of chocolates or flowers I bought this monster box of Werther's for Valentines day. It was a big hit.
Werthers is the best candy I ever tasted. I have become addicted to it. It is the only candy I eat!!!

Yummy,
This is a candy I have enjoyed since I was a child. It reminds me of sitting on the front porch in the swing with my grandmother. When I pop one of these little pieces of heaven into my mouth it brings back great memories of the days gone by.
We appreciate the availability of this coffee from you.  I order and it arrives quickly. I'm getting ready to place another order now! My Dept loves it!
This chili is filling and mildly spicy. Cooks well, however it makes exploding noises in my microwave.

Keep box of saltines nearby and nuke this stuff and it's about the best lunch out of a microwave that I have ever had in my 45 years of working.
Nice and thick, no weird burnt spices, mystery meat, but they all have that.
I will buy this again.

One of the disappointments with Campbell's Chunky Chili is that the "meat" is chewy and doesn't really taste like meat. Overall, the chili is acceptable as a quick lunch alternative but don't expect anything resembling homemade chili.

Campbell's makes some great soups,but their chili on the other hand,leaves alot to be desired,it's tastes okay,just not up to snuff,I prefer Hormel(w/ or w/out beans) or even better HOMEADE!!!(and I make a mean chili,no compalints yet!!!)

I think this chunky chili is the worst store-bought chili. The meat has the texture of artificial soybean meat and is chewy, the
sauce is too sweet and cloy. This has no character.

I prefer Hormel or Dennisons to this. By far.
I had never tried these before and wanted something different. These turned out to be really good, I even made some Chili cheese fries that were really good. Will definitely buy again.
5 stars on taste. Beef tastes like it was grilled before it was added to the chili. The only thing that concerns me is the 11 grams of sugar. That can't be good for you.
This Chile was surprising good and not overly salty or processed tasting.  Actually a good, light and tasty lunch!

Taste is not bad and there is plenty of beans and beef.
Too much sodium. If you have high blood pressure, this product is a no, no.

Works great,I use it for years. Do not use it everyday though,because it is strong.

and they're soooo hard to find. damn you amazon for providing me a place to order them at WILL!

my new diet shot to hell

Compared to a health food store, this Amazon price is far a better value.

If you buy these, I suggest that you keep them in the sealed jar. I had put some in an open snack dish and they absorbed this awful humidity and lost their crunchiness.

Otherwise love these as a snack.
Love the product - don't know why it's not on the shelf at Sam's anymore.  Fast shipment.
It's a low fat alternative to all the high calorie[no good for you]snacks that are on the market and in addition it's taste is very satisfying.To say anymore would be gilding a lily

guess what? the shoprite brand braided twists honey wheat pretzels are the exact same thing! They must use Utz as a supplier for them.  There is NO DIFFERENCE, I promise...so start saving and buy the shoprite ones at half price!

frozen and fresh on arrival awsome tasting highly recomend this co.,the lobster tails were as advertized jumbo and tasty,some of the best ive ever had

This is by far the yummiest maple syrup we have ever tried...and we have tried many! I'm having trouble keeping my husband from over-dosing on the stuff! You can order without worry and be assured of a great product.
This is a wonderful tasting syrup.  Is great on pancakes as well as ham. It is well worth the money.

This is a really nice, rich tasting maple syrup. Those new to maple syrup should try the B grade because it has more authentic flavor and is thicker than the lighter grades. Goes farther on pancakes and in recipes, too.
This is one of the very finest maple syrups I have ordered and enjoyed. I bought the Fancy Grade, for the light amber color. It has a very great taste. I will reorder.
This is our second order from Hidden Springs for maple syrup for our B&B.  If they continue with the great price and quick turnaround, not to mention great syrup, we will stay regular customers!

My wife became spoiled when we were on a fall trip with the taste of light maple syrup. It is not available in the south, so she was very happy to find it from Amazon.com. Hidden Springs is very high quality and have fast shipping. Thank You.
This fancy grade is as good as it gets. You will not be disappointed. This priouct supports the proud Vermont tradition.

I ordered the Grade B Hidden Springs Syrup -- Grade B is my favorite for baking.  I love the strong, rich maple flavor.  This is my favorite amongst several maple syrups that I've ordered from Amazon.  Maple syrup is understandably expensive, but this syrup is a good value among its' competitors.

Tastes great, and it's a quality product at a price a few dollars cheaper than the alternatives, even at our local supermarkets.  It's tough to find Grade A medium amber syrup in pints.  I'll probably just keep ordering these a few times a year.
Better than the medium or dark amber grades, also would be a great gift.  Go ahead and try it.  I use it on waffles with some butter

Best maple syrup I have had.  Im not a pro and bought some at cosco and threw out what was remaining when this arrived.  I literally have been putting it into a tablespoon and eating it.  This product is "out of this world."  I hope the producers dont change a thing.
Good price for the size I wanted and great quality.  It was just what I needed for a mead project.  Items was delivered quickly.
We enjoy our maple syrup with waffles and pancakes on Sundays.  This is a great product made in a small farm in Vermont.  The syrup is natural and tasty.  No complaints here!

My husband and I are quite fussy about our maple syrup and we usually buy ours from Canada.  We ran out and decided to try this one and what a surprise it was.  The Grade A Medium Amber from Hidden Springs Maple Vermont is simply fabulous.  Great and fast service.
Not as good as the reviews led me to expect. Despite great color and good viscosity, the syrup's flavor lacked intensity.  I'll continue my quest elsewhere.

Bought a six pack of these and like using it from time to time...it's a natural way to detox...please be advised start off easy with one cup then work up to two cups a day. I usually do this for about 10 days...then go about 2 or 3 months without this tea and then repeat. All natural.

I started drinking this tea because I wanted to try something which would rid me of a persistent boil. I was attracted by the word "DETOX" on the box. I am on my second box.

This tea is easy on the tastebuds and I believe that it is working.

I read many of the reviews and had mixed feelings about this product. I am glad I decided to purchase it anyway. The tea definitely cleanses you inside and out IF you follow the packaging instructions. Plus, it tastes great. I will continue to purchase more when my supply runs low.
This is one of the few teas that I will always have on hand.  It is a wonderful blend of beneficial herbs that has a great taste.  I drink it almost every day.
but this tea taste wonderful!  I would buy it for the taste alone.  It can also be purchased at Wild By Nature.

I've used this tea for years off and on. It taste great for a detox type tea and I like to use it when I'm on a fast for a few days to help clean my body out. It's one of the few things I allow myself to drink while fasting.
This is a great tea to drink twice a day to cleanse your digestive system.  Recommend drinking once in the morning and once at night or after eating an unhealthy meal to eliminate the waste.
Thank you so much for offering one of my favorite products in a cheap, bundled package. Great service and will buy again!
Detox tea is good for helping to cleanse the body of most of the modern world fast paced living. Very good price and fast delivery. would buy it again...

Really!
This stuff is pure magic for chicken, and pork.
I've added it to veggies, FRENCH FRIES OMG!!, beans, you name it.
The perfect balance of sweet, salt, and spice.

This is our family's go to BBQ spice. We highly recommend it and have shared in many extended family stocking over the years.

The tea is good and fresh. We enjoy it. The shipping is fast and cost is reasonable.
I recommend this product.
You get enough in each package to make a good size cup of drink.  It is consistent in its flavor and the amount you get in each packet.  I have purchased it a couple of times.
If you don't have the time to cut up ginger and boil it for it's wonderful flavor here's an alternative.  This tea is refreshing.  True ginger flavor and punch is wonderful.
I have been searching in the grocery store for these caramel pops for ages!  I used to suck on the during my kids sporting events.  As good as I remembered them!
These are my favorites and I have reordered more than once.  Perfect for desert without all the calories and is soooo good.  Cant find these locally so go to Amazon for my candy fix.

The coffee was send quickly. It was satisfactory but not as good as other Mocha Java coffees I've tasted (perhaps because I now have to stick to decafe). The company sent a sample of decafe Costa Rican coffee which was very good.

Good stuff! and I like the fact that buying like this results in much less packaging.
Found this cereal at Costco originally.  Was happy to see it here on Amazon.  Been eating this every morning for two years, and it still tastes great.  Very healthy.

I have been receiving this product from Amazon for more than a year from Amazon, because I can't buyit around here.  Not only does it taste good, the flaxseed and pumpkin seeds have helped me raise my good cholesteral.
This cereal is good and will get you full and satiated. It is best mixed with a lighter cereal otherwise it is too hearty and heavy.
I've probably ordered three cases of this stuff and eat it several days a week for breakfast.  great stuff!.  Minimal packaging.  Minimal waste.
My family loves this granola!  Whether sprinkling it on their yogurt or eating it in a bowl with milk, it has a great taste!!  The 26 ounce bags are an excellent value!
Product arrived undamaged and quicker than expected; it's fresh, and excellent when stirred into plain Greek yogurt for a break-time snack!
This is a great cereal if you're looking for a variety of textures and high fiber.  We love it!

This granola is full of flavor, delightfully crunchy without shredding your mouth, and a very good value for your money. My husband (whose favorite cereal is Count Chocula)likes it and has been eating it every day. Can't think of a thing they should change.
Best granola cereal I've ever eaten!  You don't have to soak it before eating, lol.
Love this cereal, but I buy  a 35 oz box at Costco for $7,49 and sometimes am offered it with a $2 /box coupon. Its too high here
Definite an auto delivery item. Plus Nature Path is one of the companies have not been bought by large companies. Like "Silk" has been bought by "Dean".

I recieved the delivery quicker than I thought I would. I was concerned with how the food item would be packaged. The Gyro slices were still frozen when I recieved them. The gyro slices were delicious, they taste better than most of the restaurants I frequent.
I love a good Gyro. I order this meat all the time and it never let's me down. Some good Pita bread lettuce, tomato and any other veggie you like will make a great lunch
the meat has some flavor i feel it could have a little more and also the slices are very thin so they burn quick if you dont pay attention. the cucumber sause from the same place is amazing though!
I have been researching the web to find some gyro strips and this is the most expensive so far, maybe look elsewhere?

I really like this product, but haven't seen it around for awhile.  I am glad Amazon carries it. It has the most buttery taste of all the 100 calorie popcorns out there.  Very little unpopped kernels, perfect serving size bags.

Great popcorn and a lot for 100 calories. Tastes great, just about every kernel pops, and it is not too salty. I will surely purchase this again and would recommend it for anyone who likes great popcorn and wants portion control too.
These are smaller bags of popcorn that are equal to about half of a normal sized bag. I'd prefer the normal sized packs.

We like Pop Secret 100 Calorie pop corn. The taste is good takes about one and a half minutes to pop and there is about 3 cups of popped corn. Pretty good snack and just 100 Calories. Good buy and price here on Amazon
Could have been more buttery but otherwise a great popcorn for 100 calories. It seemed to be larger than other 100 calorie popcorn bags.

Excellent Product! Great taste! Perfect portion!

Only 100 calories in a bag. I microwave it for 1:30 and it comes out perfect each time.

Fills a medium tupperware bowl.

Our deployed troops love this treat as it reminds them of home. A very popular connection from home during down times.
Perfect bland of spices.  This is a wonderful curry powder and the quanity is generous.  It has lasted me a long time!

I am not generally a fan of Starbucks regular coffee--or most coffee, for that matter--but this is delicious!  Light and flavorful, not grainy at all.  I only add skim milk and yet it's creamy and sweet.  I wish they made the blonde in decaf, too.

This soup is very very sweet.  They left out the salt but it is full of sugar.  There is 14 grams of sugar per serving with two servings in a can.  Too sweet for me.  Also there is dairy butter in it so it is not vegan or for someone with dairy allergies.
This is awful.  So, I got out the pots and pans and made a great no salt, little sugar and no butter fat tomato Soup using fresh tomatoes.  Tastes much, much better than this Tomato Soup!

My husband had a stroke and needed no salt products to keep his blood pressure down.
Health Valley no salt soups are great! They have low sodium and also taste great!
I'm on a low sodium diet and this still has plenty of taste without salt
This is not the product I received.  They changed the product.  It now has chunks of tomato in the soup.  This is not what I wanted.
I LOVE this soup!  I have right sided heart failure, and need to watch my salt intake.  This soup is as close to 'Tomato Bisque" by Campbell's, as you can possibly get.  You need to try this :)
Since I have to watch my sodium I have looked for a very low sodium soup for quite awhile.  Campbell's made one but no longer does.  If you had tried theirs this one is far tastier and better.
Hard to find at my local grocery and Amazon has a deal on 12 cans that come periodically throughout the year.  GREAT idea.

Actually I can't remember a time when I tasted anything so bad. I really could not believe it was meant to be eaten. Cannot imagine anyone liking this.  It did give me a good example for my daughter why it is important for her to take her health seriously.
This is a good alternative to pasta sauces if you are supposed to lower your salt intake.  Spaghetti, lasagna, etc.

This smelled so good it drew a crowd in my newly wheat free kitchen ..everyone liked it from 40 -8.. It is not the creamy kraft mac and cheese, but it has a great smell and flavor,  and we came back and bought more..

My 10 year old daughter has alot of food allergies.  Two of them are gluten and milk.  This is as close to Mac and cheese that we have found.  We both thought it was very good.  We added tuna to it.  We will definitly be buying more.  Keep adding new products to your line.

Even though it doesn't taste exactly like regular mac-n-cheese it is a very tasty product.  My child who has many food allergies was extremely excited to be able to eat mac-n-cheese again.  It is very delicious.  We've made it many times.  It packs well in a thermos for lunch.
I eat this all the time, it is SO good. Even though it says cheese, it is actually dairy free, but the taste is just superb!

My 6 year old is on the GFCF diet and is picky. This is definitely not mac & cheese, but the flavor is similar and he gobbled it up. He can have ghee because it's casein free & I think that made a big difference in the flavor. I'm happy to have another thermos meal for his school lunches.
These beans are a good find as none of our local stores carry any dried pink beans!
This was a great sampler of green coffee to roast.  I haven't tried them all yet, but I liked the variety of regions and it really was a great product for a great price!
I love these snacks!  Great variety of flavors all mixed into one bag.  I also send them to our troops in Afghanistan and Iraq and they ship so much better than chips.
Makes for a great snack both at work and at home.  Glad to be getting this shipped to my front door every two months.

My son has missed peppermint patties for over a year, these honey mints are FABULOUS and he loves them too.
Allergy free goodness!
I tried these because a friend had allergies (I don't) but I am hooked. The honey goes down "smoother" than the sugar in regular mint patties. These mints are yummy!
I got these from a local bee keeping specialty store in Sacramento... they are SO GOOD. I came online to see if I can get them for less! Highly recommended for fellow food allergy sufferers!
I ordered 18 bags of York Pieces for wedding favors, half of the bags were melted and Amazon has a no return policy on food items. I would not order food products from a online vendor again.

If you like mint chocolate, or York Peppermint Patties for that matter, then there's no reason you won't like the taste of these.  They're just like eating M&Ms but with minty freshness added to them.  4 stars because I think these candies are overpriced for what they are.
I absolutely love this tea!  It has a great mild taste to it.  The fact that is decafinated is a great plus!  I highly recommnend this tea!
Just rec'd these yesterday and not only was the shipping super speedy but the candy was extremely fresh! Will order from again without hesitation!

Have generally enjoyed this product over a few years-but found that one container (of 6-1 lb. size that I was shipped) so far had quite inferior ghee-with the milk fat still present-made me a bit sick-and threw away rest of container.

I initially bought this for my hair (crazy I know)after seeing it on a hair forum.  When it arrived, I chickened out and used it for cooking.  I am from Haiti and I use this on almost everything.  It has a slight nutty taste, easy to use.
Absolutely loved this product, loved the variety. My granddaughter and I are sampling each one. She likes the mini kernels.

Taken is taken but after you have a lot of different kinds you tend to establish a taste favorite. Basically if the price is good go for it.

I stumbled onto these and decided to give them a try.  I'm so glad I did... they're delicious!  You would never know they're fat-free.  The calories are lower than in other brands, and the taste is far superior.  Try them!

They taste slightly different from what I remember of Fig Newtons (obviously distinct).  I was a little surprised at first; it seemed maybe a little more clay-like?  And then they grew on me.  They're addicting.

These are a healthy altrnative to cookies. THey taste great and area a pretty good value I recommend to anyone looking for a healthier cookie but still has the taste you are looking for in a dessert treat.
We've used this food for over 4 years and my dog loves it. It's healthy and keeps her coat shiny and her belly full!
It's all it's cracked up to be. I will be ordering more when I run out. The product came in the mail, on time, and in good condition.

This grain is an excellent substitute for rice.  it only takes two cans of chicken broth to one package of Quinoa to make a lot of very tasty and filling finished product which can be used with gravy, sauce, mixed vegetables or anything you like.
This quinoa has to be rinsed!  I would not have ordered it if I had known that.  There are many other brands for the same price that DON"T require this annoying and messy step.

Our local coffee shop uses this mix and it's great. I have been thinking about buying some for home but I was wondering if someone could post the nutritional information for me.

Thanks!

I ordered Soozies Doozies Soft&Rich Cookie Gift Tin for my daughter for Easter.
She loved them because they were FRESH and made with ALL NATURAL INGRIDIENTS.
I would purchase them again.
My kids love this soup and I love having a few on hand. It's a reliable meal with some toast and cheese. I often add tofu to it to bump up the protein and they never notice.

Although I loved the ease and price of making this purchase online, when it arrived over half of the cans were very severely dented. A few so much so that it was almost impossible to order them.

I definitely have to reconsider where I purchase this in the future.
I like this coffee, but $37 for two 12-ounce bags? I can get it online from Walmart or even from my local grocery store for $7-9 per 12-ounce bag. Geez.
My papillon has been eating this for a while and loves it.  It was easy switching from his previous dog food (purina of some sort) and he took to it right away.

I'm a fan of Virginia peanuts, and Virginia Diner does some of the best.  These are peanuts that haven't been fancied up -- not very salty, no artificial flavors, and no oily feel to them.  You get that wonderful, pure peanut taste.  Another plus?  They're BIG.

For some unknown reason, the price for this item jumped from $17.48 to $45.44 within just two months. Perhaps the outrageous jump in price was due to the demand of 1.3 billion Chinese. Keep it, seller.
I have to admit that these Kashi bars are fed to my sheep as treats, and they love them. I, on occasion have one, and enjoy them as well.

The granola bars are pretty decent. They bars are lightly honeyed so it is not too sweet but still sweet enough. The bar is well textured and contains bits of nuts with the flax. 72 bars of it might be a bit much but it is definitely manageable as it lasts a decent amount of time.
Gimme better ingredients (KIND/Larabars) for more $ or sweeter items (genuine junk) for less $. Not sure I'd invest in a single bar again, let alone this size.

This is 72 for the price of like 24 at the grocery store. If only this were eligible for subscribe and save then it would be perfect. I would not be surprised if the price were to double soon. But I must say these are really good and at a good price.

I found the tarallini to be crumbly and have an unpleasant stale taste. My previous experience with tarallini was different, they were crunchier and not crumbly. Whether this is a specific mediterranean recipe, I don't know, but I would not buy this product again.

I was looking for an additional source of protien. These are easy to incorporate into other foods and even shakes. Great for vegans. They taste great on top of salads or yogurt .
A good source of omegas too.
These tasted fresh and nutty, and I am happy with them.  I eat a few tablespoons daily right from the bag, which I keep in the fridge after I open it.  Great product.
These are nutty delicious, and well packaged.  I put a couple tbls in a fruit shake every morning and I get to enjoy the flavor, clean energy and satisfaction of hunger with them.  Thanks hemp.

these are the tastey way to get hemp proetein into your diet my family & I put them in Salads,cookies,breads . I ordered the pack of 3 to be sent every three months seems just about right for my family of 5.
Just as I have expected. The order arrived shortly after I placed the order and the product is fresh. I higly recommend this product.
I used the hemp seeds every morning with my protein shake. The taste is great and they are so healthy!!!
these are great tasting candies for a sugar-free variety, but they get sticky and very hard to take out of the individual wrappers, especially without getting the candy all over your fingers.

My Sphynx cat loves the food but he has an allergic reaction to it. It makes him cough/choke intermittently over the course of a few days.  He has this same reaction when he drinks milk.  So, I will find some other cat to share the product with.
Delicious! So glad I found these cookies!! Softer than your average gluten free cookie with no after taste. They can be addicting!!

I'm completely satisfied with this purchase of individual packs of almond nuts.  Have ate about 5 bags by now and everyone is delicious with no bad nuts.  Can't think of anything bad with the whole deal.  The bag sizes are perfect for an in between meal snack and are are really healthy for you.

i'm addicted to nuts, i know it sounds funny but i am and these are no exception but i thought i'd let everybody know that they are unsalted which doesn
t bother me one bit but my children prefer the smokehouse ones that have salt on them. i will buy again.

These are great! Ridiculously addicting!

Good Sense makes some of the best Yogurt Pretzels around. The 9 ounce bags are perfect. I keep a bag at work and with the built-in seal, they always taste fresh.

They are soooo good!  I am so addicted to these pretzels.  I am having to control myself from eating more than a bag a day.  I  hope Amazon continues to have them and doesn't quit carrying them.  Order them now, you won't regret it, but your waist line might!  :)

All I can say is that our two dogs love these things almost more than anything else. They each get one a day and very much look forward to that special time. These long lasting treats are well worth the money for us.
My basenji, Lily, loves Rawhide Munchy Sticks Beef 5" 100 Pack and Chicken, 5" 100 Pack best, but these are a great deal and she will chew happily on these as well.  I guess she is not too picky.

This tin must have been sitting on the shelf for a decade; it was totally dried out when I opened it. When treacle sponge pudding dries, it smells nasty and can't be reconstituted, even with water and some heat.

Total waste of money.
These are, hands-down, my favorite potato chips.  They are very light and flaky with a hint of vinegar that make them simply irresistible.
I like this product because it is a very fast working product.  It works every time and you know what to expect. No unexpected emergencies.  Very smooth!!

Several people recommended this tea to me when I was on a high protein diet and things got stopped up.  I do not love the taste (sort of licorice) but after adding a sweetener I liked it better.  It is effective.  Sip it in the evening.

It is indeed a "rich and creamy chocolaty delight" if you use the smallest cup size on your machine.  Remember to shake the box well before using.  Some cocoa still remains in the K-cup after brewing, but regardless, you get a very satisfying cup of hot cocoa!

This is a fantastic soy based product that's not too sweet, is very smoothe, and wonderfully chocolaty.
i highly recommend this.

It is so watery and weak, I had to brew the smallest cup and then put in another pod to get a full cup of hot chocolate.  This makes the pods very expensive and not figure friendly.  Each pod is 60 calories, so a full cup would be 120.  Will not purchase anymore.

Very tasty.  You do need to remove the top and scrape out the remaining cocoa to really get all of the flavor.  This is what we have had to do with every brand of cocoa we have bought.  The flavor is excellent.
My wife loves this item. She will not drink any other Hot Chocolate. The K-Cup system is great!
The hot chocolate has a weird flavor to it.  I will not be buying this product again, and will probably not consider any more green mountain products.
very rich chocolate taste.not too sweet,great for a cold winter evening topped with mini marshmellows. i will certainly reccomend it
I used the minimum cup size to try and maximize the chocolate taste.  This did not help but if you like a weak chocolate taste then you will like it.
I don't like this product at all.  Much tastier and cheaper to just use hot water and a packet of hot chocolate mix from Nestle or Swiss Miss.
This product would be better made with milk, which of course, then would not be for the Keurig machine. There are other brands I prefer.
This hot chocolate is pretty blah. Not very chocolatey and certainly not very strong. It's not the fault of the Keurig -- the Cafe Escapes Dark Chocolate is way better.
Yuck...WORST "CHOCOLATE" I have ever had. Save your money on this brand and find another. Doesn't even taste taste like chocolate; we threw the rest away.

I've been through two 24 cup boxes of this hot chocolate, and it isn't great.  It's not badly priced, and the first few sips are fine.  But after it sits for five minutes cooling in your cup it separates.  It ends up being watery for the most part with a bunch of chocolate mix on the bottom.

Of course the Keurig Green Mtn Hot Cocoa is the ultimate in convenience, but, frankly, the flavor is not so hot.  Best description is slightly chocolate-flavored cardboard.  Everything else about it is fine (consistency, ease of use), but G.M. should ramp up the flavor with way more chocolate.
The hot chocolate is fine but the price here is crazy.  You can get the same thing on the Keurig site for under $15.

I like my hot chocolate to have alot of "chocolatey" flavor. Even when I use the smallest size brewing cup the Green Mountain hot cocoa K-cups tastes watered down. I have to add my own powdered hot chocolate to give it enough flavor.

I was expecting a bit better after reading other reviews. This is about the same as any other hot chocolate made with water. I prefer making it with milk as the flavor and texture is much better. Adding milk didn't help much. I guess Mom spoiled me (good).

The hot chocolate was very tasty, but pretty expensive for hot chocolate. You can buy hot chocolate K-cups in most retail stores and some grocery chains and it is the same thing for less money than advertised on here.

One of the best tasting cocoa mix I have found , So easy to make just one cup for myself and the cup is
easy to clean with no grounds invovlved. Use with K cup lids
This is a great product to put in your Keurig machine.  I use is with a cup of coffee and make a mocha.
Such good hot chocolate for the K Cup brewers out there!  DO NOT pass this one up!  Is not too sweet and very chocolatey :)
This product wad very weak! I couldn't even make out that it was supposed to be hot chocolate. Will never buy again a waste of money!
These are very good tasting and very fast making drinks.  The convene e of having a cup of hot chocolate in seconds and have it taste good is such a plus.
The local auto shop offers this free to it customers. I've tried it twice and liked it both times. Perhaps, if I had to pay for it, I might not love the price, but I would still enjoy the flavor.
This product was not very good at all. It did not have the taste or consistency of the wanted beverage.

I thought that getting hot cocoa would be a nice change, but after having my machine get clogged up, needing to clean the needles, and then putting a rinse brew after each cup is made, I've found it faster to stick with the packet of instant mix and heat water in the microwave.
This cocoa is very good. I love it, so does my son. I actually like to mix half coffee with this cocoa, very tasty. And my son likes the flavor ,and the fact that it is low in carbs.

Whole family loves this hot chocolate. We went through the entire box in less than a week. It is smooth, creamy, chocolate delight. And if you combine it with a k-cup of coffee it makes a perfect cafe mocha! Must buy more, more, more...

When I got my coffee maker there were only two cocoa cups in the mix of coffee. How delighted I was for Amazon to offer 24
cup purchases. Really great idea!
Even though the little ones liked this product, I thought it was bland and not much flavor to it.  I will not buy more of these.
This time, forget ordering through Amazon.  You can get the same product, 24 K-Cups for $12.75 at Big Cat or for $14.80 at Keurig.  These prices are a rip off.
I used the small cup setting and even opened up the cap and scraped the excess mix out of the cup and it is still very weak tasting.
I am diabetic and I don't like artificial sugar, but I really like this hot chocolate.  Sweet enough and also has enough chocolate flavor.  I love it.

I love this cocoa. I place it in my Kurig with 1/2 C of water, make the cocoa and add another 1/2 hot milk...so creamy, great taste. It is still good with water but the milk adds a creamy texture..YUM

I would not order these K-cups again.  Maybe I'm spoiled with Godiva hot chocolate, but I think Swiss Miss hot chocolate has more chocolately flavor than these K-cups and I wouldn't waste my money on these.  It comes out a pinkish color that is not appetizing at all.
Even after shaking the cup and only using 6 ounces of water, this "hot cocoa" (pretty sure there's not a lick of real chocolate in it) still tastes horrible.
I received my product in a timely fashion and was exactly what I expected! I would recommend this to anyone!

I have been looking for these great candies for years.  Every now and then I would come across them in a candy store.  It is so nice to know I can now order them on line at Amazon and always have Honees on hand to enjoy and share with others.  I love the honey filling. Try them. JANE

If you miss and crave the Honey Pine Brothers cough drops, you are going to LOVE the Honees Honey candy. I also love that they are imported from Italy. It's nice to see something other that "Made in China"!
Been looking for these for 15 years, so glad I finally found them, Just like I remembered from my childhood. :-)
I love these. They're just the right amount of sweetness and I really enjoy the fact that each piece is individually wrapped.

LOVE THEM !
It took me forever to find these.
Everyone who I have given them to to try has loved them & want MORE!
Shipping is on the high side though.
Just a perfect transaction. I can't buy this candy anywhere in my town so this was a great find.
All Tom Douglas rubs are great, but I have no idea why they're listed for $25+ here. You can buy them for about $6 in Seattle grocery stores or at Tom Douglas' website.
This cereal is awesome and our very favorite of all of the Nature's Path Cereals.  We love it and buy it in multiple boxes!
I really enjoyed this product. It tastes good and is very close to the Russian or Iranian versions. Also, the service and quick delivery were an added bonus.  I would highly recommend this product.

Guys, do you know what "malossol" means in Russian?
"Lightly salted".

Other than that its a very good tasting caviar (I guess you can blame a puddlefish for that), very close to Russian Sturgeon's caviar.
Received this item as expected - if anyone has had peanut porridge - this is  as close as it gets to Jamaica !

Good deal, better than buying at the local craft store and even better than the online cake supply stores.  Item arrived as promised and will be useful when making Spider and Turkey cupckaes during the fall baking season.
This product does not smell very well to me.  In fact, I have to use a fork to "tenderized" the pieces for my old kitty cat.

my cat loves this first time I have found a cat food that he will eat and every time i go in the kitchen he thinks

Boy,....was I finally RELIEVED...when they chowed down on these!!!

I bought this product because my older cat stopped eating the wellness dry and wet food I usually fed her.  She likes this food and she begs for it every morning and evening when it is time for her meal.  The ingredients are not quality ingredients but this food is keeping my kitty satisfied.

This product is the absolute best for bar-b-queing meat, the roasted garlic turns the trick. It's a little pricey (about twice as much) but Amazon did have a nice discount that makes it more palatable.

I would rate Starbucks ready brew coffee quite high.  They are very easy to use and I like the flavor a lot.  I use them at work where I only want one cup of coffee and hate to have to use and wash my whole coffee pot.

I am a major coffee drinker. I love this coffee. It is my favorite instant coffee. You can't even tell it's instant. I recommend this to anyone who likes coffee and would enjoy the conveinence of having it ready in an instant!

I'm nursing and miss having coffee so much!

I heat up skim milk in the microwave, pour some agave and a pack of Starbucks VIA decaf.

If Starbucks had a Decaf Tassimo, I'd pass this up.  Howeever, they do not.  So I use it to make ice coffee.  Pretty good, although I would have preferred another drak roast over Italian Roast.

We live out of the country and if you can believe it... there are NO STARBUCKS anywhere near us.  When friends come to visit us, we ask them to bring us a supply of VIA Ready Brews.  It's almost as good as the freshly brewed.  It has a great aroma and big taste.  We love it!

I recommend using half water and half skim milk. I usually mix 5 oz water with 5 oz skim milk and heat in the micro for two minutes.  Add the packet and sugar or sweetener.  Great for a quick cup of coffee without the hassle of cleaning the machine.

I bought this to keep in my desk at work, as our coffee is pretty bad! As long as you don't use too much water (anything over 8 oz), this makes a fast flavorful cup. I much prefer this to Sanka, the other instant alternative offered at work.

Great and simple product. Is replacing my k-cups and goes with me everywhere. Simple, fast, convenient, affordable and so much better than most products out there. You wonder how long before there is some serious competition.
Don't waste your money. Buy the real cup of coffee and spend the time and money at a coffee shop.

royal canine is a great product Jake loves it he is now 3 months

This is wonderful. If I could have given the honey granules a 10 I would have. It tastes great, no sticky mess. My grandkids say that the taste is "magic" in their hot cereals.

sky is the limit with this stuff. i've used it in rubs, marinades, baked goods & salads. it is a permanent addition to my spice rack.

This Honey Granules is tasty and a welcome alternative to Cane Sugar. I use it in my morning oats (steel cut oats), Bird's custard and Tea. One or two teaspoonfuls go a long way. It is better stored in the refrigerator. Consider it in place of over-processed store bought cane sugar.
I wanted to try this type of powered Honey for my tea it is very good and a great alternative to Sugar works very well in Tea.
this honey was very good used it in cookie recipe like brown sugar and the cookies came out delicious. Thank you

THIS IS A WONDERFUL PRODUCT. USE IT IN EGGS, MEATLOAF, SPAGHETTI SAUCE, EVERYTHNG. I'VE EATEN THEM OUT OF THE JAR.:o)))

I cannot find this product in my local stores, but did find them on Amazon.  Price is what I expected from my last grocery store purchase.  Only thing I wished they used the USPS "flat rate" shipping.  Otherwise I'm completely satisfied and will purchase again in the future.

Give yourself the gift of buying the regular skippy.  Although this gives you less fat, there is a distinct taste difference.  We will eat what we purchased but I am still in disbelief that such a minimial amount of fat reduction in a product really makes a great PB turn into a yuckky PB...
This is my favorite pb.  It is really full of peanut taste, and I feel that it is reduced fat because there is less oil added.
Me and family love this brand of Peanut Butter. Cant stand the tast of others. And enjoy the free sjhipping from amazon.
I like creamy peanut butter, however this is hard to spread because part of the oils are kept out to make it reduced fat. Kinda makes for a messy sandwich.

I have always been a fan of Skippy peanut butter and I love that Amazon is offering buying in bulk at a great price! It is cheaper here than what I find in the store. I highly recommend it as long as you have a place you can store the extra cans.
This is the best reduced fat creamy peanut butter I've tasted. My whole family loves it.  We it by the case.  Great food!
This is the first Redued-Fat Peanut Butter that I have thought was a good peanut butter.  I will buy it again when this is gone.

I do not buy this because of the fat content, I honestly find that it tastes better than the Skippy full fat- and does not get those oily collections that the full fat gets. Highly recommend this product if you love peanut-butter.
This is the only peanut butter that I eat.  I love the low fat Skippy.
This PB tastes good and is goood for you! It makes good sandwiches. I only wish it were in stock more often!

For the uninitiated, 'evaporated cane juice' is just sugar by another name. Another product that tries to present itself as healthy, but isn't really...eating something that lists sugar as the second ingredient isn't what I would consider to be a healthy start for the day.

Almost every morning I reach for the Organic Hot Oatmeal Hemp Plus.  It has more body than the typical grocery store instant oatmeal.  It is rich in whole grains and full of fiber.  It is not too sweet; I usally add a teaspoon of my favorite sweetener.  I highly recommend this product.
I like it a lot!  Great taste ... not too sweet.  Perfect way to start the day!
Very yummy!! I used to eat the variety pack from this same brand, but I love this flavor so much I eat it every day. It's especially yummy with coconut oil added in. Love Nature's Path!

I ordered these nuts off a whim because of the flavor. I just got into eating more nuts because I don't get enough Omega 3's. Everybody that I shared these with loved them! I went through 2 containers in a week (because of sharing). This will be a staple in my house from now on!!!
These have more net carbs than the Emerald Cocoa Roast almonds (6g vs 3g), but if you're not worried about that, these are absolutely delicious! If you like flavored nuts, you've got to try these.

I got these at my local Publix. They're the best tasting almonds of the bunch. The butter toffee tastes natural and the almonds are of good quality. They also make dark chocolate covered almonds. They taste like Cocoa Puffs but are still pretty good if you're looking for a cocoa kick instead.
OK, I like a little richness. These nuts have a flavorful salt taste, but are almost too dry to get down your throat.

I love these almonds. They are my favorite to date and I would definitely buy again. The taste is crunchy, they are well toasted and the salt that has been added is just perfect. Not too little, not too much. Best I have ever eaten!!
These are the best tasting almonds. I buy them in bulk to share at work. Any time someone finds cheaper almonds, they always come back to these because they can't be beat.

I purchased 2 other types of Blue Diamond almonds on the same day, and they were both around $11 for a pack of 3. T his one was only ONE 8 oz. container, and I assumed it was at least 2-3 containers since the cost was over $8.
Nice sweet treat with some nutritional value. These are fantastic! The only thing is I can find them in more local store at a lower cost.
Ive had some tasty nuts before but these are exceptionaly good. try them ! im very happy with this product
These almonds are my favorite almonds.  Wal-Mart used to carry them, but now I have to order online.  They are the perfect balance of cinnamon and sugar without being overpoweringly sweet.

I love these for a snack. I get a nice taste of chocolate and mint (in addition to the almond, of course), but it isn't super sweet. I hope Blue Diamond keeps coming out with more flavors. The Butter Toffee is great too.
Great taste.  The Blue Diamond flavors are way better than the Emerald flavors.  Great between meals snack that we all eat.  Also grab to put in baggies for lunches.

These are our absolute favorite almonds and love that there isn't any fake sugars in them.  I'll take more calories with real sweeteners any day over sucralose in the other brands. And this flavor is DELICIOUS.  YUM!
these are a good thing for you and sometimes hard to find in a larger container at the store, so these make it much easier and there a good price here.

The almonds tastes all right. Since it is too dry, the salt can hardly stay on surface. Therefore, it is not salty enough. On the whole, it is a healthy snack. I hope this type of almonds can have subscription service and discount.

It seems impossible that there is a healthy snack that tastes like cinnamon brown sugar but they've managed to do it.  I love these and I always have my cabinet stocked.  This quenches my sweet tooth without gulit.  I highly recommend it.
Do buy the almonds.  Great for snacks and travel.  The contanier has a close top which is great for storage.
Great flavor.  I snack on these when I need a boost of energy.  They help satisfy cravings between meals.

This almond product is wonderful! I am so excited to have healthy options that curb my sweet tooth. It has on 5 sugars for an ounce of almonds.

Wahoo!
These almonds taste good, not as well flavored as the cinnamon or vanilla flavored but a decent change of pace.  A little plain though.
I love these almonds!  Wish they sold them somewhere locally so I didn't have to buy them in bulk over the internet.
If you are an almond fan like me and like sweets as well this is a great treat.  And healthy as well.

This is an excellent product.  I tried a handful that a friend had and I was hooked!  It has good flavor without being too salty.  You can also chop them and add to salads or in green beans.  My kids enjoy them also, good alternative to junk snacks!
Love these - very flavorful and wholesome.  I'm hooked!  Unlike the heavily oiled/salted/roasted almonds found in most grocery stores, these actually taste like real food.
These gave me a headache, too much sugar, and other ingredients that didn't sit well.  I would not recommend to someone trying to eat healthier.
Great taste.  Almonds are high in overall fat but low in saturated fats that most contribute to weight gain.  Buy a case; they stay pretty fresh when sealed for 6 months
