All the 5-star reviews convinced me to buy these...I wish I hadn't :(  It's been two months since I purchased them and I still have four out of the six containers unopened.  They're just blah.  Now the chili lime flavored almonds from Blue Diamond, on the other hand, are Mmm Mmm good!

The delivery was extremely quick, the packaging was fine, and if you suck off all the honey, the almonds even taste pretty good. but i for one do not like this flavor. Mind you, I could eat 3095826 honey roasted PEANUTS.

I am looking for a replacement for Coca Cola and I read the positive reviews here and decided to purchase at my local Whole Foods. There's a gross stevia aftertaste and it tastes nothing like commercial cola; it's not good and it's misnamed.

This is a rip off.  Found out that you can buy this product for under $2.00 just about anywhere, not the $7.99 they charge.  In fact you can go directly to the manufacture and order.  Do not get rip-off.

Delicious!
Ideal to eat with fruit, and if you want to eat with some chips (is not too spicy) i like this very much

This is a great product and the only problem we have is the unreliability of finding it on the Grocery Store shelf. With Amazon.com, it's just a Mouse Click and three days away. We keep a supply on hand and reorder from Amazon.com on a regular basis. Thanks Amazon. Hank C.

The product was received on schedule and in perfect condition. I have been buying this product and brewing it for years and it is still a great product.  It is much better tasting than using tea bags.

If you like their teabags, this is really worth a try. The leaves in the teabags seem to be the tea that is rejected when they package the loose tea. This tea has a brighter taste than the tea bag Lipton.

I love the Loose Tea. The bag tea has a harsh taste compared To the loose tea. If you drink more than 1 cup a day use a CLEAN (never used for Coffee) Coffee pot. Small 4 cup pots only need 1 tea spoon for weaker a little more for stronger tea.

We have been using this product for many years of enjoyment.  In summer, my wife uses it for iced tea almost every evening for our supper.  There is some usually left over so it can be used either hot or cold at a later time, even early the following day.  We read that tea is good for the body too.
Its hard to beat this for making iced tea. It makes a strong tea that manages to quench a thirst on a hot day. Just dont steep is too long or it will get bitter (I find that 4 mins is about perfect.)
This is a great product. Shipping was fast as usual and I plan to keep on getting tea from Amazon as long as possible.

I live way out in the boondocks and even the closest little town stores do not carry Liptons' Loose Tea.  I don't want tea bags for both ecological and economical reasons, so the convenience of subscribing to a scheduled shipment at a reasonable price is wonderful for me.  Thank You.

As others have said, Lipton's Loose Tea is very difficult
to find in stores. I prefer the loose tea to the tea
bags for iced tea. I hope Amazon continues to offer the

I was so disappointed to find that the two stores I shop in had stopped carrying the loose Lipton tea.  This is the only tea I use.  There is a difference between it and tea bags and I'm thrilled that I can buy it on line (and as an added bonus, it's cheaper!)thanks so much
It's very hard to find this product in local grocery stores. Loose tea is something my wife and I enjoy.

GREAT TEA.  IF ANYONE HAS NOT TRIED LOOSE TEA THEY NEED TO, BECAUSE THEY DON'T KNOW WHAT THEY ARE MISSING.  I WAS VERY GLAD TO FIND THIS PRODUCT AGAIN.  MANY THANKS FOR KEEPING THIS WONDERFUL BEVERAGE.  FAST SHIPMENT AND GREAT SERVICE
I love this tea!!  I drink it every day of the year.  My grandma made her tea from this and its the only tea my family drinks!!

Lipton's loose tea is the best!
This is the only way to make good good iced tea. you will never taste iced tea as good as homemade and it is cheaper on amazon than in the supermarket!

I use a little plastic shot glass to brew 2 liters perfectly at the office. We love it. That's only a few dry grams makes 2 liters of hot tea! Can't find this in my local supermarket. Glad Amazon has it!

I chose to have this tea sent to me automatically, thereby saving even more money.  It's cheaper this way than I can buy at my local store.  Loose tea made with filtered water makes the absolute best tasting iced tea!
Excellent way to make good old fashioned tea, beats tea bags "HANDS DOWN"! Will continue to buy this product and spread the word how "REAL TEA" is made.:)
Good value, good tea. We've been  using it for years and it always makes a good pot of tea.
I love this product and can't find it locally. Thanks Amazon I turn to you for help when I can't find things in my community.
We use loose tea all the time, and regular loose tea has become hard to find in our local grocery stores. This subscription is great.

Fewer and fewer stores carry loose-leaf tea and I was so glad to find it on Amazon. Who knew?  I've become an avid fan of Amazon over the last few months.  It's wonderful to have someone ELSE do the "shopping" for me and allows me to find products in one place.
Tea tastes great.  Overflows my ice tea maker, but worth it; I guess.  Tazo is better but much more expensive.

This is my third order of Lipton loose Tea.  It isn't easy to find in our local stores, so I really like to be able to depend on Amazon to provide this product for me.  Excellent product and service and recommend this all.
Lipton tea is around $6.75 in the local gorcery store if you cand find it.

The best tea for ice tea.  A little harder to use than bags, but the taste is so much better.  I make mine in an ice tea pot and it's always perfect.  I've been drinking it all my life and the quality is always wonderful.

Save your money and buy a better quality tea than Lipton Loose Tea.  Tea is better than the bagged version but you will want to pour it through a fine filter before drinking because the leaves are broken and some are just very small particles.
This tea was supposed to be loose tea.  I purchase loose tea all the time.  Instead of packaging the tea in bags, they left it loose.  Gave a very couldy tea with a bitter taste.

So far this is the closest thing to the Thai restaurant I've tried.  And though it's close, it's still not exactly the same.  It does have that one spice that other Thai teas are missing. It's really outstanding.
These truffles melt slowly in your mouth with a wonderful flavor and smoothness. And you want just one! The most satisfying chocolate I've ever had.  I want some NOW!
A drop at a time in a bowl (or pot) of chili will give you the heat level you want. I will save a lot of money on peppers for my chili. A little on a toothpick brought a fellow heat lover to tears.

Yes, the final answer is YES, IT IS HOT!  Why even ask the question?  It is 1.5 million SVU, if you are looking add a little heat, this is not for you, if you want to cry yourself to sleep wondering "WHY, WHY, WHY!!!???", then you are looking at the right product, IT'S HOT!

Excellent product! I use a drop on everything. Suprisingly, this hot sauce actually tastes good. I expected it to just be hot, because it includes a pepper extract. But it actually enhances the flavor food, if you like hot.
Warning this stuff is hot. Just adding a drop into some pho was too much, but if u like and can handle spice then this is for u, be warned thou!  Enjoy.
Not for the faint hearted! This is really, really hot stuff! I tasted 1 drop on a toothpick and it burnt badly for 10 minutes. But it's all good:))))
This is the hottest sauce I have ever had.  Just 1 drop in a soup makes my mouth burn for 30 minutes and I start crying.  This sauce is not for the faint of heart.
Adds flavor and heat to food. Hot, but not intolerable for those who can handle spicy foods. Purchased as a gift and would buy again.

This is one hot extract.  I use 1 drop in a bowl of soup and it makes it plenty hot.  I also use it to heat up my chili.  If you like it hot, but not so over the top you can't taste the food, then this is the Final Answer you've been looking for.
The bottle is tiny but it will go a long way!  All you need is a tiny drop on a toothpick to spice up your plate.
I love the litter dropper in the lid to add just the right number of drops. It is spicy, but not too bad. For some fun try adding 4-5 drops in your next batch of brownies. It's actually really good.

The dark chocolates were great and the packaging was great for Christmas
The tin was something you dont see in America anymore.
Perfect to reuse for candy or other things at christmas.
My mother in law loves this product.I looked at several sites and could not find it without havig to, in some cases, pay over 100$ and was so happy to find this on Amazon
There are only a few candies in this tiny box, not worth spending over $20.
Just used this product in my DeLonghi EC702. Best cup of Espresso I've gotten from it so far, possibly best cup ever.
I like the slight pineapple flavor in this better than the plain coconut water. Good well chilled. Coconut water is supposed to be a healthy drink.
Love this juice. Scheduled shipment is convenient and economical. This is a very expensive beverage and any way to save some money on it, is worth it
Shipping great and loved product. The boxes are a little tough because there is not a lid if you do not finish.  I suggest buy only little ones this way.

Pineapple is hands down my favorite flavor of Vita Coco! It not only serves a great electrolyte replenishing beverage (aka the PERFECT hangover cure) but it can also be made into a pinacolada if you just add some rum :)
I really like this coconut water, but I was surprised that per 17oz box it's the same price at Wegman's.  Probably won't be ordering again unless there's some sort of discount.
Heard about this drink from a friend and had to try it. Had one while traveling and loved it!!! I sat on the plane enjoying it...I was thinking, I should bought another one!

I subscribe to this monthly but just got an email stating that it's changing from 17 oz. to 16.9 oz. - but no price change?  WOW that's a really lame cut to increase their profit margins.  Whatever I won't miss the .1 oz. obviously but how about messaging and acknowledging your devoted consumers.
Of all the flavors Vita Coco produces, the Pineapple combination is by far the best - it has just enough flavor to keep it interesting but not overpowering.
The pineapple coconut combination is refreshing. I especially like that there is no added sugar. This is a welcomed change from other brands.

I like this product so much I have it delivered monthly!  So happy to be drinking this at work while my co-workers are stuck with pop!  It's so refreshing and revitalizing!  The only coconut water flavor I like is pineapple!  Transports easily and stores easily with the screw-on top.
I always feel refreshed when I drink this coconut water. The pineapple gives it an added extra that makes it truly irresistible. It has been a firm favorite of mine now for nearly a year.

I tried quite a few varieties of this brand and the pineapple is the best.  Light but refreshing.  I am not sure if I think it is a miracle elixer or anything but I did purchase a case and look forward to drinking this on a regular basis.  Thank you for the great value and convenience, Amazon.
I use vita coco coconut water with pineapple to mix with my ultra-meal nutritional supplement it mixes well and taste great.I have it for breakfast every morning.
If you haven't had coconut water with pineapple juice before then you need to try this! Simply delicious and so healthy for you!
Good thirst quencher. Milky and thicker then I expected. Not what I would call a pineapple flavor but one can get the idea it is pineapple.
Short and brief.  The product has a wonderful coconut taste and the pineapple addition is light and mildly sweet.  I will certainly purchase this again.

I've always wanted to like coconut water - low in calories, high in minerals - but I've just never liked the taste much. The pineapple juice in this really makes a difference. It still needs to be well chilled to be good, but it makes a healthy post-workout drink.

Love the pineapple flavor. Makes me feel like I am on vacation drinking a pina colada. (You probably could add a little rum and.....)Really tastes better than other pineapple coconut waters I have tried!!
This product is a good addition to fruit smoothies.  It thins it out while adding good taste and electrolytes, which are good during the very hot weather.

I love this water! I started buying it after my Bikram yoga classes to rehydrate, and now drink it whenever I feel a little dehydrated.  Living in AZ, I tend to not drink enough water so these help tremendously and are delicious too!  Try them! You'll be hooked :)
Vita coco water is taste great by itself or mixed up in a smoothie. It is great for re-hydration after a workout and has more potassium than a Banana.

IT SAYS ON THE BOX EACH DRINK CONTAINS: THE POTASIUM OF 2 BANANAS & MORE ELECTROLITES THAN A SPORTS DRINK. THEY MIGHT SEEM A LITTLE HIGH PRICED BUT GO TO GROECERY STORE BUY 2 BANANAS & 2 SPORTS DRINKS AND YOU WILL PAY MORE TO GET THE SAME NUTRITION YOU GET FROM 1 JUICE BOX OF THIS COCONUT WATER...
Great before, during, and after a workout. Great natural electrolytes, Very high in potassium, amazing drink! This is my favorite flavor, tangerine is 2nd

Great real coconut young coconut taste. Not the usual overwhelming sweet taste seen on other coconut water canned drinks.  Good on the environment. Made in Brazil. Even better.  You can really taste the fruit labelled on the product besides the coconut water taste

I bought this at a local gas station near my house and was excited to try it because I see it everywhere. It was nasty. I will never drink this crap again, I don't care how "good" it is for you. The taste is disgusting and I'd rather just drink regular water. Blah!
I'm so addicted to these!!! You know the movie When Harry Met Sally? When I drink one of these it just feels like that famous scene in the movie... orgasmic!
My 26 year old horse Little Joe loves these and they are helping him. I wish they come in bigger bags.

I got this for my 23 year old gelding.  He loves it and it seems to be helping him.  His appetite and joints appear to be improving. I wish they sold this in 30lb or 50lb sizes.  Then all of our horses could have this everyday.

This is my favorite starbucks roast, but why dont you just go to your local starbucks to purchase this, its the same price if you just go there and you dont have to pay for shipping and handeling and all that stuff, plus they will grind it for you there.

i love this coffee.  i drink it black. i drink it 7 days a week, a few cups a day in the morning.  it's bold and strong and i wouldn't want it any other way.  it's delicious.  it may not be for everyone, but i give it 5 stars.
If you like a strong but smooth flavorful coffee this is it. I have tried others and just keep coming back to this one. My second joice would be the Starbucks Italian blend.
I sent this coffee to two friends back east.  they thoroughly enjoyed getting it and said it was delicious.
I would not recommend this oil.  It does not have a pleasant smell and does not purify the skin.  It's just like other oils I have bought from drug stores which were cheaper.
Do not order this! It has absolutely no taste and was COMPLETELY disappointing!I tried to return the unopened 5 boxes and Amazon would not let me...total bummer and waste of money.
I put this product in my coffee & it tastes fantastic! Coffee is kindof boring without it. Excellent product & super good for you!

I was so frustrated - they hooked me on this product at the local Walmart and then stopped carrying it.  I could not find it at any of the local stores, so I went to Amazon - and there it was!  I have enough to last for a good while now and it was exactly as advertised and arrived in good time.
Absolutely love this product. It is a nice treat for those who are looking for low calorie sweet snack. The name is perfect and says it all...Delight Bars.

This is the perfect snack for that 10am drop between breakfast and lunch.  It's creamy without being too sweet.  I'm so glad AMAZON offers this bar since all the grocery stores in my area have discontinued them. Give them a try!
First had these in LA.  No grocery store in my area sells them.  Odd because Providence, RI is not a remote town.  Anyway, I was glad to find them on Amazon.

Hi,
Does anyone know what the nutritional info. is on these specifically?...sugar content per bar, carbs?

Thanks
THEY ARE DELICIOUS NOT SALTY YOU CAN SIT AND EAT 2-3 2 OUNCE BAGS AT A TIME I GIVE THESE 5 STARS PLUS I HAVE TO STOP MYSELF FROM EATING THEM THEY ARE DELICIOUS.

These chips are the best!! I've tried some of the other flavors and they are ok, nothing special... but the Mesquite BBQ is hands down the best BBQ chips I've ever had! if you like BBQ chips (and are not concerned with the calories most chips bring), then you will not be disappointed in these!

These are delicious lower sodium/fat chips. Convenient lunch/snack size bag is enough for sharing. Halloween is two months away and the kids will be getting these for trick or treating at our house.  By the case means they're always on hand.

The chips are deliciously spicy and super crispy. It takes a second for the heat to hit but
when it does, it's AWESOME! Love these chips and will continue to buy for a long time.
Deep river snacks are the best chips ever!!! I'm addicted to the zesty jalapeno and haven't tried other flavors. I recommend this brand to everyone.

These are everything I want in a potato chip; Flavor that jumps out at you and they stay crunchy!!
Do yourself a favor(and flavor) and try these chips!!
Whole family loved 'em. Hard enough to break your teeth (in a good way, they are kettle chips after all).  24 for $17? We'll definitely buy again.

These are very good chips. The Asian Sweet & Spicy--not too sweet, not too spicy, or salty--perfectly balanced seasoning. We received very fresh packages.  I just like thicker cut potato chips especially being kettle cooked, but that will not deter me from ordering again.
I really like these chips and so do my customers. Tangy and spicy chips with a sweet finish.  I look for 2 oz. bags like these.

My husband was just diagnosed as gluten intolerant and he thought his life was over.  Surprize he loved these chips and couldn't believe it.  I did too and am not allergic to foods.  Can't say enough good things about this chip.
I find deep river snacks everywhere but hardly ever find the cracked pepper and sea salt.  Glad that Amazon carries it.  If you like spicy and peppery these are the chips for you.

I was very skeptical about buying a brand of chips I had never tasted before, much less buying it in bulk.
However, I had not regretted it.
These chips are one of the best I had tried and certainly exceeded my expectations.
They're reasonably priced too so that is a big plus!
This is a heavy kettle style chip that is not as "heavy" as kettle brand chips, but bas good flavor.  I will reorder.

I recently bought these chips.  Came home and only three bags were left in the box.  My whole family loves them.  They have great flavor and better and healthier than more chips. I'm ordering a few more boxes today

These are not the "same old" chips by far and the Asian Sweet & Spicy sparked my imagination too, makes you appreciate the new and improved variety of potatoe chips. This flavor is easily an "8" on the ten-scale.
I love Rosemary chips, but can't find any at my location. I was glad I came across these, at such a great price.

The potato chips are wonderfully tasty.  My sons and I both like the Rosemary and Olive Oil because it is not as spicy.  We also got the Jalapeno.  It is not so much I don't like the Jalapeno.  It is spicy hot for me.  I still love the potato chips.
Being what you would call a chip connoisseur was looking forward to trying these.  Great chips.
Very nice chips; just the right size to serve with a sandwich and watch my calories.

Ingredients on Deep River Snacks's website are: Potatoes, sunflower oil and/or corn oil, whey, sea salt, onion powder, sugar, garlic powder, torula yeast, dried parsley, maltodextrix, canola oil, soybean oil, rosemary extract and "natural flavors".

False adversing much?
They are a healthier chip with less salt and fat, which I like better than the over-salted regular chips on the market.  The flavor is great and they are nice and crunchy. Absolutely worth a try!
Love these chips.  Good for a quick snack and I don't fee TOO guilty eating them since they have less fat and salt than regular chips.  Highly recommended.
The sweet Maui onion tastes like sour cream and onion.  I was hoping to get the delicious chips that I enjoyed in Maui.  Don't wast your time.

The kettle chip itself is crisp, crunchy and good, although somewhat greasy.  Over coated with the flavoring causing mouth burn when it was not expected in a chip with Rosemary flavoring.  Leaves greasy, gritty residue on fingers after two or three chips.

I love nestle chips, but the top of the box's bags and the bottoms were half way melted, and I couldn't find anyone in Amazon to complain to.  I really wish I could figure out where you complain to Amazon.  I know how to complain to the stores but not to Amazon itself.
This was great coffee and I would order this again! My husband loves this particular one because it is mild and has a great flavor as well.
This lemon salt is ok, but the salt is not infused with the lemon, the lemon is mixed with salt granuals.  So might as well use lemon.
These are great treats - in fact they are the only thing I use for my dog.  But this price seem way wrong - so far off as to possibly be incorrect??  In my local PetSmart they are $5.99.

I saw the price on Amazon, and I jumped at it!  It was a great deal compared to others that I found on the Internet.  Bought the box of Jelly Belly Tangerine Jelly Beans as wedding favors.  Great Steal!

I have purchased this at Costco several times and the quality seemed to be lacking.  This purchase through Amazon was superior.  I'm not certain why there is a quality difference.  I would definitely check this out.
Stuff inside is good. But olive oil containers should be dark to block sunlight. And I prefer glass containers to plastic.

I use this in cooking and also as a skin care product. First time that I have tried olive oil as a moisturizer and I absolutely love it. This is one brand that I will buy again.It is great and gentle on the skin.
This is a must have in my home.  I use olive oil for everything, my skin, hair, cooking, taking off makeup. This is great, quality organic, virgin olive oil and I'm in heaven!
Coffee has good flavor but I find it to be a little on the weak side. So I use more than one bag per pot and thus removes the convenience of using bags in the first place.

I am on a gluten free diet and find most gluten free snack high in calories and fat.  These cookies are awesome. The serving size is 4 cookies, calorie count per serving is between 100 and 120 and fat is between 1 and 2. Great flavor and crunch and almost healthy.

Finally a cookie that taste great!  If you have eaten any gluten free cookies before you know they are bland.  These cookies are AWESOME.  The best part is I dont have to worry about my multiple food allergies.  I would recommend them to anyone who loves cookies like me!

I love Dr. Lucy's cookies.  All the flavors are terrific.  I don't eat them because they're gluten free-I have no allergies-but I am a vegetarian who usually eats vegan.  I often crumble these (or the sugar cookie flavor) on top of a bowl of coconut milk ice cream-it's spectacular.

I am on a gluten free diet and find most gluten free snack high in calories and fat.  These cookies are awesome. The serving size is 4 cookies, calorie count per serving is between 100 and 120 and fat is between 1 and 2. Great flavor and crunch and almost healthy.

These cookies are great, even greater since they have no gluten, no dairy, no eggs, and are light crispy and oh so good.  This is a phenomenal price too, and I love the small snack pack size!!!! Thanks Amazon.  And thanks Dr. Lucy (who lives one town over from me!)

I bought these cookies after reading all the rave reviews but they were very dry, didn't have much chocolate, and left an unpleasant aftertaste. I don't understand what all the fuss is about. If these were the only GF cookies available, I still wouldn't buy them again.
The cookies are great tasting.  Especially for gluten free.  I will definitely buy them again and again.!  The consistency is like a regular chip ahoy!

These cookies are small, grainy and very crunchy with an awful aftertaste. And very expensive for such a small package of 16 cookies. Might be great for multiple allergies, But I was very disappointed.

For what is is, this cookie is pretty good. Does it taste like the soft, under-baked, buttery kind you get from a bakery or your favorite shoppe? No, however it does satisfy a sweet tooth. In my opinion these taste just like a "less sweet" version of the chips ahoy brand I ate as a kid.

I love a crisp cookie that you can dip in milk. These are crisp,delicious and light and they travel well for my peanut allergic grandaughter. She's four and its a great thing when we can find things she loves and can eat without worry.
These are some of the best cookies I've found without allergens in them.  I love that they come individually packed so I can grab them to go or put them in my lunch.

My son is on a restricted diet due to allergies and he is very picky. It was hard to find things that he would even try. After tasting one of these cookies he was hooked. Now this is a favorite snack of his.

Terrific flavor, good crisp texture and just the right amount of sugar sprinkles make this a winner! Lucy's cookies are my go - to
dessert.

I bought the chocolate chip and they are delicious!! Regardless of the fact that they are gluten free, these cookies are good enough to stand on their own.

I gave my father one to try, and he loved it. He had no idea they are gluten free.
Great seller, fast shipping! I love these cookies! I have many allergies and I have no problems when eating these. I will be ordering more.
These are the best GFCF cookies ever! Even better than I can make at home and they are awesome for quick lunch packing!

Lucy's Cinnamon Thin cookies, while a little pricy, are quite tasty.  I like to let them get slightly stale so that they are chewy, although that doesn't happen often because they are usually gone too quickly.

I bought these on a whim at my local gluten free store. These cookies taste amazing!
To me, they taste like cinnamon toast crunch cereal.

Unfortunately, I have a sweet tooth and need to refrain from buying every week.
They are just TOO tasty, I want to eat the whole box!

i bought these after having them at starbucks and i loved them. im always looking for a weight watcher friendly snack and these fit the bill. they are four weight watcher plus points and are delicious.

This is a very flavorful cookie with a nice texture. It is also low in Carb. I have used the crumbs from these cookes to replace a grahmcracker crust and was extreemly pleased with the results. It is my only "must have in stock" cookee!

Glad I gave them a try. They are expensive, but all gluten free foods I purchase are! They taste the closest to the best cookies I used to purchase before having to go gluten-free. Will purchase  again.

Lucy's is one of the very few baked goods available that omits all the major sources of food intollerances -- gluten, dairy and eggs. More importantly, they are delicious. When we can't find a local source for Lucy's cookies, we always ordered them on-line.
I love crisp sugar cookies, these were perfect, tasted like regular gluten cookies.  Will buy over and over.
These are the only glutten-free cookies I eat. They are crunchy and go great with coffee and tea.
My daughter loves these!  We both have gluten sensitivities so we were so happy to find these!

to all of you gluten free people out there who thought that you couldn't eat Chocolate Chip cookies anymore- think again!  These are so delicisious taht you won't miss the wheat!  They are the best wheat free cookies I've found.  I could eat half a box at a time but I try not to!  :)
A fabulous compilation of cinnamon and crunch - sweet and glulten free! Pricey, but worth it.

These cookies have a great flavor and no aftertaste that I can detect. I do not find them gritty at all. They are quite crispy, but I like that. I think they are as good as any regular sugar cookie I have ever had, and my non-GF friends agree!

I am very pleased with the light crispy texture and sweet taste - so far the best GF oatmeal cookie I have found. It does not have a traditional chewy oatmeal texture, but still great and even better available through Amazon!
Lucy's Cinnamon Thins are crispy, yummy and entirely too tempting! They taste like snickerdoodles,and I can't quit eating them!

When I first tried the cookie, I wasn't expecting it to be so crispy.  I didn't like it until after a few bites.  They definetly took care of my sweet tooth!  I would recommend these to any one with food allergies

For a store bought cookie, these are good. Very crunchy and a good flavor.

Even if you don't have dietary restrictions, these are worth trying.
These cookies are great!  They have a slight Tapioca flour taste, but I'm very sensitive to that.  The chocolate chip ones are even better.  Thank you Dr. Lucy for a low-calorie gluten free treat.
for those of us who can't digest gluten, finally there is a cookie that tastes delicious and is easy on the stomach!!!

These cookies are the best.  They are very crispy and taste great with a bowl of coconut milk ice cream.  The reviewer who thought they had an aftertaste or grainy texture is reacting to something I can't taste at all; these are yummier than all the wheat-based commercial sugar cookies I've tasted.

We love Dr. Lucy's cookies!  The cookies have a delightful, crisp "crunch", while maintaining the consistency of a regular cookie. I wouldn't have guessed they were gluten, milk & egg free! My son is hooked, as am I!
These cookies are delicious and great for a sweet treat if you are on Weight Watchers! However, they are expensive so I was thrilled to find them at a much more reasonable price!

I am on a gluten free diet and find most gluten free snack high in calories and fat.  These cookies are awesome. The serving size is 4 cookies, calorie count per serving is between 100 and 120 and fat is between 1 and 2. Great flavor and crunch and almost healthy.
These are the worst gluten free cookies I have ever tasted.  They were hard, dry and tasted like tapioca flour.  Avoid these at all cost.
These are hands down the best roasted and salted almonds I have had.  Addictive yet healthy!
I could live off of these! I'm not kidding. The regular salted almonds are good too, but I prefer the Smokehouse almonds.
Very tasty and great for a late night snack, a sitting at your desk snack, and/or a traveling treat . If you're not a big fan of salty treats, steer clear.
Excellent flavor which we can find no where around us locally.  Ate these as children and enjoyed them so much.  Excellent light snack.
These things taste great but the price on Amazon swings wildly (and widely) so stock up when the prices is low.

These are perfect for traveling. On the airplane when they offer you peanuts, pretzels or cookies you can take out an alternate, healthy snack. The only thing is, now I'm addicted to them, they're so good.

These are the best smoked almonds I have ever had. I remember getting these as a child on the airplane as a snack and have been searching for them for years. Finally found them and I will NEVER eat any other smoked almond. Blue diamond almonds are forever!!!
Great fresh product if you like roasted almonds.  No more frustrating attempt to buy some that match these in the grocery store. Free shipping and come to your home. Great for snacks.!

I've tried a lot of almonds out there but I always seem to come back to these. Nicely sized can and a good deal here on Amazon. Lasts me a while between purchases and saves me money too. What can I say, they're delicious.
These are good, though a bit too salty for my taste. But you can get these for about 40% less at any grocery store. Save your money!
If you like an almond this is a good product and it is cheaper than the name brand. To me this product taste the same as the name brand, I like paying less and having the same taste!
I should have been more aware of the price at local stores for this product.  Walgreens had these exact almonds for $2 less/per bag that week.  They are delicious, though.
We like these almonds and were unable to get them at our local store anymore so found them on Amazon and ordered them.
I've tried several other brands of roasted salted almonds available via the Internet and in stores.  The Blue Diamond brand is definitely the best tasting of all.
I love the portability and taste of this snack. I wish the caloric and sodium count was less, But the protein count is perfect.

smokehouse almonds are great but i just can't take all of the salt so i rub some of the salt off of them and then i go to town, if they sold lightly salted ones i would probably not only be addicted but broke as well from eating them so much love love love this product and will buy again.
great deal on these nuts. whole family loves these nuts. nuts for nuts. arrived fresh and tasty. great for a snack or packed in a lunch.

Purchased this item to try.  Had to purchase the case, I believe 3 big bottles.  It wasn't what I expected, but now I have 3 big bottles to use.  I will share at work and with my family, if I can get them to take some.

This is the best coffee I have ever had ... and I may not be a coffee expert, but I consider myself picky!  This is extremely smooth and flavorful.  I wish the price were lower & we had to sign for our package that came directly from Jamaica (hey, it is real!), but it is so worth the splurge!

Since my first trip to Jamaica, I fell in love with the coffee.  The delivery date was right on and we had Blue Mountain coffee on Christmas morning!  For a treat, try drinking it with sweetened condensed milk!

I'm a big Juan Valdez colombian fan. This Jamaican stuff doesn't have the kick that I love from coffee. It's sorta flat. Especially for something I spent $75 for two lbs. Goin Back To Colombian (twang twang)
ITS HUGE...3 Kilos...taste is not a great as I remember but still good. more strawberry taste than a lot of American jams. I would buy again in other flavors too. Great for large families.
Can't miss with this when you really want to give something special. Product famous for quality.  Delivered on schedule.  Great, practical packaging.

The steaks came well sealed and packaged and were delicious. The price was right too for the size and quality of steaks that came.  I would recommend getting this product for the gourmet food lover in your life.
The steaks are real good & for the price u can't beat it. The store you purchase this item from is very profesional, i highly recomened this store.

I ordered a box of the Omaha Steaks Top Sirloins and it was like eating shoe leather. Toughest meat I've ever had.  There was absolutely no flavor to the steak and I didn't want to waste it so I gave it to my dogs
GREAT, EXACTLY AS DESCRIBED, ARRIVED ON TIME, OR AT LEAST AS BEST AS I CAN RECALL NOW. MUST FIND ANOTHER WAY TO ORDER THIS POSTAGE OUTRAGEOUS
I found these for 1/2 the cost on the direct website with a free gift of lava cakes as well. Makes a great gift :)
Lacks the flavor I was hoping for and the price was a bit high for the satisfaction level.  I won't be ordering this again.  Live and learn.

This is so good in rice, on sushi, and miso soup.
I am making miso soup all the time now just so I can use this!

These pretzels have a good cinnamon taste and are really crunchy. They are a satisfying "good for you" snack as you can nibble on them for quite a while. Also have no trans fats or artificial flavors. Will purchase again!
These aren't clearly labeled "GLUTEN FREE". They say pretzel sticks and they do not resemble pretzel sticks very closely at all. They are a weird flavor, sort of costly and not worth it. eew.
You get 12 bags for 12.00, in each bag is about a handleful of pretzels. The taste is ok but not worth a dollar a bag..
Kay's cinnamon pretzels have great crunch and just enough sweetness. The protein/carb balance is comparable to Medifast. I love being able to buy Minnesota-made.

Love the kays naturals line.Gluten free and healthy-totally delicious!the cinnamon sticks are my favorite and the pizza flavored puffs for the savory treat. Amazing that 12 grams of protein fits in this small serving! my best find for healthy snack food.

I ordered 4 boxes (12 ea.) of the cinnamon pretzels.  I've had them before and knew I liked them. (Not so concerned about gluten.)  They sent me 1 box of pretzels and 3 boxes of cinnamon cookie bites.  I think the shipping department can do better.

These soy based pretzels are a little sweet and contain protein which makes them perfect for a mid afternoon snack.  They help cure the munchies and hold off the appetite until suppertime.  Love them and keep a constant supply on hand.

I try to follow a somewhat low carb diet and find that these pretzels fit the bill as far as satisfying my need for a carby crunch.  I really enjoy all of Kay's chips and pretzels but keep in mind that, of course, there will be textural and taste differences from the "real" thing.
That's what they taste like to me. I gave them to a friend of mine who agreed they taste like French Toast. Great high-protein snack!!
The freshness is great during the initial crunch but once the chewing and swallowing takes place, these pretzels are very earthy and grainey tasting...I have several bags you can have for free.

Great Deal, I have checked around and you have the best deal, that I have found, on the "Kay's Naturals pretzel sticks".
These are a good source of protein, crunch and great price.
thanks muchly
Since losing weight my snacks have become far and few. With these I can have low calories and high protein. I love the taste.

I have a yorkie who even after having her teeth cleaned at the vet, use to have horrible breath and hair that matted very easily. Since changing her dog food, she no longer has the horrid breath and her hair looks and feels fantastic! I will definitely buy this repeatedly- worth every penny to us!!

Really good truffle flavor. Used some in scrambled eggs this morning. And,  just ate a dinner of angel hair pasta, truffle oil, and grated asiago cheese.......heaven. At this rate, I will be ordering this again next week!

This is the best truffle oil out there. They infuse good olive oil. Beware of those who use cheap oils instead! I keep buying this. The seller ships quickly and packs well. You can trust this delicious product!
I purchased these for my wedding favors and they were a huge hit! The candied almonds were not too sweet and the mint green color is gorgeous. It was a whole lot cheaper to buy these on Amazon.
We needed more of these for wedding favors. This was one of the best prices and we got them quick. Product was good. Thank you
I'm stuck on this. Cans are better, more lemon taste but them the price is sky high on the 22oz cans I switch to this.

My husband loves this drink so we keep a pitcher of it in the fridge year 'round. It's nice to be able to buy the 24 quart size. We mix it a little light; 3 scoops (3/4 cup total) per 2 quarts of water.

On our summer vacation, I made sure to big 2 pounds of Weavers Organic Coffee with us. Because we not only can't live w/out this excellent quality coffee, but are always disappointed when we buy others at coffee stores. Vacation was a lot better w/ Weavers on us!!

Weaver's got it right with this one. Lot's of body,lots of depth. Very deep and rich in flavor and very earthy and rich in flavor yet very smooth. I particularly appreciated it's caramel finish. Truly a fine cup of coffee. One of the best.

I drink coffee black and this coffee goes down smooth.

Strong enough, yet not overpowering. Great caramel undertones. Works great anytime of the day.

My stomach is happy with it and everything comes out alright. (No, seriously, that's a huge plus.)

Grind it right before you brew it and you will have the best cup of coffee possible, if you use a permanent filter with a drip coffee machine you get the full flavor, much like you would get from a french press. Bottom line its the best blend of coffee i have had on amazon.
I LOVE weaver's coffee!!!! This is one of the best gourmet's coffee's I have had. I would recommend this coffee to any coffee lover out there!

We ordered this after having and enjoying 'the blend' for seemingly-forever.  In order to have a decent (our opinion) cup, we had to use 1.5 times the amount of coffee that we need when using 'the blend'.
I found this coffee to be fairly good but by no means outstanding. I did not detect any caramel finish. In my opinion it cost far more than its worth.

I am a coffee fanatic and drink it for the taste, all natural from a french press. I have tried many different kinds here on Amazon and can say that Weavers full bodied is truly the best with flavor that is not too bitter and not sour, you do have to know how to make it right...
This is no doubt a quality product. It smells perfect. It tastes perfect when brewed properly. I'm adding this coffee company to my subscribers list. You won't be disappointed.

Tried this coffee while working an early morning job. It was one of the best coffees I have ever tried. The flavor is warm and strong, and I left me wanting more than just one cup. I go to Starbucks all the time, and I honestly thought this coffee was better :) definitely recommend!
camerons organic velvet moon is way better. Comparing the two products this product isn't what it is hyped up to be.

I agree with the majority of reviewers in stating that this is excellent coffee, very rich but not overwhelming in the caramel flavor.  I was not familiar with the brand prior to finding this on sale, but I know I'll be ordering it again.

I have tried many different coffees and have never experienced tasting such an excellent coffee like Weaver's organic blend whole bean coffee.  It is very full-bodied and sweet.  There is no bitter after taste.  I highly recommend this coffee to anyone who loves a great cup of coffee!
An enjoyable cup of coffee. Tastes better, to me,through an aero press than a french press.Tasted better with some honey or sugar, although I usually use none.

This coffee is great!  I ordered it as a Christmas present with a new grinder and he went through a full bag of these beans in just a few short weeks and praised the quality repeatedly.  Will definitely be purchasing again.

This is absolutely the best coffee in America. Anyone who makes the effort to try this coffee will be addicted. I'm a huge proponent of french press coffee, and this stuff is BY FAR the best that way. It's beyond belief in drip as well. Try it and you'll see what I mean
We have been trying different coffee through Amazon and by far, this is the best! It has a wonderful taste. Definitely, ordering this again.

My girlfriend can rarely have caffeine because of her heart but she can't help but always have a little cup when I make a pot of weavers organic blend. The French roast is worth a try but I must say my absolute favorite is the organic blend! its taste is unchallenged by others.

its not that this coffee sucks its that it doesn't begin to measure up to all the hoopla!
its well balanced but thats about it
& even a little old tasting nothing special in the least
what sweet caramel finish?
can't believe this is the same coffee the 5 star reviews are about

Woooowwww ! The ORGANIC BLEND is probably the best thing I have ever tasted. When I opened the bag and the aroma filled the room, everyone just freaked out.
I would say The Organic Blend is the BEST ! And not just because NBC TODAY show said so..... ;)
It's not an amazing tea. It's an "okay" tea. I buy regular green tea at asia market for way cheaper price and I get same result. I look for saving money. Will not repurchase.
Great Product At a awesome price! I've been drinking this product from early May and the health benefit are great .
I am the aunt to 4 dogs and they visit me for sleepovers - I always try to have treats they like and this was no exception!  They kept coming back for more :-)
DOGS LOVE THEM.  They are the perfect treat to put in the kennel with them when I have to leave.
My large Corgi mix loves these. They are great as treats and/or crumbled and mixed in with his food. Found these to be much cheaper than at my local store.
Most dogs love these but our dog was less than pleased.  He is a tad persnickety.  It is a good product with few calories. Great for training purposes.
The Merrick Lamb Filet Squares are the best treat I have found for my dogs. All of my dogs love them. They are hard to find on the shelf as they are so popular they are often sold out at the stores.
This was gross. It lamb lund & smelled bad. There hard chips. My dogs Favorite is the Texas Taffy. Thats a winner. I cut it into peices. she LOVES THEM.

A friend of mine recommended these chocolate nibs and I love them. They arrived promptly and undamaged. And most importantly, the price was great!
:)
What can I say? If you love anise bears as much as I do then you understand why I buy several packages at a time. I recommend you do the same!
I order a vast quantity of this sugar about twice a year.  We use it on everything. Actually, once you start using raw sugar, white sugar falls short in the taste department.

I've always like Sugar-in-the-Raw but it is usually too expensive. Amazon has this priced very reasonably and I've been buying it regularly. I also try to avoid any food with hi-fructose corn syrup, and this sugar is what I like.

This is one of the best combination of flavors! I keep thinking my family and I will get tired of having this on ... everything! Try it on every type of fish, salad, pot stickers, and any tofu dish. Enjoy! Great delivery service by the way!

I tried this special sauce on grilled salmon and grilled chicken. It is simply awesome, though not cheap, and I can't find anything better. Yummy.

RH
St. Louis, MO

This is an excellent addition to sweet wines, and champagne glasses ;)  Especially if you are a newbie wine drinker, trying to learn to love it... this seals the deal!  Sooooo good!!  Friends of mine that normally don't care for wine, also loved this!
These are the BEST Pumpkin Pie Bars ever!  Impossible to find in my area, so checked on Amazon & there they were!  We will have a VERY Happy Thanksgiving this year - this is our dessert!
But I coulnd't get it delivered for Xmas - I was penalized because I didn't proscratinate.

I loved the packs with the flavors, except the chocolate covered. They were horribly melted into one great big discolored glob. Figures, with temps over 100 in SoCal everyday during the summer. I can't blame anyone. It is what it is.
These coffee beans are excellent! Got them within a week, great considering they ship from Costa Rica! They have the perfect chocolate to bean ratio!

This tea is a nice change from my regular black tea. I'm not big on the taste of herbal teas so this was a good choice. It's closer to black but has it's own special taste, which I found myself looking forward to. Great in the evening as it doesn't contain caffeine.
These are tasty enough for an emergency snack/lunch--I keep a few in my file cabinet. But our local Meijer's sells them for $1.33 apiece. Even the discount price here is twice that.

I love this stuff! I am currently deployed in Afghanistan and working extremely long hours.  I keep these delicious little kits in the office and in my wall locker in my sleeping area.  They have saved me many times when I couldn't leave to get a complete meal in the dining facility. Love them!
We love Trader Joe's Just the Clusters Vanilla Almond Granola Cereal but were very disappointed with the quantity we recived for the price charged.  As a result, we returned same.

I have purchased many porcini mushrooms in grocery and gourmet stores. These were the best quality (flavor and shape). The price was excellent as well. I added some to a fresh mushroom soup I made and got an incredible depth of flavor. Have also used them in braised beef dishes.

I have been buying mushrooms from JR Mushrooms for over a year now. I have ordered maybe 5 times. Service, delivery and quality are always number 1! I highly recommend this company and their products.
Trevor

Excellent rich flavor and the mushrooms were freshly dried. Based on the spores under a microscope, were these 100 percent Boletus edulis?
Rick
These were fair.  I don't feel they are AA quality.  Would not repurchase.
One of my most favorite things to eat is a soft pretzel. I enjoy going to the movies just so I can eat a soft pretzel! These soft pretzels are awesome! I will definitely order more in the future.

There are no pretzels that compare!
I like putting salt on them and putting them in the toaster until crunchy on the outside and soft in the middle. Sometimes I'll have them with mustard, but that isn't even needed because they taste so good!!!
Purchased for lemonade diet and it was more than enough for me and my wife while on the cleanse for 25 days... excellent deal for the price paid

This has got to be one of the Best holiday coffee's available. I am so hooked but now cannot locate it anywhere....If anyone has the chance to try this you will love it, so definatly buy it while you can.

I enjoy the flavor of this very delicious soft peach candy.  It has definitely become one of my all time favorite candies.  The other flavors that this seller makes are also good but the peach flavor ranks #1 in my book.
I was looking for the old fashion in,heavy syrup Apricots,but this as close as I've found.I just add a quarter cup of sugar and cool or freeze it and enjoy. Yum!

These apricots are just great. They are full of flavor but not too sweet. There are about 8 to 9 halves to a can.

There was a problem with some severely dented cans but as usual, Amazon made it right.

If you are looking for a pick me up--these Apricot halves
by Libby's are so refreshing. The Apricots must have been picked and canned at exactly the right time. The texture is great, they are so tasty and they are not heavy on your tummy. They are one of my favorite items to snack on at night.

This product is a waste of money! It is bitter bitter and salty salty. Save your money and by the peaches instead.Libby's Unpeeled Apricot Halves in Pear Juice From Concentrate, 15-Ounce Cans (Pack of 12)
this mustard is called brown but it is identical to what other company's label as black.  good quality delivered in small bags.
I can no longer buy this in my area so was thrilled to find it on Amazon.  It is one of my favorite breath mints which I keep in various places around my home as well as in both of my cars.
Very good gum - flavor doesn't last a long time but I still love it.  The peppermint is my favorite.

I have purchased many porcini mushrooms in grocery and gourmet stores. These were the best quality (flavor and shape). The price was excellent as well. I added some to a fresh mushroom soup I made and got an incredible depth of flavor. Have also used them in braised beef dishes.

I have been buying mushrooms from JR Mushrooms for over a year now. I have ordered maybe 5 times. Service, delivery and quality are always number 1! I highly recommend this company and their products.
Trevor

Excellent rich flavor and the mushrooms were freshly dried. Based on the spores under a microscope, were these 100 percent Boletus edulis?

These are from China and nowhere as good as those from Italy. Spend the extra money and get those from Italy.
I am happy with my purchase. The mushrooms are mostly whole and have a quality shroomy smell to them (not old and dusty in other words).

This cake mix can not be beat for making muffins. I have purchased this locally for years and the resturant supply who carried it discontinued it. I tried several different recipes and cake mixes, nothing compared to Ghiradelli! So glad I can still get it online ar Amazon. Wonderful stuff!

Amazon pirated my personal image for their listing. It is not a stock image.  I created it and put my website name on it...LooneyStuff.com...for use on my website. I have asked them to take my image down from this listing.

I love Jolt and can remember when I use to be able to get it at just about every gas station. But now its harder to find. So happy when I found it on amazon, and its still awesome as always! Can't wait until they get more in stock!
Great product, exactly as expected.  Actually arrived in plastic containers, not the bags as shown - a definite and appreciated upgrade.

The pretzels are really good butI think the box of pretzels could be packed alittle better or the carrier who delivers could be more careful. Many of the pretzel rods were broken in half with some in small pieces.
The two plastic barrels wre partially crushed.
This is something I was looking for the office. They were affordable and great taste! They arrive on time too!
My absolute favorite. Very cherry indeed. This is the only jelly bean I enjoy. Guess I will have to order more. Thay lasted no time with the grandkids, lol
These are good. I made the hamburger/sauce up and froze it in three parts. I only use part at a time when I'm really hungry and too lazy to cook. They are good.
Taco Bell scores on this one. The flour tortillas are not too thin and not too thick, just right. Makes it easy to put a meal on the table really fast.

I purchased Bob's Red Mill 12 Grain Pancake/Waffle mix and gosh dernit a small waffle iron. I prefer a stronger maple syrup and this is a great buy from Anderson's. If you don't see any reviews in the next couple of weeks, it will be due to sticky maple syrup fingers and possible carb overload.

It is not Vermont Maple Syrup. I am originally from upstate NY and grew up with
the Vermont Maple Syrup and I am used to it. This syrup lacks that little tang(for lack of a better word) that the Vermont Syrup has. It does come in second tho.

I had been buying Trader Joe's Grade B for about the same price.  TJ is kind of a drive so I used the prime and this is far superior.  Used Alton Brown's recipe for buttermilk pancakes from scratch, added blueberries and this syrup capped off a great breakfast.

I've had quite a few different Grade B maple syrups over the years and this brand is my favorite. Rich maple flavor and nice thick texture. Love this syrup on buckwheat waffles and pancakes. Highly Recommended!
There is nothing like real maple syrup.  Grade B is the highest quality syrup.  Will definately order this product again.  Price is good too for this quality.
We just tried the wonderful Maple syrup. We love it! Thanks to Andersons and hope they keep up the good work. Just ordered another one. Excellent.
I buy it over and again and keep it on hand because I have never had any maple syrup that is any better for the price. And even spending a lot more money has never delivered me any better product.

Anderson's Pure Maple syrup is wonderful!!  So thick and oh so delicious.  The only problem is that I did the super savers deal and than they didn't have enough, kinda frusterating b/c I really do love this syrup.

I am willing to buy every time I run out.

Also, found it cheaper in a store; so won't purchase online anymore .
I like the syrup.  What more can I say. I like it.. I like it. I like it. I like it.

Tasty Syrup, but I was walking the aisle at my local superstore and found the exact same product for $3 less. And I don't live anywhere near vermont. Ah well - its still great stuff! And my pancakes thank me.
Delicious and the best price I could find! No more buying the syrup at stores for half the size and the same price.

I tried ordering these from Amazon for the first time. I worried that getting 6 cans at once was a little over the top, but my family of three consumed them within two weeks.  These have a great flavor, and are a great snack. I will order them again and again...
these are the best green olives on the planet. i buy cases of these. they are well over 4.50 at some stores. i get them here when they are avail.

at $12 for 2.1 ounces, no wonder one can't pull up the bag to see details.
Like $80 per pound!

A recipe in Cooking Light recommended that Potato Starch be added to cupcakes, cakes, etc. when you reduce the amount of butter.  It worked well and I would recommend this company.  They had a fast ship and well packaged.
I was thinking 1 lb would be a lot more than what it actually came out to be. Especially since starch is somewhat light, and since it was $8. I wish they sold this in larger quantities.

Learning to cook Gluten Free is difficult.  I especially like bread and have been experimenting with this product to mix a flour that is like my mother's.  So far it is an experiment, but I couldn't do without it.
They may have great products, but shipping is incredibly slow (shipped 12 days after I placed the order; not yet received) and the shipping price is unreasonable.

We used to buy this pasta regularly at our local supermarkets, but a few years ago it just vanished...  We were very glad to stumble upon it on Amazon, and the transaction was, as usual, perfectly fine.

Discovered this pasta years ago in Canada. Love it, but so hard to find consistently in US stores.

This is the second time that I have bought from this seller. Excellent service from start to receipt.
Great to send to my son, a college student.  Easy to fix and very tasty.

DONT BE FOOLED - This is not a Health Cereal.
The second ingredient is SUGAR and this cereal also has fructose in it. I feel like I'm eating kid cereal. It would be healthy if it had less sugar in it. Carb-conscious people and diabetics BEWARE.

Really tasty cereal, amazing packaging (way to go Amazon; the boxes were in better shape than at the store). Sometimes the cereal seems a bit too sweet. It's nice that I can get so much fiber from this, but one has to be careful not to eat too much haha.

LOVE, LOVE, LOVE this cereal!  It tastes like a caramel version of cinnamon toast crunch.  All Fiber One products are great!  Not like other fiber products that taste like cardboard!  Get your daily fiber with a product that is actually delicious.  Highly recommend.

I bought this -- just one box, not a six-pack -- on sale at a store. I can't believe how easy it is to get your fiber if you eat this cereal. Most cereals don't have even half this much fiber in them.
I ENJOY A BRAKFAST CEREAL IN THE MORNING.THIS IS GREAT STUFF. WITH THIS I ADD LOW FAT VANILLA MILK, FRUIT AND NUTS. IT IS A DELICIOUS COMBINATION. ADDITIONALLY, IT IS HEALTHY IN KEEPING ME REGULAR.
I really enjoy this cereal, it's really sweet so I mix it with the unsweetened fiber one original. And a great price!

I used to only like Fiber One honey cluster, but now I love it more. I like the texture. However, it is a little sweet for me, but don't get me wrong. It is just me and it is only 11g of sugar per serving.

The product is great as a cereal or snack.  It's a very tasty and convenient way to get extra fiber in your diet. Problem occurred when only one 15.6 ounce box was shipped, but I was billed for the 4 pack.  Customer Service quickly addressed the issue, but I discontinued the "auto ship".
This cereal packs a punch.  It has a tremendous amount of fiber yet tastes like a delicious "regular" cereal.  My 3 and 5 year old boys love it!
The best in fiber, as crunchy flakes.  Great as is or topped with fruit plus added skim milk or yogurt and you have a fresh start to your day!
Even my children love this cereal... very similar to a cinnamon toast cereal that is out there.
if you like caramel. and you also want a low-fat, filling, high fiber & tasty snack, this is perfect for you. i love these bars!
This is the best jelly I've ever had. You get rose petal from every small bite of the jelly, and it's not overwhelmingly sweet. Taste so rosy!

This mustard was given to me by a client. This is truly the best Dijon mustard I have ever had!  I highly recommend it. I put it on literally everything. The other night my husband and I slathered it onto steaks. Delicious!

We were pleased with this salt. It's actually more salty than regular salt, even kosher salt or sea salt.  A little bit goes a long way!  I don't usually cook with it, but add it to things afterwards. I've been hand grinding it.

This is a great salt; it has a wholesome flavor and, I noticed it doesn't make you thirsty or rise the blood pressure as regular salt does. That's the benefit of the natural balance of minerals in it. I would recommend this to friends and health conscious people.
This salt is so pink and taste like the ocean, I love it. Make sure to buy a grinder of some sort if you plan to use it on salads or sprinkle on cold dishes.

I love pink himalayan salt! It is loaded with minerals and taste great.  I don't have to use as much as the conventional table salt and I don't feel bad about using it because I know that it's also really good for my body.

The product has far fewer pink crystals than shown in the picture, which is perfectly fine with me.  The salt is coarse, excellent for salt mills.  It tastes great and the size is what I wanted and haven't been able to find elsewhere.  The price and service is excellent, as well.
I bought Himalayan Organic Salt twice. Each time, quality was really good and service was fast and courteous (The Spice Lab's). I will buy it again.

I was very pleased with the Himalayan salt. It really does taste much better than ordinary salt and you can actually taste some of the other minerals in it. I would describe it like licking a salty rock, but in a good way. Very pleased and will be buying more.

I have never ordered sea salt before. i thought this was great. I was afraid it would have some additional flavor that I wouldnt like. Instead it was fresh tasting & natural. I like the pink color, but glad it doesnt come out pink.
This salt has a slightly earthy taste. It is moderately coarse. I bought a ceramic grinder for when I would like to have it a little finer. I love this salt!

Great salt! Though now that I know how great it is I will have to buy a bigger bag next time. Mixed with some epsom salt and essential oils this makes a great bath salt. Ground up a bit finer it is wonderful for cooking. Will certainly buy again.

I had been told that Himalayan salt was much better for you.  After shopping around, I found the best deal was through Amazon.  It came in a heavy resealable bag and works great in my salt mill.  I would buy this again and recommend it to my friends.

I use this salt very liberally now especially after finding out that its table salt you really need to avoid.  Our bodies need salt to live and this is the purest kind out there.  I plan to make this salt a part of my regular diet.

I love this salt!!  The delivery was quick, the price was reasonable and the salt imparts a wonderful flavor to everything I eat!  And, it doesn't burn my tongue!  I will be using this salt for ever more!
I absolutely love this salt.  The flavor is awesome and at a great price.  No more box salt for me.

I discovered this salt about 2 years ago and have not looked back. I love it. The Spice Lab gives you a high quality product for a great price. It is hard to describe Himalayan salt - you get more salty goodness without using so much. It is delicious!
Great buy!  Fantastic taste and pleasing pink hue from the iron content.  I prefer a grinding salt, and this one is unprocessed for it's better for you.
Can't tell it is any different than normal salt, except for a slight pink tinge. But if it has all the great minerals and stuff... all the better!

This salt is great and way cheaper than any of the local spice shops. It does seem more difficult to grind than other himilayan salts I have tried, but doing a little at a time makes it well worth it. Would i buy it again?? YES
this is a fine example of mineral-rich himalayan salt. The packaging also keeps it fresh. It comes in a zip-seal pouch.
Fast service and item was exactly as described. Would purchase from this seller again. They even sent along more information on this salt and others as well as sent me some samples.
This is my kids favorite of the salts at the moment.  I like it too, and will keep it in my collection. Great deal also, and great company to do business with.

I got this for work, as I am a cook. Everyone noticed that I have had a change in the flavors of my food. They said it was a good change. Personally I have enjoyed useing the salt in different foods. I do like it very much.
We grind our salt/pepper/spices fresh and this is out salt of choice.  It's milder than regular table salt, which allows for more precise control of how salty you want your foods.
i put it in a glass jar for chow watmore ken i talk about it is pink salt i resifet it fest

Actually typed in "smoked paprika". This showed up so I ordered it and it is definatly NOT smoked!  Also, these bottles sell for 4.95 at Sam's. So, not only was it the wrong item but, I over paid also!
This is regular Paprika you buy in the grocery store. Its good and a great price.
For a friend who loves jellies and turtles . He said they were soft and chewy just the ways he likes them and even though they were his favourite animal he couldn't stop eating em .

Not much of a lemon flavor for lemon cookies, more on the sweet side.  Coconut is listed in the ingredients, but you certainly won't taste it.  My son liked them, so they won't go to waste.  I would not buy them again.
I love to have the vanilla mix 1 for breakfast or after s run...it took me forever to find a drink that was both lactose and soy free....my tummy LOVE'S. Mix 1!

So much better than other protein products in drugstores or even GNC. Taste great and doesn't fill up like other shakes do so you can work out after quickly. Relatively cheap for all the good things you get with it.

Love this Coffee!  If you like a strong, dark, rich tasting cup of coffee this coffee is for you.  Another plus is that this coffee is easy on the stomach (not too acidic).  I will be coming back to Amazon for more.
It's all cayenne and not authentic bebere. way too spicy, threw it out and made my own.

I discovered this hot sauce while traveling around in Belize, it's on most tables in a lot of restaurants.  It has a lovely tang from the grapefruit, and is not tongue burning off hot, but a pleasing gentle heat.  I am never without!
my finicky cats wouldn't eat this food so I gave it to my neighbor who rescues cats so the food wouldn't go to waste...

I was searching for a source of pure vanilla, without any fillers, but without the hassle of the vanilla bean.
This ground vanilla is amazing. No fillers, easy to use, amazing taste and aroma.
I will be purchasing this again!

These seeds are on the edge of their sell by date. (11/11)  Not very good for the small scale gardener who wants to save some for next year.  Germination rates are at about 1/4.  Too early to tell much about the plants, but I will update again if they do well.

I come from a family of professional gardeners and I cannot grow plants to save my life. These seeds however did get started and actually grew a few inches...... however the rabbits in our garden thought the plants very tasty so clearly there is nothing wrong with the product ...it's the gardener!
After Oberto cocktail pepperoni, no other will do.  It keeps well, and is a great low carb snack for the Atkins dieter.  I also like the large 32 ounce bag Amazon has available.

Ordered these for my diet. They are high in protein and only 140 calories per stick. They are great for a meal replacement as one stick will fill you up and keep you full for a long time. I have my stick during lunch at 11:30 with a glass of water and I am not hungry until dinner time at 5:30.
You can't find these bad boys in Kentucky, so i usually have my mom ship me a bag every now and then. Thank goodness you can buy these online.... now I don't have to talk to my mom as much!!!

My kids enjoy The Cocktail Pepsticks so iI buy them and send them to my kids

Oh Boy! Oberto Cocktail Pepperoni (2.8-Pound) Sticks, 45-Count Bag

This cocktail pep is absolutely the best there is. I live somewhere that it is not sold in stores, so I am constantly buying different types of pepperoni to substitute for Oberto's Cocktail Pepperoni and none of the many that I have tried have even come close.
My son is in MCC in Washington State, he received these items, and so far, no complains.
Delicious pepperoni!  Been buying Oberto since 1961.  Just wish we could find these large packages in the stores.
Vendor provided quick service and a fresh product packaged securely.  The O Boy Oberto Cocktail Pep tasted just the way I remembered.

Oh boy, Oberto!!!!!!!! Love those pepperoni sticks!!!!!
It is nice to get a BIG supply. I just wish they lasted longer!

My dad introduced me to these things when I was kid. We used to eat them all the time on opening day of the trout season, or deer hunting up in the cascades. My brother always calls them "heart attack in a bag" even though he can't stop eating them. They really are that good!

I've been eating these since the early 80s. They are my favorite brand of all time. It seems they are getting impossible to find even from Oh Boy Oberta. My package arrived today and they are as fresh as the day from the factory...meaning well preserved and soft. I hope I can find more.

I really enjoyed the smoked sausages, it took me nearly 3 weeks to finish. But I would definitely purchase this again.

Oh Boy! Oberto Cocktail Pep Smoked Sausage Sticks, 3.8-Pound Package

So tasty they didn't last much longer than a week.

I was hoping for the thicker pep logs, but these hit the spot. I'll be ordering more until I can find a source for the larger ones outside of gas stations.
I have always liked Oberto sausage and these short bite sized links are very handy.

I've never had any qualms with the Oberto brand and this is an excellent deal, especially as a gift subscription! $12 every two months and my dad has an essentially limitless supply of Oberto Cocktail Pepperoni. This stuff tastes so good too, I may have to steal some from him...
O BOY Oberto  pep sticks and sausage sticks are the best I buy them when I get to Seattle

I love these cookies!  They are just perfect for an 'on the go' breakfast bite paired with a piece of fruit.
These cookies have good taste, ar a great quick breakfast, and are healthy.  I'll have one with a cup of coffee and I'm good for the morning.
The cookies tasted too much like baby food prunes to be any good.  Also they included directions to freeze them when they arrived to keep them from spoiling.  I would never buy these again.
Not Kosher!!! Ignore the Symbol!!! They are NOT Kosher and NOT certified by any company!!! I contacted the company to confirm.
The breakfast cookie is not to my liking and I do not think I will order them in the future!

I was disappointed by my first taste of Kopali Organics Chocolate Covered Dried Banana. The chocolate is waxy and the bananas too soft for me. I was expecting more crunch, a drier banana. The banana did not taste of banana to me either. I will not purchase again.
It clearly states on the description, pack of 6!  But I only got 5!  And I cannot find how to complain about this.  I don't want to return.

I don't buy my walnuts anywhere else. These taste great and are a fantastic price. I put most of them in the freezer and pull them out as I need them in order to ensure they stay fresh since 4 tubs lasts me quite a while.
I GET THESE NUTS FOR MY CHURCH SISTER WHO DOES NOT HAVE  A COMPUTER. SHE ACTUALLY EATS THEM EVERY DAY, WHICH IS INCLUDED IN HER DIET.

Sesmark makes a very high quality rice cracker and then proceeds to ruin it by loading it up with so much salt as to make it inedible.  USE CAUTION before buying this item since there are NO RETURNS and you might find yourself with a throw away.
My entire family loves these crackers.  Great with cheese.  Delicious alone too.
These crackers are great, too! Again, especialy for people who can't tolerate wheat! Others like them, too!  They stay crunchy.  You save money buying by the case.
These crackers are very addictive! The flavor is superb and the crunch is great.
If you are gluten-free and want crackers, this is the one for you.  It is also delicious.  This is my second order of these.

And that's part of the problem. No, really, I can eat just a few, maybe more later.
These thins are not quite as thin as I'd prefer (nor am I), but make a good snack. For hors d'oeuvres, if you top them with anything moist, do a few at a time; they get soggy pretty fast.

These are great! Seriously. They kind of remind me of corn nuts. They are crunchy, light, a tiny bit salty and totally tasty. I just got them today and can't stop eating them. I very much suggest getting these. Pretty good price and so much better than the rice crackers at my local store.

Sesame Rice Thins are the BEST tasting rice crackers I have tried - and I've tried several.  They stay crispy and crunchy and come in several flavors.  You won't be disappointed.  Amazon has the best price, too!
These are my favorite gluten-free crackers and they come in many flavors.  I have tried and liked most of them.
Crispy with the light flavor of rice and sesame.  Lightly salted.  I love these crackers.
As good as any in grocery stores and more reasonably priced.  But, you do have to get a carton of them.
I have to eat a gluten free diet and these crackers are the best I have come across.  I eat them with cheese or hummus.  Very good!!
There is no other brand is comparable to this brand.  Whoever I gave the crackers to, would become addicted.  I keep order them over and over again.

I ordered 2 cases as always. Rvc'd the 2 cases and the crackers were saltless, tastless. Amazon was kind to send 2 more cases and they were the same. BLAH! I have written the masnufacturer to let them know.
Amazon has greta customer care.
These bars are great, however, this item can be purchased for 7.49 at Sams Club.  Same box
These taste terrific and my grandkids call them candy bars and consider them a special treat!  They prefer the chocolate chip - I love the dark chocolate almond!

For the longest time they would not ship this to APOs. I don't know why. Maybe they were afraid the yummy super bubble gum would fall into the hands of the enemy. Get flavor and one piece works. I chew gum every day in the gym because I grind my teeth when lifting. helps alot.
I've purchaesed twice so far and in both boxes the gum was really hard.  Product is great, but I wouldn't purchase again through amazon due to it being so hard to chew.
I am addicted to Super Bubble Bubble Gum. I ordered four boxes and was very pleased with the promptness, packaging, and product.
Simply the best dates I've ever had. All natural, no preservatives or sugars (surprised? Some dates have added sugars). I stopped buying any other dates once I discovered those.

It did not really taste like much, so I was able to add sauce without interrupting the flavor, however I could not get past the texture. I'd rather chew on rubber bands.
I would like to try this, however I do not see anything that says exactly what this product is made of, did I miss something? They only say what it is not! Would really like to know.

this is a delicious tea, light and sweet with no aftertaste.  I highly recommend it to any tea drinkers who want a black tea, but one that is not too strong or bitter.  Needs no additional sweetening.

I love this stuff.  I tried it earlier this summer while on Cape Cod and immediately had to go find some upon returning home!  It is like drinking chocolate!  It is dutch chocolate mixed with red wine.  mmmm.  New fave!

The shipment was Prime but arrived in 5 days instead of 2.

I am a coffee fiend and this was surprisingly good for the price.  I accidently bought the ground instead of the bean but it was very fresh and more of an espresso grind.

It arrived in great condition. It was a gift for my 13 year old son. It already has lots of new baby green leaves on it. Excellant product and great price.

I've never had a bonsai before and was unsure where to go. I purchased the Japanese Juniper starter kit and when it arrived I was thrilled. Everything I needed was there and the instructions are very clear. The tree is very healthy and never showed any signs of stress. Thank You Eve's Garden!

This is a great intro to Bonsai for beginners.  Product arrived in excellent condition.  Nice packaging. Quality product.  I placed a second order from Eve's Garden immediately folowing this one.

I got my Bonsai tree a day before the said date. It seems a bit roughed up because the accessories inside seemed to have got disorientated inside the box but nonetheless, all is there and intact. It seems of good quality also, thanks! :)

The Bonzai I ordered came well before the estimated date...

however... the tree I got as a gift was TINY. Nothing like it looks like in the product picture.

These flavors are so realistic! The rotten egg and sprout flavors almost made me vomit! now when i think of the rotten egg, i feel dizzy. The cake, roasted marshmallow, and cherry ones are SO good though! i would recomand this to anyone!
P.S. try the black ones!

If you are looking for proper nutrition cereal. This one is the best, period.  Low sugar and calorie. High fiber and protein.  What more can one ask for.  Add low fat milk and some frozen fruit and you have a perfect breakfast.  I wish I could buy it in bulk.

You won't believe how good this "health food" cereal tastes! Not only is it loaded with protein and low in sugar, it has a fabulous crunch that doesn't get soggy. And it's sweet but not too much so. I just bought another six boxes today, because my kids keep eating it up. Highly recommended!
This some good sausage seasoning, has a great garlic taste, I use half the recommended seasoning on a 10lb mix and its just right for me. Great product

Just had a can of these and wanted to confirm the great quality of this product. Excellent taste and three big sardines barely fitting into the can. I'll get more ...

The taste is bitter, the smell is atrocious, and they are not naturally smoked.  "Aqueous natural smoke" is a chemical stew injected into the fish.  For anyone thinking these are the real thing, all I can say is 'there is a sucker born every minute.'

I ordered this after returning from Turkey where they served this to the tourists (me) who were shopping in their stores. Not a traditional Turkish drink - one developed to keep the tourists going (high in sugar) and happy. It worked while I was there, I bought a lot. Chocolate and Art Lover
Great tea just like in Turkey.Easy to mix and prepare. My wife thinks it's a little sweet. I love it

I bought cherry, lime and lemon flavors...all are wonderful. Not too hard and not too soft and with a perfect amount of sugar on them. I'll be back for more soon!
