we pace the floor when stewed chicken is not available.  This is baby dogs favorite food mixed with chef michaels dry chicken kibble.  He loves this to distraction.  Never seems to get tired of it.

This is the best decaf around and it is Free Trade too.  We first found it when we were spending a week near Invermere and were thrilled to find it on Amazon.

I've been ordering the Kicking Horse decaf, along with the Three Sisters regular blend, for over a year now - it's great coffee, and arrives fresh and fast.  Much better deal than buying the little 12 oz bags in coffee shops!
I love this coffee!  It has very good flavor for decaf.  I have been looking for a good decaf coffee because i've been trying to give up caffeine - and this is the best one I have found so far.

thick rich and a taste thats as good as most traditional nogs.

Great taste, inexpensive and easy to store with no going sour. No cholesterol to worry about. The shipping was speedy. Satisfactory transaction. Would purchase this brand again. Would also purchase from Amazon unless they allow pedophiles to sell books again.
Wish I could get this on auto-ship.  Wonderful product, wonderful flavor and wonderful to be able to have it whenever we want!!!

that has a problem getting aroundl

I have large breed dogs and these are a great way to add valuable joint supplements to their day. They are their favorite treats, too!

my shelties love these treats and their breed is known to have hip problems, so happy hips is always on hand in our household.

These treats are the best!  I break them into smaller pieces and use as training treats.  I would recommend dogswell to anyone.  My dogs LOVE these and the chicken jerky.  I love them because they do not cause any digestive "issues"...

My dog (a greyhound), loves these treats. Seems like these have really spoiled him, he rarely eats his other treats now. As for how good these are for him, I really have no idea. Other than him not eating his other treats, there's been no notable difference. He's just as lazy as he was before.

our dog is 14 years old and this product is part of an arthritic regiment and it is WONDERFUL she walks like she 6 yrs old.

The best chocolate that I have ever eaten. Arrived in perfect condition. If there would be more stars - it deserves them all.
Love it.

These bars are huge! The price is phenomenal for the amount and quality of chocolate and nuts.
I'm glad that I went for the quantity to get the best deal. I can always put a couple bars in the freezer.
Huge Chocolate bars would be similar to 5 regular chocolate bars and twice as thick, a bargain at the price really. The best tasting chocolate I have ever had.

you can never be disappointed by Lindt. Especially their Hazelnut ones.

this one has full hazelnuts in it. crazily delicious. got to try

What can I say....Luscious milk chocolate, melt in your mouth ecstasy, with yummy crunchy hazelnuts.....10.5 ounces of pleasure!  Even better than that, a five pack, with FREE SHIPPING! That's the cheapest price I have found anywhere!

This is good smooth harissa.
This brand is the most commonly found in France and my Moroccan Grandma was swearing by it.
I would get a lot more if the shipping charge were not so ridiculous!

I love this sauce, I saw it from the food network and found it at Amazon.  can't stand the shipping charge, the sauce itself is cheap though.  I rubbed it on stake, I can taste tomato and garlic with heat in it, it was sooooo good!
I love the tubes of hrissa!  There is much less waste and the flavor is just as wonderful as the same product in the cans.
These miniature hersheys are delicious, PERIOD. Very satisfying for a Diabetic, as well, although not a low calorie snack and fairly expensive.
I have tried several different types of sugar-free chocolates and this is one of the worst.  Instead, I recommend the Dove dark chocolate and the Russell Stover coconut.

I began purchasing this coffee at a small boutique coffee shop not far from where I live.  Now I have 5 lbs. of it delivered to my door on a predetermined schedule.  Life's good!  The coffee is amazing, only for you die hard coffee drinkers though.
I like these. They are not gas-producing and they hold shape OK for canned beans. Flavor is good. Love that they don't have added salt.
I made a vegan burrito and it tasted almost like burrito, but the more I made this recipe, the less appetite I became with this bean. I guess it's good once in a while..
We've had great success with all of the cashews we've tried. In doing the work as far as our best buy, the (4)16oz are a better buy than these at 21oz pack of 2.
great product  fresh and delivered on time  will buy again  k

5 stars for the product. But how can Target with all the overhead that Amazon doesn't have sell cashews at a lower price? Okay, if you add sales tax the price difference narrows. Still, why buy from here when Target has a better price, even including sales tax?

I just bought the same two items at my local store for
less, except they were not marked value pack.

These are pleasantly sweet with a nice vanilla/cinnamon flavor.
They are good for eating but not for making pie crusts. I won't
be buying them again as they are too expensive for the amount
of product you get. Shame because I really liked them.

These are a good cookie. I was hoping for something lighter but in all they had a good taste but no real crunch. Unfortunately just about every cracker arrived broken or nearly smashed. Perhaps we will add them to vanilla ice cream.....

I ordered these to make s'mores. I liked the ingredient list, no HFCS. However, they come more like a box of Wheat Thins.
They are not large enough for s'mores, and many of them are broken upon arrival.
They do taste good though, as a sweet snack.
Very delicious! Made with butter so the caramel taste is excellent! The nuts are the topping on the cake! Yummy!
I was thrilled when I found, Walkers Brazil Nut Toffee, online at a good price. This brought back good memories, as it was a favorite of my Dad. I will be buying more. Highly recommend this toffee.

These peanuts are so far superior to the ones in the supermarket, there is no comparison. Once you taste them, you won't go back.
Really delicious.
The best peanuts I have ever purchased, tasted, or served.  Shipments are always fresh and the company offers several flavors.

Are you living to Eat or eat to live type of guy?
Well, if you'r either then you're just lame.
I....WE are all Eat Peants forever mofo types.

So, buy these peanuts. And get down with the
Eat Peanuts forever mofo type, mofo.

The peanuts were of average quality. They were large enough and salted properly, but they were hardly crisp. In my opinion, they are still better than those that you will find in a supermarket, but nothing really exciting.
Nothing spectacular here. Unlike the other reviewers, I found mine fairly salty. I think I'll try other brands before considering buying this again.
I think that these are the best peanuts I have ever tasted.  Just enought salt and most of the nuts are still whole.

I moved from Michigan to Georgia and had not be able to locate Fontinella Cheese. I found it on Amazon, have since ordered it several times!  The cheese was mailed from Parthenon Foods.  And where better to get cheese from than Wisconsin!  Thanks Amazon and Parthenon Foods!
I've always used Knorr Bearnaise Sauce, but lately couldn't find it anywhere, so I ordered it online.  Great taste, fast shipping.
Low carb, no sugar, and delicious.  They satisfy a sweet tooth and just one will suppress any feelings of hunger for several hours.  A good substitute if you're used to snacking.
I love these - they taste great.  But I get them in the local Dollar Store. Two stars for the value, five for taste.
It isnt even wroth being sugar free. my stomach is aching and I am getting so much gas. I would rather stick with the normal werthers. I cant believe i bought 12 bags of this crap...
I eat these whenever I feel the urge to "snack". It's really satisfies any cravings and does not have an after taste.

I think these taste pretty good. There are lots of nuts & and a few raisins in these slightly bigger than bite sized cookies. You get 54 cookies for the price, so it is sort of pricey but they use quality ingredients so it is probably worth it.

The Old Fashioned Raisin Walnut cookies are a delicious soft cookie, very simlar to the Archway soft cookies I used to eat in both texture and flavor. I wish Pamela's made a date filled, that would be perfect! I have to be careful with these or I will eat a whole box in on sitting.
I have been using this product for years and was happy to find it on line since our local place (Bristol Farms) had closed.  I love it especially in my salad dressings.

I absolutely cannot be without my Spike - it is my one essential seasoning and I use it on almost everything.  Buying it in bulk is cost effective and insures that even when I can't find it in the stores, I'll never run out.

I have used Spike as a seasoning for many years, and when I moved to NY, started using cheaper brands that were convenient.  However, I have never like them, and decided to go back to Spike simply because the flavors it brings to my food are so much better>
Want a seasoning you can put on EVERYTHING?  Spike seasoning is absolutely one of the best things out there since buttered bread :)  Very, very good :)
Very happy I made this purchase.  It is exactly what you think it is and is a good value.  Arrived very quickly.  Spike is honestly the best.

I have tryed other multifuncutional seasoning and nothing surpasses spike.
The taste alone will amaze you. I use spike on every and all things that I cook even eggs.
I have been using spike seasoning for about six years.  And I think it is just great, I use it on almost all meats, in soups and stews, on caserolls.

These crackers are a great way to get whole wheat into your diet & into children's.  They are low in fat & sugar, and they taste great.  I haven't met a child yet who doesn't like them.  The ingredients are good as well.
The Bahlsen Delobas are my favorite so far. Call them biscuits or call them cookies they are just plain good. Light and pastry like with a nice burst of sweetness from the red current jam. Try Them!
Great texture and balance of sweet to butter is just about right. Adults and kids both love them. Recommended
We were buying Bahlsen cookies at $1.70-$2.19 at lockal supermarket until I found that they are $1.41/box here at Amazon!

If you love the heavenly combination of chocolate and orange, then this
is a cookie to try. Gotta have your coffee and treat everyday like moi.
Well this plays well with coffee. Yum gonna have some right now....
The title says it all! These butter biscuits are DIVINE! Everyone loves them--my parents, my students, my colleagues, and, of course, me! You will love them, too!

These are every bit as good as the other two reviewers stated. Awesome butter cookies!!! There's a lot of butter taste in these cookies and they're not overly sweet. Just right! I'll be buying again when the 12 pack runs out. Amazon please make sure you keep these in stock on a continuing basis!
These Bahlsen Butter Leaves are the best cookies! Not too sweet, not greasy, soooo "just right!" Order extra! They go fast!
I love this chocolate covered cookies. The chocolate is pure and tasty. Not too sweet.

These cookies didn't disappoint.  They are delicious and go really well with a cup of tea or coffee.  They have just the right amount of sweetness...not cloying.  (I think American desserts usually go overboard on sugar).  I highly recommend them.
Love these tea biscuits. The price was great for a box of 12. I hope you continue to carry.

i tried bahlsen chocolates in europe, but you can't find them very often in the states. these are unlike any usa chocolates i've eaten, the wafer is wrapped over itself 4-5 times. you can't beat the crunch these make, delicious.

Having grown up on these cookies I was pleased to see that they now come in the more healthful whole wheat version.  Same great taste...light on the sugar...even my husband who hates sweets will eat these with his ice cream.
These are soo good with a nice cup of coffee. They are light, buttery and very flavorful with the finely chopped nuts.
better than grahm crakers and they do not spike your blood sugar (at least not mine.)

Once you try this piece of chocolate you will fall in love with it. Probably one of the best nonbar chocolates produced in Switzerland and Europe as a whole. And I think it is rather cheap for the quality you get.
We've ordered for them every month and only once the package inside the seal had a small hole and wasn't as fresh.
This product was delivered on time and included more than I thought I was going to get - a full 16 packages. I first purchased these in England and have loved them ever sense.
Will always buy these if I can find them. Hate to have to buy from Germany. Need a grocery store.
I was not very happy when i recieved my order. All the cookies were melted. Very good product. Word of advise. Don't buy any products in the summer time that will melt.
I grew up eating these cookies.  Got a case for a great price.  Will be looking for them again this fall.

Leibniz cookies are truly my favorite, beyond what I make, I am a passionate cook. The whole wheat version of these are particularly superb with a subtly greater flavor than the original and a lovely, slightly more crumbly and grainy texture. It has been a wonderful discovery. Bon appetit.

It tastes perfect. I like it.
You would "feel" the butter in the cookies.
Great cookies.  Not overly sweet as most American cookies can be, with a hint of citrus.  Could not ask for more.  There is only 12 or so cookies in the box, but a decadent treat.
these cookies are a perfect treat....very light and crunchy wafer sweetened by  the right amount of chocolate....great price and fast service

If you've had these cookies already - no one needs to sell them to you. I would just recommend that you keep them in the freezer. That way they're sort of hidden from you (and others) but for some reason freezing them brings out the taste and consistency of the chocolate. Try it!

These are great!  And they can get to be habit forming if you are not careful.  I bought the whole case, because you save overall  versus going to the supermarket.  Very rich dark chocolate, crisp cookie.  Worth every penny.  Oreo, eat your heart out!

These cookies are just wonderful!!! The chocolate is deep, dark, rich and melts very nicely in your mouth.  I would say that it is a bittersweet chocolate and very finely made. These cookies give the chocolate lover a satisfying chocolate experience. Do not hesitate to buy them!

A light and crisp flaky cookie surrounding a brightly flavorful nugget of jam. The only problem - I can eat a whole box without stopping to breathe! And buying them by the case makes them very affordable. My next order is already in...

I first had these cookies at our Oktoberfest where they were giving out samples.  I loved them and could not find them at World Market so I went to the internet and found them available at Amazon. They are very light and flaky.
When we couldn't find these in our local grocery store anymore, we were very glad to find them available through Amazon. these are light and delicious and a true treat!

Buy more than one box - these disappear fast! Bahlsen Biscuits are elegant, impressive, and delight everyone. I keep some on hand for unexpected guests and these "Hazelnut Biscuits" have never disappointed anyone! (Betcha YOU could eat a whole box yourself!)

Delicate ground hazelnut cookies for a Ladies tea, NOT for children or most men! Appreciated only by sophisticated palates, because they are neither cloyingly sweet or fatty. Set these aside for unexpected guests you'd like to impress.

Amazon sends you TWELVE boxes of these fabulous cookies and each box disappears FAST - in fact, DO NOT sit down with the whole box nearby or you will munch thru all of them without stopping! They are delicately sweet, crunchy, and buttery - without being at all greasy. You've been warned!
This Gevalia French Roast coffee is fresh tasting and bold!  It's fantastic considering its preground coffee.  I really love it!

I wanted to try these prunes and was truly suprised at the taste they imparted. They are semi-sweet with a fruity perfume like aroma. The reason I gave them 4 stars is that they have a fairly large pit and it does take care in eating them. Caution: this is not a small child food!!

Sadaf Pitted Prunes Black, 12-Ounce Packages (Pack of 4)

This item was full of mold (fungus) on reciept!

My husband cannot get enough of this product.  He practically licks the can clean!!  The nuts are delicious and Amazons prices and shipping are the lowest.  You get your order in a remarkably quick time.

I was not able to located these specific nuts (coffee glazed) at any store in Seattle where I live. So I checked Amazon and sure enough they were available and at a fair price. I ordered them on line and they arrived in good shape when you said they would. All in all a good experiece. Thanks
Kona coffee glaze macadamia nuts are "serious num-nums".  I consider it my ultimate treat and I like to treat myself.

These are as good as ever. Both my son,my wife and I just love them. I just wish I could get them in a larger size. Amazon beat all other prices by $10.00 The only way to get a better deal is to buy them in HAWAII
I am addicted to Macadamia Nuts.  I have a standing order to send nuts every 3 month.  Mauna Loa Nuts have been always fresh.
Anyone searching for stage 3 of gestational banana trajectories would be well advised to procure this item immediately.  It is an essential purchase.  That is all.

The bag we received from Amazon had hollow biscuits and were harder than the ones we purchased from a local store.  Were these a reject batch?  Certainly over baked or dried out!  Our bichon had a hard time biting into it.

Shame on me for not checking out the price before buying.  Paid $3 too much.  But it is a good product if you have a dog with allergies.  My dog loves the treats.  Will definately buy this product again, but not from this website.
So I order through Amazon and wah-lah instant "happy" and tasty too. Not pasty/powdery tasting as other instants and the full flavor of pistachio comes through to compliment desserts.
My dog absolutely loves these treats and he goes nuts every time I bring them out.  Not sure if they are helping his digestion but they don't seem to have any adverse affects either.
This product is great. The flavor was to die for. I will purchase again, when my sugar high goes away?  : D

These look very tasty and me being a candy freak i had to try them. To say the least i was extremely dissapointed. They have a chemical taste and the texture is like chewing glue. Very nasty, i would never eat or buy these again and that goes for any of the flavors.
I have to agree with the other review this flavor is my favorite! These treats are amazing!
I tried successfully to make fresh rolls first time. Very easy. Good product. Worked consistently since. I recommend it highly.
Just be aware.....the first ingredient on the list is salt.  I don't find this product very peppery, hot or spicy.  It is a disappointment.

I have been using Core Power (formerly Athlete's HoneyMilk) for over a year and I won't use any other product. I add it to smoothies and even use it in recipes that call for milk. If you are tired of the chalky tasting 'milks' out there then stop looking and start drinking Core Power.

Vanilla is by far my favorite flavor.  It tastes like vanilla bean ice cream so you'd never know you were doing something good for your body.  Lactose free so it's tummy friendly and packed full of protein for a post workout recovery.  This drink couldn't get any better!

This product is delishy.  I did a 10K recently and decided this would be my recovery drink of choice that day.  Forget the amazing nutrient content in the bottle, the flavor is fantastical.  I highly recommend to anyone looking to mix up their recovery routine.

These Namaste muffins are by far the best gluten free muffins I've discovered in 7 years!  Even better if you add crushed pineapple and coconut, or raisins and cinnamon.  Outstanding product and easy to make.

I purchased this item as a make up bag and it was perfect. It can be hung or laid out flat, you can see all of your products so they are easy to grab, and there was even space for my brushes.  I would not recommend it for a toiletries bag as it would be too small for me.
THe color i got is red and looks extremely good in person, I love it, it goes well with everything and looks great.

This case holds a lot and can still fold up well. Great function and looks nice too. The magnet works very well to keep it closed. I'm impressed with this product and will probably look at more of their travel accessories.
This is a great little carry all for my make up!! It is a little smaller than I expected, but I can carry my Clairsonic Mia in it, my make up and a few more items in it, so it will do the job!!
This is a very pretty container, and my granddaughter loved the blue color when mixed with water-- but--- it tastes more like coconut than chocolate-- should be labeled hot coconut drink.

This cocoa is like any other cocoa, other than it is white and turns pink when touches liquid.  The tin is cute, but 2 cans were dented when they arrived. Not sure if it was from shipping or the seller.  A bit over priced in my opinion as well.
If you have the munchies....you'll like these. Get them on sale....the only downside is I wish they held up better in milk...they go soggy fast...and they still taste great.
I love this cereal! I remember Life cereal as a kid.  It has the perfect balance of fiber and cinnamon without being too sweet.
I love life cereal, these boxes didn't last long but I got a great price during the special. Tasted great.

I grew up eating the original Life cereal and immediately switched to the cinnamon variety when they released it years ago. This is my favorite cereal and I am already out of the two 4-packs I ordered two weeks ago.

Like these with subtle hint of Cinnamon and low sweetness. Nice improvement over some other too sweet Cinnamon cereals. I think the packaging may add up too much to the cost - shall be able to buy in large packets for the family.
Good stuff, cinnamon and Life Multi-grain cereal, which I hear is better for you. Excellent price, hard to go wrong here.
A BOWL OF THIS IN THE MORNING IS GOOD STUFF. I ADD FRUIT AND NUTS TO AUGMENT THE TASTE. IT IS A GOOD AND HEALTHY WAY TO START THE DAY. IT HELPS KEEP ME REGULAR.
This is one of my favorite cereals. But purchase it only if you don't mind eating it in powder form. What you get is mostly powder, not crunchy squares. I will not be ordering again, sorry.
I have 4 children, I find these kind of offers a great way to keep the larder full, and the budget on track.
Got at a great price.  A little slow (backordered) but worth the wait (savings).  Other than the UPS man using this as a booster seat along the way - all is good otherwise.

My 2-year old loves these cheerio-like banana flavored snacks. He prefers them to Cheerios. He has also tried the Blueberry flavored version of these snacks, and highly dislikes them, but I think that's just because he isn't a huge fan of blueberries. These are a hit, though!

My whole family loves these. Not just for babies. These are wholesome organic snacks. If you love bananas, then these are an excellent snack.
Great for the whole family any age. I plan to have these as a staple snack in our home.
I was disappointed to receive Earth's Best Organic Snakin' Fruit Rings Banana because it hurt my child when she bit into the hard and stale treat.

These are so awesome I almost don't want to share them with my kids ;)
I had to order a couple more at this price also

my kids prefer the banana to the blueberry variety which is fine by me since these are usually a dollar or 2 cheaper. Perfect for snacks, car trips, and just about anything else you can think of. Extremely convenient lid keeps them fresh. Cannot say enough good things about these!

Great with BBQ, we have discovered and focusing on Team Fox for Parkinson's Research is what 4 Foxes Zinfandel is all about! Enjoy this wine to celebrate bbq's, birthdays or any celebration and know you've also helped raise money for Team Fox!
Cheers ~ Jessica Locke, Wines 4 Cures
I love this product, if you like cheese on you're popcorn this is a must try.
Absolutely NO cheese flavor at all. All you can taste is salt salt salt. Save your money and try something else.
I had used this product for years, but no longer could find it locally.  Was very pleased to find it on Amazon!  Keep in mind, there's no need for added salt -- this is cheesy AND salty.  Yummmm!
My family loves this cheese salt and its very hard to find in stores.  So happy to have found it on amazon.  I bought 12 bottles to share with everyone.

this is a great topping for popcorn and i have been using it for years.

PS I had written Amazon on October 6th when I received the order because 2 of the bottles were broken--I have not gotten a response. would appreciate acknowledgement!

When I couldn't find this product in my grocery store or other stores I shop in I decided to check out Amazon and yea, it was here! My husband and I love this seasoning on our popcorn, really good!!! Speedy delivery, thanks!!
I bought this at a local Albertsons recently and it is not at all as advertised.  There is no cheesy flavor detectable in the product.  Even the salt flavor is off.  Avoid this product.
Reese changed their Cheesy Popcorn Seasoning.  It is more salt than cheese.  In fact it has very little cheese flavor left.  I will not be purchasing this product again.

Reese's is consistently excellent. Always makes the popcorn taste great.

Wouldn't use any other brand. I buy in bulk.

I prefer the plain salt version (no additives) - but cheesy is quite good.

Very good!!! Tried it years ago. Whole foods, for some reason, decided to stop carrying Eden Foods(in my area). So I am HAPPY that Amazon has come to the rescue. The garlic taste is subtle. Cooks up well. JUst wish that it could be pruchased by the bag and not the case.It's a must try.

This is an okay gift box, only if you like mediocre cheese and summer sausage. The items are small, smaller than they appear in the picture. I only paid $30, but I would not purchase it again. On the positive side, the mustard samples that come with it make the items edible.
We had a minor issue with the packaging of our order but the company made it right VERY quickly. I am very impressed with their customer service! Thanks for a great experience! :)
My wife thinks it is the best in the world and I think Stonewall Kitchen is the best
We added these to some salt water taffy in the favors for my step-daughter's beach themed wedding. They were a lovely addition and realy added to the theme.

What? This product is NOT what is showed in the photo. Instead of the box of Xtra Sour Goo which was shown, I recieved Monster Goo, which is NOT what I wanted to get. This company does not send you exactly what is in the photo, so watch out.

I was very excited to get this product as I used to love their toasted pumpkin seed oil. Unfortunately I couldn't taste the pistachio flavor. So because of the price & lack of taste, I wouldn't purchase it again.

Great company though. Michael is a great guy.

Michelle

I love pistachio nuts and I also like working with nut oils of all kinds. I had not even thougth of using pistachio oil.
After purchasing this oil and using it once as a salad dressing(spinach,nectarines and toasted pistachios) I am sold and am on a hunt for more ideas..I would welcome ideas.
Thank god that i tasted the metal before i swallowed them. I dont even get how it got mixed up with this. The candy itself is sex in mouth.
I love this tea, I don't drink anything with caffeine in it and my grocery store doesn't carry  this flavor in decaf, so I was thrilled to get it here, plus it was cheaper!
Every evening includes a cup of Bigelow decaffeinated French Vanilla Tea and if there is a movie included in my evening plans, I will enjoy two cups of this tea.

I have to admit I love this tea, I put splenda in it and the taste is so wonderful. I have probably went through 7 6pack boxes this year alone, not counting the other teas i drink. This is a must try hot or cold..
Used to be able to find this in my local Walmart but they stopped carrying it. So I was very happy when I could order it through Amazon.
This tea is wonderful and soothing, and even more soothing to get it shipped to the house!  I have found it hard to find decaffeinated tea in the grocery store, so this is much easier.
My husband and I love this french vanilla decaf tea--but our local grocery stores now only carry the caffeine French Vanilla Tea. Luckily, I found it for sale on Amazon--even cheaper!

Our local stores have stopped carrying this product in the Decaf version.  I found the Decaf is smoother tasting than the Regular French Vanilla.  I bought 4 boxes I was so excited to see it.  I have enough to last for a while now!!
This product was very good when I began buying it but lately it is terrible. There is no taste at all. That's the reason I no longer purchase this item. Thank you.

There was not as much flavor as I remembered from my previous purchase of this tea at the local grocery store.  Could not get it locally anymore and am wondering if product was discontinued and this was old merchandise.
The french vanilla decaf tea is an excellent full body tea that makes two cups. I have been purchasing this tea from Bigalow for years and am now happy that i can purchase this through Amazon
Great vanilla smooth taste plain or I also add a little 1% milk and a sweet n' low for a relaxing treat without any guilt.Bigelow Decaffeinated French Vanilla Tea, 20-Count Boxes (Pack of 6)

These little tea bags pack a punch of flavor, and it is a nice clean french vanilla taste. No strange chemical aftertastes.  I make iced tea with regular decaf black tea and throw in some of these for a nice added flavor bonus.
Not as strong of a taste or smell like other teas.  Still good for a nice hot cup of tea
I love just about anything Vanilla and this tea is one of my faves! Its great for a yummy treat during the day without the caffeine.

Once again, Paragon has disappointed with this flavor. The Hawaiian Tropic, simply did not carry much flavor, and what you could taste was not pleasant at all. I do not recommend this syrup concentrate.

these peppercorns are fresh and spicy. they are
just what i wanted. Nice size and i think they are
are great value.
This is the highest grade of peppercorns I have ever had.  It's 30 cents less per ounce than bulk peppercorns where I shop and they smell and taste so much better.  This cook is very very pleased.
Not a expert and I have no complaints with this product or the shipment of this product. I will add more info if I try other products.
Spicy, super fresh, perfect on just about everything, and an AMAZING value.  This huge container will last us a long time.  Good stuff.
This was a good price for so much pepper.  It keeps me from having to keep buying pepper which is expensive at the stores.

Always try try to ration my spice usage. Getting a fresh batch and smelling and tasting the change in my dishes made me realize how I've been cheating myself by being thrifty. Use it or loose it. So much less expensive then retail grocery.
I bought these for my son because they are gluten free. He seems to like them. I thought that they lacked taste. I would have preferred a little more cinnamon taste.

I like the taste and texture of these and so does my husband.

They aren't cheerios and no, you won't find anything close to cheerios when eating gluten free.
I bought this cereal for my kids (ages 6 and 7) who can't eat gluten any more.  They won't eat it.  I think it passes to at least finish the box but my kids would be happy to throw it out.

My son loves these, thank goodness.  They hold up well in soymilk for ceral in the morning and also hold up well in snack bags.  He is constantly needing 'O' shaped cereal for projects at school, and these work great.  They are a bit sweet, but he doesnt mind.

This cereal, while not EXACTLY the same as Cheerios, is VERY VERY close and even my husband, who is not GF, eats it! It is perfect for GF families, especially those with a toddler who is needing to eat cereal and be Gluten Free! Good buy for the price also!
I was optimistic about this, but neither the people nor the dogs would eat this cereal.  We threw out all 6 boxes.

Geez what a rip off, WINCO does carry this stuff, Winco is the only place I have found it (I look everywhere I go) and they only charge $2.79 a box & I save that outrageous shipping charge as well :)
I bought 8 boxes last time, I'm addicted!

Some product work needs to be done on the discs. I have wasted several of the milk creamers that would not "read" properly resulting in milk leaking all over the tassimo machine. It did not happen with Starbucks packages.
My daughter is a teacher and was having lessons on space travel.  Being able to find the Astronaut Ice Cream was a real treat.  The items arrived quickly and in very good condition.
both the kids and adults loved eating this treat. product tasted great and melted in the mouth. would definitely buy again.

This seller offered the best price i could find on the web. I was pleased with the speed of delivery.

the product was in great shape and well packed. I'll do business with this company again!

kids love astronaut ice cream!

We have made this in a slow cooker which took longer than making it on the stove but was more convenient.  It is not quite as good as some home made and restaurant kheer I have tasted but still very nice

I was expecting a larger granual suger and am dissapointed in this product. I might as well have used normal grocery store ganular sugar (i.e., Domino).  Not worth returning and I would not buy again. It certainly doesn't fit my description of "sanding" sugar.
This was an addition to my sprinkles for Christmas cookies.  It was fun to use. Made my cutout cookies much prettier than I ever imagined.  No problem with item or seller!! Excellent!!
Very pleased. Expensive but worth the cost to me because of the beautiful soft luster it adds to my baked goods. Shaker and pour openings for easy application.  Ordering more.
This is not XAPP Recovery as is listed, it is XAPP Energy. The difference is that XAPP Energy contains caffeine.

These are so delicious!! I usually don't like mint chocolate candies but my goodness! I fell in love! The chocolate will literally melt in your mouth. I gave some to my co workers and they kept asking for more! So these are my new favorite candy!

These bars taste a lot like Peter Paul Mounds candy or at least they do to me after quite awhile on the Atkins plan.  One warning is they are not that easy on the digestion so eat them slowly and don't be tempted to eat more than one!
Not quite as good as advertised.  The chocolate flavor has a chemical taste and the coconut seems a bit off.

I was expecting a larger granual suger and am dissapointed in this product. I might as well have used normal grocery store ganular sugar (i.e., Domino).  Not worth returning and I would not buy again. It certainly doesn't fit my description of "sanding" sugar.
This was an addition to my sprinkles for Christmas cookies.  It was fun to use. Made my cutout cookies much prettier than I ever imagined.  No problem with item or seller!! Excellent!!
Very pleased. Expensive but worth the cost to me because of the beautiful soft luster it adds to my baked goods. Shaker and pour openings for easy application.  Ordering more.

I enjoyed these mints for many years... They are now terrible because of the changes that Wrigley has made to them.  Get rid of the color and put back the flavor.  I will not buy them again unless they are changed back.

I fully agree with the last few reviews. Altoids were ruined when they started adding food coloring. Wintergreen Altoids are horrible now. These were the ONLY mints I would buy, but I won't be buying them any more.

FAKE SUGAR, FAKE FLAVOR, FAKE COLOR = NO DEAL

I will not buy this product again. I cannot find the actual ingredients, Natural and other flavors are not sufficient for people with allergies. So far the peppermint is OK if I do not buy the minis. I may just stop buying Wrigley products in general when finding ingredient lists is this difficult.

Altoids are my favorite mint and this is the way to buy them to last for a while.  Save money and get them sent straight to my door.  Usually get 4 of the double boxes of 6 per box.  Definitely worth the savings.

The Altoids Wintergreen mints are my favorite flavor of all time! Everybody always compliments me on how great my breath smells (I know it's kinda weird)! Anyways, I would absolutely recommend these mints!

I am very pleased with this product, the expiration dates are really good-I got a fresh product and in a very reasonable time.  I will order from your company all the time now.  Thank You for your very good service!  Sincerely, Dianne L. D'Andrea
What can I say? They're curiously strong 8-) Nice to get the flavor I like in a multipack as they don't sell them here in Afghanistan.

I have never found Altoids to be lacking. Also bought the new licorice flavor. It is really nice if you like licorice, and I do.

Good price.
This is a great way to get your Altoids without hopeing you'll find the flavor you want in the check-out lane. Plus the price is very comprable. Plus the wait was short..
I love Altoids. I can get the peppermint ones at my local COSTCO for a good price, but I get tired of peppermint after a while. Amazon is the easist way to get other flavors like wintergreen.

Thanks for sending them. The students and faculty at Davidson College in the Music Dept. will enjoy them.

Bill Vinson
Davidson, NC
They filled the order very quickly.  Thank you for including this product as eligible for free shipping.
Product actually arrived sooner than I expected, and was properly packaged and in good condition.
i did not want this item and it was placed in my order by error and the item cannot be canceled.  This is unacceptable when I do not want the item.  How can this be taken off my bill?
Morton and Basset granulated garlic is just hands down better. We've been using it for about 4 years now, and it's consistantly the best.

Locally I was paying around $10 for it. The last time I bought two tins of it because the store owner said he wasn't able to get it anymore. As another other reviewer noted, this is a well kept secret, but one that is incredible if you can find it.
They refuse to ship this fine tea to Canada.  I have to go to the Middle East to find it and bring it back.

These ends do a great job for the heavy chewer, safe and yummy. Unfortunately (sp) Amazon has these things listed all over the place so it is tuff to do a simple comment or price on the bone. $3.70 is right price ea. but buy the 10 pack cuz you get the really big bones in there.

My dog is a very picky dog.  So we did some research and this knuckle bone was suggested.  The dog has chewed on the bone randomly but has not shown much interest it.  The bone is very durable and looks as if it could last a long tim.

My dog is on a meat free diet due to severe food allergies. It seems to have very good quality ingredients and she loves it. It does seem to cause a very soft stool but hopefully it will firm up over time.
This is the best tasting bar on the market! They only use good food, no junk! The flavor is just awesome! You cant go wrong with these bars!!!!!!!!!!!

It is my 7 yr old lab/basenji mix's favorite food, which we mix 1/3 can together with her dried food, making a single can last a week as a special treat.  However, after shipping, it is cheaper to go to my local pet store

Like other Merrick varieties, my dog also loves this brand as well. Ordering was easy and the turn-around time although it was initially quoted at 7-10 days, I received my items in 2 business days!  I saved even with shipping compared to my local retailer without having to haul it back to my home.

When used right out of the can,and even mixed over dry food two of my dogs had loose stool. Right on the verge of being the runs. So I have too strain out the solids and get rid of most of the liquid. Even so they love the taste, too bad of the latter.

With the cost of a frozen TUR-DUC-KEN being $69 plus almost $20 shipping, this canned alternative is really a bargain!

Merrick Homestyle is clearly the classiest of the whole-meals-in-one-can products. Bravo!

The batter seems to require more moisture than the instructions call for and they don't give a baking time, but 4 minutes seems to work about right. The waffles taste more like regular waffles than Belgian Waffles. I was hoping they would have a more "malty" flavor.
Tastes good, but barely any protein. If you want protein, get Nutiva's unflavored 50% protein powder. You can flavor it yourself. It's cheaper and has more protein.

Expensive, nasty and low in protein! I really don't understand how this product has got good reviews. I am not exagerating but the taste is nasty. I drunk it once and the rest I flushed through the toilet. Bad!

Just got this shake mix and tried it out this morning...Yummy!  Blended with frozen banana, a few strawberries and water it is filling and not too heavy.  It feels healthy even though it is chocolate it is perfect.  Can't wait to try the berry too.

I Love this product!! The shake is great mixed with vanilla almond milk it's AMAZING!!! I am going to be buying for the rest of my life and I will be buying it from Amazon. It's so much cheaper than anywhere else!!! Enjoy!!

This is a wonderful item! I add fruit and flaxseed when making the shake. Tastes great! I needed something that did not have the Soy in it. Soy is everywhere! Yuck. I love Hemp shakes now.
Very worth ordering. I will try the Berry when it becomes available.
Awesome!
The taste is less then desired. I ordered three canisters all together and can't return them. My suggestion to anyone that wants to try it is to order just one and see how they like.

The Nutiva hemp shakes have the best texture around for sure and that is appreciated! But the chocolate one doesn't taste like much of anything.  I expect a chocolate mix to taste like...chocolate. Mix it with chocolate Almond milk and it's really good!

Instead of eating chocolate. I have this as a chocolate treat and it is really good. I blend it with Ice, ice milk, a banana and a little stevia, really good. People talk about having gastric distress I add some miralax powder in it and that adds the extra fiber to help digest this.
The taste is not real great and the protein level is really low.  I definitely prefer Amazing Grass Green Superfood Chocolate to this product.
My latest beverage addiction.  The only thing I don't like is that temporary noxious cloud that arises when you put it in water.
This was ordered accidentally, but I accepted it anyway.  I (and my family) am very glad I did.  It was delicious.  I will definitely order this and other products from them again.
I wanted to buy it from amazon.com as I was lazy to do shopping.  However, after comparied the price, retail stores are much cheaper than online.
Our dogs love Pupperonis.  They are wheat-free, which is a necessity for us.  The big bag actually has bigger pupperonis, so that's the one we get.
Best treacle toffee I have ever found and I have tried lots of toffee.  If it can be beaten, I would like to know about it!

Walkers treacle toffees are the best treacle with most desirable chewing consistency and taste. This package was well priced and delivery was prompt. I wish there was a larger per pack amount available.
My daughter and I both loved this bread!  This was our first time trying it and I was a little hesitant but we both thought that it was delicious!
The SANS Black Cherry Soda is the best tasting "diet" soda I have tried. The sweetener is the herb Stevia which is natural. With "0" calories and "0" sugar, it is a great refreshing drink.

This honey is good. But I can't understand why the price is changed so frequently. One month ago I bought it at Subscribe price 34USD. This time I bought it at Subscribe price 40.83USD. But now it is 39.86USD. From the price aspect I don't recommend it.

Follow up purchae of a theraputic Honey. The larger quantity was what was required. Response and delivery were very good.  I do not have the knowledge to enter the "Genuine ~ or Not" debate. This product tastes fine and seems to have healthful properties. I am buying more.
These are delicious crackers, but don't ship well, and many end up broken in the process.
this product was purchased for my husband who has been hooked on hot sauces for years and this is now his favorite.

Heard about this hot sauce on the Larry Miller podcast. Ordered up a couple bottles and my first test was on a pulled chicken bbq sandwich. I knew after one bite that the bottles of tabasco, chilula, etc...are gonna be gathering dust. Seriously. Great flavor and perfect heat. Thanks Dexter.
Hot sauce is very good and shipping was fine I would reccomend this product to people not much else to say in reguards to the hot sauce
This is a great Hot sauce.  I wish it was available in grocery stores for purchase.  I recommend Gringo Bandito.

I have tasted many hot sauces, but for me, this is perfect. It starts bright in flavor, then mellows to a smooth, spicy bite at the end. Not too hot though, just right. I have sent some to friends and will soon order more for myself.
this sauce is perfect if you like spicy sauce...i use it on wings, hot dogs,, hamburgers and on other sandwiches and salads...
I love this hot sauce!  Dexter Holland (of band The Offspring) really made a great hot sauce!  I def suggest getting a bottle or a few!

unbelievable good taste - these anchovies are from outer space!!!! they are out of this world!!!!! tasty and delectable, with any meal - you cant go wrong with these - they are a fantastic gourmet item from the sea!  anchovies in general are great, but these far exceed anything i have tasted!
An amazing difference from the old canned anchovies! Try them, you'll never go back. Store in a plastic or glass container after opening and you're good to go for a long time, if they last that long!
The price was too high but the product was just great... A possible touch-up to the price would make even better
I trust this brand--the flavors are blended just right and I love that many formulas include stevia--no need to add sweetener!

My dogs love these treats and I have to say I dont blame them they smell soo good(dont worry I never tasted them) and I feel good in giving my "babies" healthy treats that are made in the US not china (hard to come by)Another good flavor is their pumpkin and apple.

Eukanuba has created this specialized breed food for certain dogs and my Dachshunds have benefited from this food by having a healthy coat and weight. I order on line because there is no one who sells this specialized breed dog food in Alamosa, CO.

I have a dachsie mix and I don't want her to get fat as they are prone to do.  This is a good dog food and she likes it so as long as I don't over feed her we should be good to go!  the shipping was quick.  It tends to be pricey no matter where you find it.
It was so much easier to have the dog food shipped direct to me than have to carry it home from the store!!
Arrives always in about 4 days. It is more convenient and cheaper than the store. Recommended!! Great service too. My Dachshund love it!

Yummy vanilla icing that you dip the pocky in. There's plenty of icing and this snack tastes soo yummy. It reminds me of my childhood favorite dunkaroos! The container looks small, but there's plenty of pocky and icing to satisfy you.
I like spicy, my son does not so my wife cooks bland. I keep a jar on the dining table and add it as a condement. This is a lot, but I go through it quickly.

I got the same product at my local grocery store for $9.99. Much cheaper - what's going on Amazon? You aren't even offering a bulk price. Great product, my dogs love them too, but can be found much cheaper elsewhere.
My dog is a very fussy eater.  Getting her to eat everyday is a challenge.  But she loves these mini sized "greenies".  As soon as she hears me open the bag, she is patiently waiting for her treat.
My dog loves this treat and is very aware whenever I go where it is stored.  I give this treat to him as an award after bathing, combing his long hair, etc.
If you want to try something different, this is a very exotic and refreshing tea with with many benefits for the body! The box arrived intact.

This bouquet was delivered to rural western Michigan about 50 hours after ordered. The heavy, clear, tall vase tapers toward the bottom. Yellow and white carnations were beautiful, but the roses died before opening.
The price couldn't be beat anywhere on line.
Hot and Spicy cheeze-its are yummy, but they do have a bit of a funny aftertaste, so you will need a drink.  Also like the other reviewer said, they were smaller packages than advertised.

I love the hot and spicy cheez-it
But was disappointed to find the packages were only 1.5oz instead of the 1.92oz that Amazon advertised them as. Dont know how they managed to flub it up, it states right on the box 1.5oz.

the plant is pretty but they didn't gave me what i ask for. i ask for this plant in this picture and the send me another one with a darker color. what is not good is that once you open it you can not send it back. and also it was very small one. and the orchid is fake.
gave it to a friend as a gift and she enjoyed using it in her baking
I tried to use these dried morels as a substitute for fresh morels in a chicken dish and they were lacking in flavor. Morels should perfume a dish and these mushrooms did nothing when rehydrated.
I don't really have much experience with dried morels.  I can only say that I was delivered exactly what I expected.

I bought these to stock a meeting room at work and they have been a big hit. Once people realized they were sugar free they felt they could enjoy them without guilt. They taste good, not too sweet with a little tang.
These are very tasty and they will crunch without risking damage to any dental work or your teeth in general. A great way to limit sugar intake. I reordered because I liked them so much.
These jelly beans are very tasty... have good flavor and were delivered fresh. I would recommend them just to try a new jelly bean flavor.

Very disappointed in these nuts.  Horrible taste.  I got my money back and these went into the garbage.  Will not trust Azar again.  Same thing with the raw cashew pieces.  I thought they tasted toxic.
I'm on my third bag of these, I've been using them for raw food prep.  They are consistently fresh and the price is great!
Not as good as others that I've brought!~ Very Pricey and the bag does not seal that tight....I used a clip to keep it more air tight!~.......Not a fan!~
Their macadamia nuts was great for baking.  Also compare to buying it in the store, this was a much better value.  Definitely would buy from again.

Quite often macadamia nuts are salted. These, instead, are raw, natural, with nothing added: just delicious macadamia nuts, as they come out of their shell.
If you are a fan of macadamias, you have found the right seller!
Delicious and nutritious.  Very fresh, unsalted.  Love them.  Healthy raw nuts.  Good price.
$59.99 for 6 boxes of 17.7 oz each ($10.00 / Item), plus $14 shipping? They have them in stores for about $5 - $6.
Excellent rub for a good basic chicken.  Could have been more original, excellent, but not amazing.
This was a good buy.  Tried using it for lemon meringue and it was great.  Tried it with baked pumpkin custard and it was awful.  Mostly use it for cream pies which always turn out great.

This is a very mild Merlot. Extremely smooth chocolaty start with very slightly fruity middle. The finish is smooth but not as smooth as I'd like it. Lack's the richness I'm looking for in Merlot but really a great casual drink to enjoy with food.
This is very good and tastes great with strawberries.  It is just like having chocolate dipped strawberries without all the calories.

Puzzled as to why this product doesn't live up to the claims? You're not the only one. There does not appear to be any evidence at all to support the claims made. One has to wonder if the testimonials are indeed genuine, given the lack of evidence.

These peanuts have a crispness and flavor it is remarkable. You can almost snap them. Their flavor is clean and sharp. I would highly recommend these peanuts to anyone that would like to taste what a great roasted peanut should be.

These are way better than rancid grocery story peanuts, but they weren't as good or as fresh as I'd hoped. I imagine that they'd been stored too long at amazon before being shipped.

Too bad, because if they're not going to be absolutely fresh, why would I buy these again?
I've never had a better peanut.  Have ordered them twice and sent them as a gift.  Looking forward to trying their cashews.

Found these peanuts about 12 years ago when I lived in Virginia. Although I moved to SW United States I still order them on a regular basis. They use only the best nuts and cook them just right so they have the crunch and great flavor you expect from Virginia style peanuts.
These are absolutely the best peanuts ever! This was not my first time buying them. It most definetly won't be the last. They are huge and lightly salted. Very very flavorful.
I had been buying Gourmet Virginia Salted Peanuts from another company and was quite satisfied, but I couldn't resist the price on these. They are every bit as good! Best nuts for the price.
Switched to these from The Peanut Shop of Williamsburg's tins of salted peanuts (also currently available through Subscribe & Save) and these are MUCH better, plus a better value.

The price was excellent, but we found Virginia Diner brand to be better.  These had a few lower quality peanuts in each can.  However, all Virginia peanuts are still better than any other kind.  Robert
Got these for my peanut lover for Christmas! Great taste, crunchy and great size! One can gone working on the other one!

The Royal Oak Virginia Salted Peanuts are great. I would highly recommend these
and will reorder from time to time. I bought two 2 packs, a total of 4 40 oz cans.
These are really good peanuts.  The best I have had.  They are fresh and delicious.  They are not too greasy and have just the right amount of salt.  I like them very much!
GREAT PRODUCT AND well worth the subscribe and save price. This is a great tasting and presentable product. Brand name and delivered as often as needed...who could ask for more?
BEST PEANUTS EVER!!!!!! Just the right amount of Salt and they are some of the largest peanuts on the market.
These peanuts are super crunchy and fresh. I like that they only use 2 ingredients, peanuts and peanut oil, unlike most the nuts sold at major supermarkets. These'll last you a while.
I have tried all brands of gourmet peanuts and these are by far the best peanuts.  In addition, they are a little bit cheaper than the leading competitor.

I have tried Feridies, Royal Oak, and The Peanut Shop of Williamsburg brands of Virginia peanuts. These were a close second to Feridies. They have a great texture and are salted just right. If Feridies are out of stock, buy these peanuts from Royal Oak.
I usually get Virginia Diner or Plantation Peanuts but decided to try these, I had some guests over and everyone loved them, they are excellent quality !!
Best peanuts I've ever found.  Big, crisp, addictive!  Just wish they were calorie free!
This tastes just like the iced tea you buy at Starbucks. I like it better because I make it with purified, filtered water. Great tea

Tazo Zen is a great tasting green tea.  I would recommend to others at least to try.  They serve it at Starbuck's stores so it would be better to try there first (although they will charge you $2 for a small).
If you love good quality tea, always buy the "Full Leaf" type.  You will enjoy it!  Zen, is my favorite!
as i expected its a great taste and healthy and good shipment packing great fair value, i will order it again ,thank u starbux
The tea is delicious...has a natural sweetness to it and has no caffeine. It is a bit pricey, but cheaper than buying it at Starbucks drive up.

I love this tea. The flavor is heavenly and the tea bags look like a lovely sachet of poupourri, not a regular tea bag. It's such a pleasing statement, visually, aroma, and flavor. I've given this tea as gifts.

This is a nice alternative for Tiramisu if you can't have any dairy, but it doesn't come close to the "real thing."  The flavor is similar to Tiramisu, but keep in mind that it is a "cake," so the texture is nothing like the famous dessert.

I purchased these for my picky eater. He totally loves them. He is a large dog but they gave him plenty of chew time. He is allergic to a lot of dog foods and treats. I was very glad to find these, he had no allergic reactions and really loved them. I just wish my local pet stores carried them.

The Kirkland Signature bagged coffee's are Great. Each roast has its season and I've found that I like all three so I'm good all year around. But buy from Costco they are now about $19.00 a bag.

Rwandan, Guatemalan, & Sumatra all three are great! Use with the AeroPress ;)
since Kirkland's New Guinea is not available, this seems closest  in quality.  Have waited for Kirkland to bring it back,  but am getting used to this great coffee

We were very disappointed when Costco did'nt carry it anymore. When I found it on Amazon it really made our day. We were Starbucks fans for so long and when we took a chance on this Rwandan coffee it turned out to be better than Starbucks! GOOD STUFF!!!

I don't understand.  I just bought this last week at Costco for $13.  Do they promote this coffee in different stores at different times of the year?  It's amazing, but it isn't worth anywhere near $40 or so dollars a bag!

This has got to be one of the best coffees I've ever had, sad thing is Costco no longer carries this product, while they did the cost was just over $13 per bag or just over $4 lb.  I'm sure gonna miss this coffee since I just cannot see paying $12 lb, time to find a new favorite.
Stonewall products, although pricey, are very good. High quality products with high taste value. Vendor rated very high. Product arrived early, and well packaged.
My dog loves these treats and with her sensitive stomach, there are no problems plus they keep her teeth in great condition.

These dried Bing cherries are absolutely delicious. I have used them with wild rice and toasted pecans for a side dish. I plan to use them with a roast pork tenderloin soon. Excellent quality and price.

I didn't find any pits and that's saying something because whenever I buy cherries in the store, they always warn "may contain pits" and sure enough, I always find one.  These were good without a lot of sweetener, and also didn't have the preservative flavor.
I love cherries ripe, jammed, dried, any way I can get them.  I've eaten lot of different kinds of dried fruit from different providers. These were stale and I ended up throwing them out.
It's a great oil to start oil pulling with. Very satisfied except shipping could've been cheaper
The advertising said 'this is the perfect sauce' and I'm not sure it's wrong.  Combined with a spicy home-made crust this can't be beat.
I have used Pastorelli Pizza Sauce for many, many years and when we moved to Tennessee I wasn't able to get it so now order it by the case. Love it!

This sauce is one of the best I have tried.I have used jarred as well as packaged and book recipes.This sauce shines.I keep a case in my pantry,and because of 8oz size there is never any waste as the case with jars.Good Price-Premium sauce!
Nice and thick the way pizza sauce should be - not a watery mess the way the rest of them are. Good stuff full of flavor.
I had searched for years for a decaf coffee that kept the wonderful flavor of a full-bodied coffee. I finally found it when I tried the Newman's Own Decaf! Great taste, great company, happy customer!

Chocolate covered marzipan from Europe....
what more needs to be said, this is awesome
stuff. Back in the olden days, like the 70's,
my aunt would always bring me this chocolate when
she would go Germany..so this chocolate also
brings back happy memories.
Niederegger marzipan has lots of almonds in it. If you expect almond flavoring in it, this product is not for you.
Very disappointed with the taste of this product;it really lacks flavor.In the future i will wait until Schluckwerder Marzipan is back in stock.

These are delicious crackers which stay nice and crispy even in humid weather. Unfortunately this particular packaging seems very prone to breaking in transit. They still taste good but I think I will order them in the different packaging where they seem to transport better.
Love the taste, but at least half of the crackers in every package were shattered.

These crackers are crisp and delicious.  They are very crunchy and if you like crunchy like I do, then you will love these.  They go well with dip - my favorite is raspberry chipotle.  The teriyaki flavored ones are even better.

After opening the box it looking like it fell down a set of stairs.  Most of the crackers in the packages were cracked and full of crumbs.  My husband is gluten intolerant and he likes these crackers.  I guess we won't be ordering them this way again.  We are both very disappointed.

The product arrived in excellent condition and was fresh.  The price was actually less than I have paid at Walmart and Target. Both of those stores seem to be very sporadic in carrying this product, so I was glad to find it online.  Very satisfied!
These crackers were exactly what I was searching for.  Tried them at a Christmas Expo and wanted to avoid the price being charged at the show.  Great with cheeses, salad, dips, etc.  Thanks!
My order was mis-shipped. I recieved the wrong flavor but Amazon was great, they replaced them with the correct item and told me to keep the mis-ship.
While the crackers were awesome, they were not packed very well and many were broken.

These crackers/thins are so good and not particularly fattening. They have some salt to them which makes them good. Most stores don't carry them so I liked the idea of ordering a Pack of 12 via Amazon.com.

Janet
You will become addicted to it once you eat it, I promise.  Everyone of my friends agreed.

We like these crackers but the last two times we ordered them all the

crackers were smashed.

This is a very tasty gourmet cracker! It has a taste of the sesame seeds and seasonings.  Most crackers are overwhelmed with a salty taste so you can't enjoy your dips or spreads but this is just perfect! I eat them without any kind of spreads or dips also!  Try some you will love it too!
We love these crackers!  They are fresher and crispier when purchased by the box.

These are our favorite snack crackers.  They are crisp and thin with a wonderful but subtle flavor that goes great with any topping.  We  ordered two cartons (24 packages) and they arrived in perfect condition with very few broken unlike many we have purchased locally.

Our daycare uses this formula as the default (if you don't provide your own), which is what promted us to try it out. Our daughter (although she can't talk to tell us for sure) likes it. We've tried all the name brands and this is the only one that doesn't seem to upset her stomach!

I have a subscription for these to get a case (50 cans) every 2 months. The fish are fair sized with 5 to a can. The only complaint I have is that the scales sometimes detract. It says packed in oil but it is really an oil/water broth. I pop the can and pour it down the sink. Recommended.
I was glad these arrived quickly but sadly, they were gone just as quickly. I will order more soon.

I like the VIA Colombia instant coffee. It's medium but still a little dark for me, so I make two cups of coffee with one pack... :)
Very good deal from Amazon compare to the price in store.
I'll but this product again.
These were great, we used them at my daughter's wedding (they are her favorite).  They were nice and fresh.  Thanks
these are the best mint chocolate candies. i would keep this at my work desk and a pack of 240 ct will be over in under 2 weeks, everyone would just stop by and grab a few.
Candy was fresh and a good value.  If you are looking for bulk of this product this is a good way to go.  Though I see the price has really gone up since I ordered them.  No more free shipping?
awesome product at a great price - high quality human grade allergy friendly cookies!  dogs love em!
My dogs love them....In fact, these are safe (stomach wise) treats which keep my pets happy after coming home from a walk or going into their crate.  They like them almost as much as cheese!
These are the best biscuits ever. My dog demands them three times a day. She likes all the flavors, but sweet potato is her very favorite.
I needed these Juniper berries fora Sauerbraten recipe.  Couldn't find them in any store, so was pleased to find them here.  Very pleased with transaction.  Will be back!

The supplier emailed me to check whether I wanted green or black berries which I thought was an impressive followup. The berries arrived in a plastic bag when I was expecting a glass container as per the advertising pitcure. However, all in all I was happy with the service and the product.
These juniper berries were exactly what I needed to cook a few German and Danish dishes.  I was happy to find these online since the local grocery store doesn't carry them.
Good price on these and they seem to be of good quality.  I can only give it 4 stars since there is some debris in each bag that has to be filtered out before use.
These are the greatest things in the world.  At the prices on Amazon you can't loose.  Definatly a good buy.
This is, hands down, my favorite Haribo candy.  It has a wonderful strawberry flavor and the sweetness is not overpowering.
cant find these anywhere else.. LOVE THEM!!!! do wish they would come in a smaller size, 5 lbs is alot!

We used to live in Bonn and would go to the store right by the factory.  The gummies sent by Amazon are good, but they are not the same as the ones that you get when you are in Germany.  Haribo produces these in Spain and then import them to the US.

When I opened the bag it was like smelling fresh strawberries!  I'm not big into sweets, but these are just right and don't taste like artificial flavoring.  Haribo definitely makes the best gummy candies!!!
Be cautioned, do not order these in the summer.  No protection was taken to protect these from the summer heat, so I received a 5 lb bag of gummy goo!  The entire bag was liquid when I received it.

I received my 5lb bag of gummi's on time. They are good, but not the same gummi's you find in Germany. They look like it from the site. After I already ordered them I read another review that state's the same thing. I guess I need to fly to Germany for the real thing.
Super transaction.  I ordered these for my father in law's birthday.  He was so thrilled.  They were really fresh and tasted amazing. Thanks.
These gummy strawberries are YUMMY and very flavorful. We are big fans of Haribo, give these a try you will love them.
These are really great tasting and oh so cute.  They were perfect for my daughters birthday party!!  Strawberry Shortcake.
I still haven't eaten all of these. It takes a while to go through five pounds of gummies :)
This is the best price I have found for Haribo.  The candies are fresh and the texture is just right.  Great buy!

Bought this candy to try it as a fill in snack. Not a fan of gummi stuff. So, that was my mistake. But, the strawberry flavor is ok. The bag is gigantic. So it's good if you have a lot of kids to eat them. They advertise a five pound bag, they're not kidding.
Not tasty... and almost impossible to chew at all! Items are pretty, but seriously, have no taste and are like chewing rubber.
I have purchased these gummi candies in the past and not had a problem, but these strawberries tasted terrible and I ended throwing them out.

Better texture and flavor than most. Machine made gnocchi will never approach handmade, sort of like boxed mashed potatoes vs homemade, but these are about as good as possible. Try boiling and then baking with gorgonzola and cream.

My co-worker, who is from Hawaii, introduced me to this delicious dressing.  I add it to my salad and somen noodles, and I have a quick Asian noodle salad.  I have served this salad to my many friends, and it always get rave reviews.  It is, by far, my favorite dressing.
I have been using this for years.  My local supermarket used to carry the dressing, and then stopped.  So ... I had to resort to ordering it online.
Item was yummy.  Didn't realize it had MSG haha but who am I kidding, the product is delicious!  Mix 2 spoonfuls of this special sauce with cut up firm tofu and green onions, voila!
My grandkids live out of town so this was a perfect gift that they could all share and enjoy.  And what's better, as a kid, to receive a package in the mail?!

I am writing this on behalf of my dog, who enjoys this product.  He's a fairly strong chewer, this is a sizable bone for 40 lb dog and it keeps him occupied.  So far have had no issues w/ splintering or chipping.  Would buy again.

These cookies are difficult to find in my local store.  I received several packages of cookies.  They came to my door without any of them broken which impressed me because that seldom happens when I purchase them at the store.

Some of the cookies were crumbled.  I also found out that these cookies routinely sell for $2.50 each at walgreens.  Paying more that $4 per for some crubled cookie did not go well.  I will not be purchasing this items again.

These are delicious cookies. what can I say, except that they're crisp with a brown buttery flavor.  They're versatile, as they make great cheesecake crusts.  I'm still playing around with creating different recipes, but I need to hide them.  Otherwise, my family eats them like potato chips.

I first ate these in Ireland. This pub I went to included them with cappuccino. It was perfect. Crunchy, sweet with a distinct flavor like caramel and cinnamon.  If you have no self-control, I do not recommend buying these "biscuits".
The cookies are really good, unlike many airlines' offering(if any). The cookies were well packed, none were broken and were a good value. I have subsequently found them at a national store.
These are wonderful cookies but if you care about appearance a few on the end are always cracked-up pretty good.
So good. I can't get enough of them... I always ask for more on a plane ride. They taste amazing.
There is nothing better then good coffee at a good price, well flavored, great taste, even better out of my Red Soxs mugs, also a Amazon purchase.  Great deal from warehouse.
We got Mexican Nesquik because it was cheaper, but I was surprised when it actually tasted different and better than the US version.  It has a darker chocolate taste which I really like.
this is as good as it gets for great cornbread.  tastes like home made.  will order again
Made with things that are good for you it is also a tasty brew. I drink it before bedtime and it actually helps me sleep better!

I was disappointed... I expected the filling made from fresh apricots.
And this one is made of DRIED apricots. Very big difference. I think the seller should make it clear what the product is.
Loved this.Got it for a gift,but i tried some too.Really gives you a decent sample of some space ice cream.I really enjoyed this,and will order more in the future!!!!!
We loved the astronaut icecream .the other items in the sample pack were ...interesting and worth trying .but the icecream is awesome!
This is such a unique item, we all wanted a piece at Christmas. my 2 year old nephew all the way up to my 52 year old dad. You don't see it every where so it was fun to have!

This makes for an exciting gift for any child.  It opens the door for learning about the space program.  It would be great in conjunction with a trip to Kennedy Space Center and is cheaper than the astronaut food that they sell in the giftshops there.

I bought this for my nephew for christmas and though I haven't given it to him yet I know he's going to love it; any boy would (can't speak for girls though I'm sure they would like it too). I love freeze dried ice cream myself and the space camp theme is great.

Great price! I'm amazed at the hard to assemble collection of Space Food.
They taste great for all occasions. You don't need to be camping or on a Russian Soyuz rocket.
I sent a box to my son who is stationed in Kabul Afghanistan.  He was thrilled to get it and really enjoyed it. He shared some with his fellow soldiers and now they want more!!
All of the items listed on the description were not included in the box.  I was missing at least 4 food items.

First off let me say I am a foodie. The 2 "energy" bars tasted terrible. Of course the other 3 ice cream products are delicious. But for almost $17.00 it is not worth it. Oh and the magnet is just a advertisement and didn't stick to the fridge.
I ordered this because the title says ice cream and food sticks...I received all ice cream. I don't have time to mess with a return. Change the title if it's assorted ice cream.

This is my 2nd order from them, my 1st was the italian roast espresso which was pretty good. I like the french roast a bit more as it does not have any of the charred taste that the espresso did. It's oily and very aromatic, brews wonderfully in my french press & I recommend!

Not a bad coffee but defiantly isn't as good as others. The Dark Brazilian is better in my opinion and the Italian Roast Espresso is the best of the Coffee Bean Direct line, if you love dark roast coffees.

I usually drink French Roast, either Peet's or the Costco variety. This coffee had a distinctive burnt taste, much more pronounced than Peet's. It is drikable, but certainly not in the same league. Will not return, but will only use in latte's, where the taste is mitigated by the milk

This is an excellent product, i bought it after the price of 2% parmalat doubled in price, guess the skim is better for me anyway. Living in the country and not having immediate access to grocery stores having shelf stable milk is a life saver. I keep at least one in the refrigerator at all times.

These bones are awesome! My dogs love them - it's great.

I purchased these for $22, and went back to buy some more and now they are $32 which is a huge increase in price. I don't understand why there was this big increase? I don't really want to buy them anymore.
This is a lot of Fenugreek. We got it to make fenugreek compresses, which help reduce swelling and promote healing
These seeds would not sprout.  I had to return them since I bought them to sprout.  This was a hassle since I had to try to sprout them 2 times to assure it was the seeds and not my mistake.

While I may find other uses for these seeds I wanted them for sprouts. I soaked a couple tablespoons for 24 hours in my sprouter, rinsed twice daily, but after a week still only a few seeds have sprouted.
This made my milk production go way up! The taste is strong but with some honey it is great. It will make you smell like maple syrup so don't freak out. My husband actually kind of liked it!
Sprouts after soaking for one night and waiting about two days. Seems good quality. First time buying fenugreek seeds. Resealable bag.

I used JCS Oxtail & Stew Seasoning as part of my cooking routine. The flavors blended well with my stew and vegetables to give it a unique bold flavor. I would recommend this seasoning as a woman's spice essential.
I have tried many brands of coffee and I always come back to Melitta.  This coffee is the best they have made....not too dark, not too light...simply perfect!

We enjoyed this coffee and would recommend it to others.  The coffee came pre-ground so there was no need for bean grinding.  I would say this is a medium blend coffee without any bitterness.  It would appeal to a variety of people as we certainly enjoyed it.

Moderately flavorful with no trace of bitterness. Low acidity, nice aroma. I had to use significantly more per pot than the package specifies, but that is usually the case with my Cuisinart drip coffee maker.
Recently tried the Melitta Cafe Collection Classique for the first time.  Unbelievable!  It's going to be hard to drink anything else in the future

I only purchased this because it was offered to me free through Vine. I usually buy Starbucks whole bean coffee and grind it myself. I was very surprised at how good this coffee was, even though it was already ground. It is strong and rich and fresh. I'd definitely buy this again!

I like strong coffee.  I like starbucks.  I wanted to like this coffee, but found it not strong enough, even when I tried to double up on the brew strength.  Still, for a weaker tasting coffee, it was good.
This is by far, one of my favorite Melitta coffees of the Cafe` collection. It brews perfect every time. It's robust without being bitter. If you like a good cup of coffee this is a winner.
No disappointments with this coffee. I have always been fond of Melitta coffee and this lived up to their great reputation, although a bit pricey.

I enjoyed this coffee for it's smooth flavor that wasn't extremely strong. It's definitely better than most brands you find in the grocery store. I would recommend this to someone interested in a solid cup of coffee.
This coffee was just so-so; nothing to write home about. I honestly couldn't distinguish it from one of the generic canister brands at the local grocery store.
This coffee hasa full - Robust flavor that is great alone or with a meal!

I usually use fresh ground beans so my expectations were low.  I was quite pleasantly surprised.  This is a rich, flavorful coffee blend, without tasting processed or bitter.  Best of all, it is the perfect grind for a Melitta pot and that makes a big difference.

The coffee was ok. Not as strong as we normally like so I had to use a little more grounds but the flavor was ok then. The bag was one of those re-open bag but it would not open and when it finally did it tore a huge gash down the side. -1 star for each. Don't know if I will purchase again.

The coffee was mellow with a little bite to the finish. Compares favorably to most coffees out there with just a tad more harshness. I found the packaging ridiculously difficult to open - finally taking a scissors to it. The description says "Pack of 3" but I only received 1. Overall a good coffee.

I enjoyed this coffee! It's got a rather bold flavor and is a little sweeter than most coffees, but that's what made it a stand out for me. If you're looking to try something new, then give this flavorful and hearty blend a try!
