I was really surprised about how good this coffee is.  I normally buy a Starbucks or Dunkin Donuts bag at the grocery store but his is right up there in quality and the price is a little better.  The coffee itself is very fresh and has a strong black nutty flavor that I really like.  Enjoy:)

Does have the claimed European flavor -- seemingly between French and Italian.  Better than Folgers, but not as good as premium brands.  A bit weak.  I needed to use more coffee than I usually do to get a strong enough brew.  Not bad, but I'll pass and go with a premium brand.

This is a very nice, "European"-type coffee. It has a very smooth flavor, almost akin to that of chocolate. The quality is high,and it is packed in a Vacu-Pack bag, very good for the preservation of freshness in this high-end coffee. Recommended.
My husband and I tried this coffee in place of our favorite Dunkin Donuts one day and we had to throw out the pot. It was too bitter to drink! We definitely do not recommend this coffee.

We love having fun with the Gold Flakes. Guests chuckle and ohh and ahh over having gold shaken into their cocktals.

The Edible Gold Flakes also make the ultimate hostess gift.

Thanks to the seller, the gold always arrives quickly.
My kids & I love these, they are like rice krispie treats but not as sweet, similar texture and a great snack.

I saw this on Dr Oz about keeping blood glucose steady throughout the night if you take 2 teaspoon fulls before bedtime.  It really does work!!!!  It has a really strong almond taste to it that I don't fancy, but thats what it is.  I can get over that for what I bought it for :)

When I bought this I was hoping it would be like peanut butter but almond flavor.  Its not close.  I suppose if you can't eat peanuts this might be an alternative but I would look at other nut butters.
My doctor suggested I switch from peanut butter to almond butter since I eat so much of it and it is healthier. I spread it on apples, bananas and even my pancakes! Good stuff!
love this stuff although it's not HOT enough so I'll be seeking a more concentrate product. I'm sure that there's some hotter cinnamon oil out there.
My cat loves these! When I take the container out, she get super excited and eats every last flake I give her. She's a very picky eater, and I've never seen her so happy with a treat before.

Neither of our cats was the least bit impressed with this product. The flakes did arrive as scheduled, but remain unused except for small amounts that were presented to the cats in various ways in hopes that they would find the flakes appealing. No joy.

This is about the 5th type of Xylitol sweetener I have tried.  I threw away most of the previous one.  So when I received this "Ideal" I was skeptical...well...it is delicious!  No off-taste, just wonderful.

Stupid me - didn't read the label before buying.  I thought this would be pure xylitol, but later noticed they've added Dextrose with Maltodextrin and sucralose (Splenda) for extra sweetness.  I don't know what proportion of this product is xylitol.
Finally found a non-sugar sweetener that my family likes, no complaints.  I've read that xylitol is not harmful, may actually have benefits (keep away from dogs though) so it's a winner so far.

I know many people say a lot of artificial sweeteners taste like sugar and don't, but this does.  If you sprinkle a little in your hand and taste it, it's amazing how much it taste just like sugar.  Would of given it 5 stars if more sugar came in the box for the same price.

Great product. First no calorie sweetner that tastes like real sugar. Works great for baking. We are two diabetics and I bake cakes, including cheese cake, banana bread, pies and cookies. Can't tell the difference. Love it in my tea too.

Originally tried this because it was on sale, and I figured that even if it was gross I'd only be out a buck. Happily it tastes great, mainly have used it in coffee and tea. Just ordered my second box.

I love this stuff as I drink it everyday with my coffee. I previously used stevia but it seems to leave a nasty aftertaste which is why I love Ideal. It tastes great. Im a pre-diabetic but I've fooled my tastebuds into believing this is sugar.

This is the best so far, no after taste and taste just like real sugar,I have several people using this product now and I am ordering more. I am giving out some of the packets and they really like it.

I like this because 1packet sweetens 4cups of coffee to my liking. the pack seems like it almost has nothing in it. I was mad when i took one out of the box but they deliver an acceptable result when you actually use them. to me one packet compares with 2tsps of sugar.
I tried it, but I just didn't like it.  Not a good tasting sugar substitute in my opinion.  I'd rather do without sugar than use this again.
These crackers are great.  Unfortunately, every box I've bought is about 50% broken.  And that's from several different stores.
Delicious crispy crackers with a wonderful taste of sea salt & olive oil.  I've tried other brands, but this is the best.
keebler townhouse olive oil crackers taste OK but are a waste of money when 80% of minicrackers are broken into 1" pieces
All of the eggs fit together fine and stayed together.  Worked great.  Great value for what you get.  Colors were nice.

Got this in a K Cup sampler, definitely on my reorder list.  Very smooth, no bitter after taste, dark coffee.  So far one of the best, tied with Caribou Mahogany.  If you like good strong coffee with out the bitter after taste, this K Cup is perfect.
Absolutely the best French Roast k-cup I've had so far.  Rich, bold and satisfying.  A little pricey but worth it.
This is one of the best K cups out there. Nice bold flavor.No bitter after taste. If you want a bold K cup try this!
This is my favorite of all of the bold coffees. No bitterness at all. Just very smooth and delicious. I was very surprised to see that it is a product of Green Mountain.
This is by far the best K-cup coffee I have tasted. Has a big bold taste with lots of flavor. Unfortunately the price is too high so will only buy on special occasions.
Not bad, and perfectly drinkable, but bland with no liqueur. Not as bitter as some Columbians I have had, but that, unfortunately, goes back to the 'bland' bit.

This coffee was substituted for a coffee I had ordered in a coffee club. It was $4.00 more than what I usually get and like. It was bitter(harsh) and strong. I thought it was terrible. Quit the coffee club and would not order this again.
It's too bitter (read: over-roasted), but a pinch of salt calms it down nicely, and it does have a good full flavor which, again, would be more noticeable if it weren't so burnt.
I was glad to get the 3 boxes of Starbucks Coffee and it was ok. It may have been around for awhile as the coffee was good but didn't taste Fresh.
This is by far my favorite morning and go-to k-cup.  Great richness and body.  Not weak at all even though it is described as a medium blend.

Canned mushrooms produced in the USA are hard to find these days (many are products of China).  Organic canned mushrooms can also be quite hard to find.  In this product you have all that, and they are very good to boot!

I am very happy with this brand, they are plump & juicy big slices from the whole mushroom, not just a bunch of stems & pieces. And the icing on the cake is that they're organic & sold at a good price.

The labeling on this product is deceptive, I recently purchased this item in the store thinking when it says Pennsylvania Dutch and Americas Favorite Mushroom I was buying food produced in the US only to get it home and find it was a product of China.  How sad that a company would try to do this.
These are great, if you can't find organic at your local store. I buy them on a regular basis. Mushrooms have some great health benifits. Look it up!
I have always used Giorgio Mushrooms, one cause they were a product of the USA!  I ordered the organic ones for the first time & they are just as good!  Will continue buying Giorgio's products!
This brand is only 95 cents per can at my local grocery store ($11.40 for 12).  Canned mushrooms are convenient and the product is good so I gave it 4 stars.
They are great. I love them and eat them every day. They are less expensive at the grocery store than online.

This product is great if you are looking for low carb... I do what is says on the package add some sauce and vegetables, and you have a great dinner... It actually tastes good toooo. I would buy this again..

They came fast and the bags are in good shape.  You really have to be sure to wash and dry these several times. I just put a simple tomato sauce on it and it didn't taste bad at all. But you have to wash them very good and then heat them with what ever sauce you are going to use.
These are alright.  Def. have to rinse them the odor is not pleasant.  The texture is strange a little chewy. They are filling and need to be spiced up with something.  Not sure if I will buy again.
These noodles are best when used in stir fry or with an Alfredo sauce. Tried them as spaghetti and I'm sorry to say they were not good.
These look like noodles, but after that there is no comparing this product to pasta.  The texture is rubbery and there is no flavor.  If you love pasta, you will not love this product.

I am very impressed with these noodles. I microwaved them straight from the bag, without rinsing, served with some pasta sauce and Chicken Parmesan and WOW, very good!! I did not notice any odor.  If you are on a diet, I would give them a try at 20 calories, why not! They don't even need cooked.
My girls hated it.  They gagged as soon as they smelled it....and so did I!  So gross!!  Like dog food but worse.
The cats do not seem to like the Ham baby food as well and the Turkey baby food or the Chicken baby food.  The kittens seem to feel the same way. = They really slurp down the turkey.
There were several different flavors of truffles in the box and they were all great. If you like chocolate truffles, you are going to love this box of candy.

I grew up eating this wonderful candy, in my book there is no better. A bit pricey but well worth it. When I eat Sees Truffles my tummy giggles :-) Thanks Amazon for making this product available. You are my one stop shop these days. Fantastic candy fast delivery

If you're looking for bargain basement chocolates this isn't for you.  But if you want to try a taste you'll never forget and probably buy more, as I did, you can't go wrong.  This is simply the best I've ever had, bar none.  It's expensive, so's an Acura, but both are worth it.
See's, in my opinion, makes absolutely the best chocolate in the United States. I sure wish they would make it eligible for Amazon Prime. I'd get a subscription for 2lbs a month lol.
My daughter moved to a new home in Washington state from San Diego, California. The grandkids loved the housewarming gift.
See's candy is delicious. There were shops in California where I grew up.  Now I live in New England and there is no other way to get it except mail order. I'll take it! ;)
See's makes delicious chocolates; close to the best; but their chipping charges make each purchase a total rip off. I think that every one should boycott See's for that reason.

My cat has kidney problems and has to take three pills twice a day.  It was undoable and gag-inducing until Pill Pockets.  Now he begs for them.  Astounding and miraculous!  Thank you for making these!

Pill pockets are about the only thing I can get my dog to take her medicine in. I would suggest the larger capsules to save money. If you want to only use half or less of a pill pocket, they easily mash together or come apart to make any size.

Our dog now requires twice a day pills and the Greenies Pill Pockets are the easiest and most convient way to accomplish these tasks.  No more scrap of cheese or lunch meat.  Also like the fact that you can pull them apart into smaller "pockets" based on the need.
My dog loves these. It is the only way to give a pill to dogs, no fight, no mess and dog gets the full dose of pill because he thinks he is getting a treat.

My dogs love these and it is very, very easy to get them to take pills using these.  They now look forward to getting pills and don't spit them out.  Just don't let them learn to chew them or they may figure out the pill is inside (i.e. keep feeding them little tidbits after the Pill Pocket).

I purchased 6 packages of Greenies pill pockets to donate to my local shelter. I selected the items off of the Amazon wish list.  I also had them delivered directly to the shelter. They arrived 2 days after I ordered them. Thanks

I could coat a pill in pure hamburger and my dog could figure out how to eat only the burger and somehow the pill ends up in the floor, I swear she chokes it bak up! Not with these! She begs for it now! And eats the whole thing one bite!
I have to give my dog six pills twice a day. He loves it. No more hunting for baloney or cheese and it's better for him.

My doggies give me a hard time when I have to give them a pill. These work especially when I give them fish oil for their coats. I split the pockets as they are too expensive to use on a daily basis.  They love the flavor. They do not like cheese - go figure??

My dog has to take medication every day.  I use the pill pockets to get some of the medications down, and he absolutely loves them.  He just thinks he's getting another yummy treat!  I highly recommend them.
My boxer needed antibiotics for 8 weeks. He loves them. He thinks they are treat and does not notice the medication inside. Also they are a great cost saver online.
My dog has caught on to every way I've tried to give him his meds and stops eating the disguise.  If he knows the meds are in these treats, he doesn't care.  Easiest way to dispense meds to dogs!
Pill pockets are great! My dogs love them. They are soft so perfectly hides the pill medication we give them.
My dog ha s Epilepsy and requires morning medication and evening medication.  4 are capsules.  Works great. I would reccommend this product to any one.

We own a boarding kennel and often have dogs that need a pill pocket to take their meds - some won't eat the beef flavor but are willing to take the chicken flavor.  Great way to convince a dog to take their medications!

Love these. My Corgi is very stubborn and will not open his mouth for a pill...but he thinks these are
a treat. I couldn't find chicken at my Vets and my dog is alergic to beef.
Our dog has the ability to find and spit out the pill despite our hiding them in favorite foods. Greenies Pill Pockets have solved the problem.
I bought the greenies pill pockets beef and chicken flavor. My dog needs medication and these are great to put the meds into. My dog loves these.
I have lived with the hardest dog in the world to give a pill to for 14 years (Lab mix).  Pill Pockets make all the difference in getting her the meds she takes on a daily basis.  Worth the money!
Perfect for pills and capsules for medications for the dog and the dog do not hesitate to take all her medicines.
Both of my dogs take medication on a daily basis and without these pill pockets it would be the biggest hassle ever!!!

This is the easiest way to give your dog medicine. My dog prefers the chicken treats and she comes running everyday to take her meds. Terrific idea and I am only sorry I didn't know about it years ago.
This product makes giving medication a breeze.  Just pop the pill in the center and squeeze shut.  My dog thinks it is a treat.  I love them!
My dogs love these. the pills go down easy, the dog dosen't know the pill is in there. They beg fot these as treats long after the pills are gone.
Fantastic product. I use both the Chicken and the Beef flavor and both are great. It is the only way I can get my dog to take pills. These definitely work well!
The pockets work good for holding the pills (i have several) but some of them fell apart - to help prevent it i put them into the refridgerator! Delivery was fast and effective.
This product makes medicine dosing oh so easy.  Our big ol' chocolate Lab would sell her soul for a Greenies Pill Pocket.
Like the taste and assortment of these, sadly they arrived in the same box as 12 cans and didn't like it very much!! 0/10 to the packing dept.
I gave it a try because of the promotional discount.  The cookies were overpriced and arrived a little crumbled, but were good nonetheless.

I had never heard of Walker's biscuits before and I was really surprised how good they were.  The ginger cookies had pieces of ginger in them - delicious and the chocolate biscuits were different and tasted great.  The honey oat biscuits were also very good.  I would like to order them separately.
I love this tea. I make it strong and mix it with a splash of lemonade.  I copied a similar tea from Starbucks.  I like mine better, plus...it costs less!
This product is wonderful.  Drizzle it on your pizza.  Mediocre to magnificent in mere moments!
i am a cook and this is a special ingredient in one of our most popular salads. it really goes well on a variety of dishes, butthe arugula salad it just makes it have the special kick.

These bottles are very tiny, but man, do they pack quite the taste!!  This is the very best white truffle oil I've ever had!  It's pricey for it's size but you won't regret it.  Try it on popcorn with a sprinkle of himalayan salt, omg, YUM!

This was a nice mild Truffle oil. Usually pay more at Whole Foods or high end grocery store. This was a good quality and tastes great over potatoes and grilled vegetables. Quick Ship, happy with purchase.

I use this on anything that I want to have the scent of truffles on and it never fails.
I've finished a bottle and order two more. Thumbs up!
Thisis excelant value truffle oil and I am very happy with it for summer use on pasta and bread.
Was disappointed with this oil.  Not much flavor and had to use a lot to make up for the lack of taste.

I guess my palate is not as sophisticated as I had thought. I'm a rather adventurous diner but this truffle oil really cashed me out. I tried it on scallops and pretty near had to trash them. I have no idea what amuses people about truffle oil. I gave mine away (ananomously).

I bought these trays because I was originally using plastic ice cube trays and they kept breaking everytime I would take the food out. These trays work wonderful! They slide right out and are the perfect portion size! Love them! A little expensive, but worth every penny!

We recieved our first freezer tray as a gift and I loved them so much that I bought another! We also use the bpa free oxo ice cube trays when we want smaller cubes! Having the two sizes is very helpful!

this freezer tray is not airtight --- so the puree will get freezer burn. I've had to enclose the tray in a plastic freezer bag before storing. I would expect it to work better for the price. However it is very easy to pop-out when ready to defrost.

I received this freezer tray along with the Beaba foodmaker and spoons from my in-laws.  I am totally told on all Beaba products due to the high quality and great designs.  The food pops out easily and leaves no waste behind.

Such a perfect companion to the Babycook! I freeze in this and once the food is frozen, I take them out and put in a labeled ziploc because the lid doesn't quite seal tight enough for my comfort but would definitely purchase again!

We bought two from Williams Sonoma.  I loved them so much that when I saw them listed on Amazon, I bought another one.  They are perfect for making baby food and for freezing small portions of often used items like tomato paste.  I also froze 1 Tbsp portions to use when I cook.  Love this product!
if you freez baby food this is for you!!! very easy to get it out!!!! Gets the job done. Be careful washing it in the dishwasher the plastic top can change its form and after does not cover well.
I love this product! I make all my own baby food and this makes the perfect portion size.  A bit pricy but worth it.

I've been making food for my 7.5 month daugher. so far, I haven't made enough bulk to fill up this food saver. And when she does eat, the amounts she's eating wouldn't even be half of the little serving size that is in this container. I cna't wait to use it when she's a bit older and eating more
Love this freezer tray.  I set it on the counter for approx. 2 minutes and then can easily pop out whatever food I have frozen in the cups.  I love that it comes with its own lid.

These freezer trays are expensive, but worth the money without a doubt.  They are the perfect size for freezing individual baby food portions, and the frozen food pops out easily when you want to transfer it to ziplock bags.  Great product!

The Beaba Multiportion Freezer Tray is perfect for freezing baby food.  I made my own baby food for my two children, and this is a simple way of getting it done quick and easy.  Plus, it is easy to push the frozen portions out after freezing because the tray is flexible.
They make freezing and storing food super easy! Perfect portions, they stack on top of each other and food pops out of the soft shell with ease. Have them in every color! Worth every penny.
I bought two of those to freeze food for my baby and they are great.  The food pops out pretty easily.  I wish they were a little cheaper though.
This freezer tray has nice proportions.  I bought it for a friend who uses it for her food and the baby's.  She thinks it's easy to use and clean and uses it for various foods and juice pops.
The Beaba Multiportion Freezer Tray - Pink was exactly what I expected and more. This is a great item! I love it.
its more expensive than the rest but let me tell you....great quality, easy to clean, to use and works great cuz i have the meals ready to go....WELL PRESERVED
Actually started using this for big ice cubes, but gave it to my daughter for her baby.  Works great.  Love the top.

This freezer tray is excellent - I am actually purchasing another - now that the little one is eating more food,
I'd like to prepare more at once. Frozen items scoop out easily with a spoon. Easy to clean!

We have a friend that recommended this to us.  She makes her own baby food and freezes it in this tray for use later.  We will give it a whirl when our baby arrives.  It seems like a well made product.  It looks like it is good for BIG Jello-shots too!

The lid merely sits on the top, and is a huge pain to get on and off, especially since we use this to freeze milk. Half the time it spills everywhere while I'm moving it to the freezer. Sooo annoying but at least the bottom is silicon. It will be useful for baby food and less-liquid things.
Love this freezer tray. great portion size, easy to use, dishwasher safe, and bpa free for baby. would purchase again (I actually wish I had a few more!)

I am just so in love with these trays!  I now have four!!!  I have used them for baby food and have even whipped up a batch of pesto and frozen it.  Once your food is frozen, they literally just pop right out!  I couldn't be happier with these!
I bought this as a gift. The person who received it really likes the product
Came to me with a chipped lid.  I wrote an email to the company to see what I could do and no one responded.
Unfortunately, Made in China. I do not trust their manufacturing standards.  Looking for an alternative....
This listing sells the freezer tray for nearly $50 when all other retailers sell for 19.95. Make sure you look before you buy.
I wasn't sure what these consisted of when I ordered them,but I was very pleased w/the taste & the texture... Very sweet w/a kind of sugary marshmallow texture :)

Have started sprouting again and am enjoying these seeds.  I use them in my salads and sandwiches.  They add a good crunch and help with a flavor bite.  The amount of radish seeds seem to give the right spice to the mixture.
Tasty mix of sprouts.  Easy to grow.  I keep them in the freezer and expect this bag to last a very long time.
the mix came quickly and was very sproutable.  i have lots of seeds to sprout for a long while.  it's great.
delicious mix, fast shipping, i weighed it when i got it and it was ever so slightly over a pound, so i'll buy again!
I'm new to sprouts. I bought these and have been adding them to my salads and I'm enjoying them a lot.
I've just gotten back into sprouting again. This is the best seed product I've used yet.  The seeds sprout quickly, are all fertile and produce great sprouts.  Highly recommend.
They grow well in my sprouter and the taste great. Sometimes I just eat them plain.
These sprouts tasted great together and my family loves them too! We put it on our salad and sandwiches.

I love this mix. It's not too strong but you know it's in your juice. The germination rate is really high as well. I feel like I received an excellent buy for the money. I would come back again to purchase this product.

The seeds sprout well, it is true, but there is a bitter taste to this mixture. I use them on sandwiches and I thought there was something wrong with the non-fat mayo. Plain alfalfa sprouts taste much better.

We use the seeds sparingly to grow sprouts to use on sandwiches, salads, etc.  Easy to grow, and the variety of seeds adds a punch to the flavors.  I highly recommend this product for ease of use and taste.

Good quality seeds......a pound goes a long way.
Nice combination of seeds.
This combination does have a flavor zing. I don't know if its a radish or broccoli seeds that add the spicy flavor.
Very tasty.
Really nice mix of seeds, and a good value. So convenient not having to drive to the health food store for seeds!
I love these sprouts - not only are they healthy but they are tasty as well.
This was spicier than what I usually prefer.  Good change of pace in my salads, but I prefer the Broccoli sprouts.

Not only are the seeds great, but the customer service is the best I've experienced in my over 10 years of on line shopping.

In my opinion 5 stars are not enough!

This was a great mix for micro greening or sprouting. I used them mostly for micro greens as I have ADHD and almost always kill off my sprouts. This mix tasted great in everything I made; salads, sandwhiches, quiche, stir fry, shakes, anything.

I am so grateful to be able to obtain this organic seed combination and grow my own sprouts for daily consumption.  I use them as almost a full salad and not as "dressing" for a salad of lettuce, spinach.
Sprout seed mix arrived very promptly and in great condition.  I needed them for our local farmers market and will be ordering more very soon.
Good sprouting yield and great price.  Sprouts are a little bitter, don't know if it is the broccoli part that is causing the sprouts to be bitter.
good price, makes for nice sprouts, wish it were just a tad been stronger with the radish, I love the spicy bite.  shipment was fast, thanks!
I have been sprouting Alfalfa seeds for years.  I thought I would try this mix and was pleasantly surprised.  The radish gives it just enough of a bite to be interesting, but not overwhelming.

We really like these spicy little sprouts, which give a salad a nice kick! They're ready to eat in 3-4 days. This blend is a good value, especially since they're organic. They shipped quickly as well.

This was my first time sprouting and it was a great experience. My seeds were starting to sprout within 24 hours and mostly all sprouted by the second day. Quite a tasty mix too! I enjoy a salad with just sprouts more than a lettuce salad.
This mix was OK and the price is reasonable, but there are a lot of unusable seeds in the bag that do not sprout - I'd say about 25%.
Put these sprouts on a sandwich and it becomes a gourmet meal. They last a long time in the fridge too. I am a customer for life. I just wish they made a bigger quantity to buy.

Love these sprouting seeds. The mixture adds a tangy interest to the sprouts.
Great in salads and on sandwiches. We live in a remote area with limited access to fresh produce. These sprouting seeds add freshness to our sandwiches and salads.
These lowfat Frosted Strawberry ones taste just as good as the others, I honestly can't tell the difference.
They were probably really good. The ants thought so anyway. The ants got to them before we could. I do not know if the ants got there from wherever they were shipped or from sitting on my porch.
This was a gift for someone that loves pop tarts thanks so much he was so pleased and I know they will last for a while.

I absolutely love poptarts even though they aren't the healthies breakfasts, I buy the low fat version and save half the fat of the regular version and I think they taste better, they are crispier when toasted.  The price is also right on amazon.com.
I like pop-tarts, and a pack of 12 is a convenient way to house them.
My first time having soda flavored candy. It breaks into a powder on the first bite and really does taste like the Ramune soda. It is also fun to find the ones that have little faces on them.
Crunchy.  Came packaged well.  If you are thinking they are going to be like FunYuns, you would be wrong.  They are VERY mild flavored.  They are ok, but nothing I would crave for sure.
Tried this with 40% off since Nong Shim instant noodle is my favorite, my ten year old son like it very much, I would like this with the stronger flavor.

it's my favorite snack. Amazon has the best price ever for this.

cheaper than korean grocery website and korean market.

I'm gonna order again
Not heavy on taste...low fat and 0 trans fat.  Everyone loves these...trying to buy more but Amazon is out of stock!!!! OMG
I hate to say this, but this snack is terrible. No onion flavor what-so-ever.  All it does is gum up your teeth.

Don't waste your money on these. These are practically flavorless, yet still feel a little greasy in your mouth. Yuck.

If you're looking for some great onion-flavored snacks, just buy the Alexia Onion Strips. They're light years ahead of these. Seriously.

Frankly, I have no idea if this really cleans the dog's teeth.  But, our excitable dog can become a nuisance when company comes.  By the time he finishes one of these large treats, he has calmed down.

My dog loves these dental treats.  I had no idea dogs like peppermint, so was hesitant to purchase at first.  Now I'm a repeat customer.  I alternate these with Greenies dental treats for variety.  Make sure to have plenty of fresh water handy since the peppermint seems to make the dog thirsty.
These are great dental treats and have the VOHC seal of approval, which helps me believe they are truly effective.
The product is great, but the shipping was alot. I want to order it again, but I won't because of the shipping.
I can't recommend this company enough.  I always receive my Pepsie's within two days.  The price is far less than I pay for it here. Plus I get it delivered to my door.

I paid $15 for Kit Kat 4pk 70% Cocoa Dark Chocolate and received ONE pack, not four. When I queried the company, they ignored me. Unless you are comfortable paying $15 for a small candy bar, I would avoid these guys.
Although a bit hard for my cat to chew at first, she loves them now and can't wait to get her treats!

The tea is what it was advertised as! The tea tin and packaging were also in excellent condition. The tea tastes nice, just like normal english breakfast. They are non string tea bags, round instead. Lovely for a gift!
I used to eat this all the time when I was a kid but unfortunately, they stopped producing it for a while. Then suddenly, its back again. I love it! Its really, really tasty :)
This noodle is not made in Japan, is from Hong Kong, the price in supermarket is about 0,45$ each. Please be a honest seller!!!!
Lovely oil, great for pasta, grains, bread. Wish I had bought white oil, I like that better.Very comprable to what I bought in Italy in the local store.

Good quality, I found it at a good price. My wife loves to cook and it is one of her favorites tricks for giving excellent flavor to the meals. I highly recomend it.Urbani Black Winter Truffle Infused Oil, Bottle, 55-ml Bottles (Pack of 2)

Great value for an infused truffle oil, however I enjoy the White Oil better for basically the same price.  I'm sure I'll use it all up and then just order that one instead next time.  They're both good.  Love it in mushroom quiche or garlic mashed  potatoes!
The smell alone will make you salivate, it is that good. It comes with rock sugar mixed in, so I don't ever use any added sweeteners.
Love the ginger ale! Best ever. Took a bit to get it but it was worth the wait.However, my credit card was comprimised when I ordered from Amazon. I probably won't order from them again.

We have been waiting for Earl Grey Decaf and now it is here. My wife love it. She now can drink either Earl Grey or English Breakfast. It gives her a choice.

The Earl Grey is not as strong as the English Breakfast.
Love this product.  The tea is smooth yet hearty which is tough to find in a decaf tea.  Perfect!  Highly recommend.
It is so nice to have this tea in a decaffeinated k-cup.  It keeps all its flavor and is a warm, delicious, comforting brew to have on hand.  It is great with milk and a little bit of sugar!
This Earl Grey Tea has a zing to it, that I didn't have with a different brand.  My husband likes the zing, I am not sure about it.  It's worth trying, if you want a black tea that isn't real strong.

I love this tea, especially in the K-cup!  The flavor is delicate; the citrus note from the bergamot sets it apart from regular black tea.  And there is none of the mess I experience with tea bags!  I bought this to make my mother-in-law happy, but this has become my favorite evening drink.
The tea was OK but had an odd "flowery" after-taste. I like teas that are more "pungent" so this one was not totally my preference - but, as I said, OK.
Refreshing taste love the decaf, because I can have some before bed, still resting well, quick delivery. Twining's is a good brand, it doesn't taste like your drinking tea dust in the bags
I like Earl Grey tea as a change from black tea or green tea.  It has a very pleasant scent and taste to it that I find very relaxing.

A distinctive decaf tea is hard to find.  I want a black tea taste but have rebuffed other decaf teas because they are flat and have weak flavors.  Early Grey decaffeniated has enough flavor and no flat taste residue.  I drink it at night to unwind and have no worries that I will be up all night!
this is a very good earl grey tea and i would recommend it to anyone who enjoys a quality tea
This tea is a wonderfully tasting tea.  It has a great aroma and lifts the spirits!  The price was good as well.
You can't beat the convenience and the tea is strong enough you can get a double volume on one keurig cup.
tea has excellent flavor. it is a little expensive but very convenient and great when you don't want to wait for the kettle.
Getting 2 boxes of the Classic Twinings Earl Grey decaf k-cups for such a low price is awesome.  Love the taste of Earl Grey and the convenience of k-cups and autoship.
strong flavored tea the way I like it. I already went through one box in a couple months since I don't use the machine as much as I would like to.

Bought this product when I was having a problem and had to give up coffee. I like it so well that I use it all the time now
mitchell880
Makes a great iced tea.  Make it and chill it and pour it over ice later on.  Works great!
This stuff is great. I just had to give it a good rating. I didn't know if I'd like this, but my fiancée suggested we get this instead of the other tea varieties and that was a good call.
Strong oil smell is nice, but the flavor is a bit bland. I prefer the Bigelow. And no, I don't work for Bigelow. :)

Great price for a great tea.  To have the ability to enjoy my decaffeinated tea with the convenience of my Keurig is one of life's greatest pleasures.  Each cup is fresh with all the Bergamot I enjoy from a full brew.  Dont' be fooled by the decaf, this truly is a full bodied Earl Grey.
I'm not a fan of boiling water for 1 cup of tea nor am I a fan of green tea.  This tastes good and is not bitter. It's convenient and can be flavored and savored in under a minute.
This tea was fine...just not my favorite.  I prefer flavored herbal teas, but tried this for regular tea.  It has an unusual flavor, but I do like it for something different.
I'm a big earl gray fan and I loved the deal and taste of this tea!  Will definitely keep my subscribe and save order  on this tea and recommend it.
This tea is not only decaf, but tastes wonderful.  Has a real smooth taste.  Relaxes me and if my tummy is upset, helps.  I love this tea.
Got this tea quickly,and have enjoyed it. I love Earl Grey tea, and it is so easy with the Keurig.
I have a hard time finding Earl Grey tea cups in the stores...they sell English Breakfast...but I really prefer Earl Grey...this was the best price I found...

Wasn't sure I'd really care for this tea - as a k-cup option.  It's WONDERFUL! It's the perfect blend of tea and all you have to do is brew it in a minute. Add a touch of honey and sit and relax while the tea warms you up!

Recently removed caffeine from my diet I thought life was over, until I found these Twinnings Earl Grey Decaffeinated K-Cups. The flavor is great, convenience is awesome and the value is much better than I have found anywhere else.
I thought it was caffeinated. I was wrong. It put me out of energy for 20 days. Never again. BUT, the taste is good. A little strong though
THIS IS FOR MY SUNTS FOR CHRISTMAS THEY LOVE THIS KIND OF TEA AND NOW THAT IT IS K-CUPS THEY ARE EVEN HAPPIER.

Love Twinings Earl Grey in regular form, thought this would be a good choice for a cup of tea or 2 in the evening.  To be honest decaf tea is rarely satisfying, and this is the best of the options available.  Sorry Twinings, I love you I really do, its not you its me...decaf is not my cup of tea.
This is at best an average tea. It's not bad, just not great. I'd give it a 7 out of 10. I tend to think the Keurig, while a great coffee maker, is not the best tea brewer.
I loved the Celestial Seasonings Earl Grey Decaf, but apparently it's discontinued and this has replaced it.  I don't like this nearly as much as the Celestial Seasonings.  Bah!  I feel betrayed.
This is the first K-cup and Tea product from Twinings that no one enjoyed in our family. If I could have returned it, I would have after the first cup, but this item is not returnable.
Was led to believe that this product was individual tea bags not loose tea which requires special brewing equipment and now I'm stuck with product I can't move.  Chef Joseph
Great for eating straight out of the box, not great for recipes requiring melted chocolate. Does not melt well, tends to dry out.
Shared it with some Navy folk, and i got a lot of requests for more. Still one of my fave treats.

Light. Crispy. Chocolate!  I had the hardest time finding these delicious cookies, but finally an Amazon vendor got some in and I ordered right away. The airy wafers are coated in milk chocolate without being weighed down by it. Yum.

Please see my other review for more details (vanilla Halvah).

This is a confection bar with fine-ground sesame seeds with pistachios mixed in.

If you like sesame, and pistachio, you will probably like Halvah.
This chocolate is the best thing ever - made my dad really happy to get a shipment of these for Father's Day
Wal-Mart sells this product. Tried to find on internet what grocery store carried it, found none. It was a freak accident when i saw it in Wal-Mart $2.96 for large container!!!!

I have used Cavender's for about 25 years, more or less, and this salt free MSG free is as good as the original. It has a great smell and tastes delicious. We don't miss the salt at all. I can't get this in my stores yet but I am happy I can order it through my faithful Amazon.
I have used Cavender's for years. It tastes great on meat and veggies. I haven't found anything I can't season with it

This has become my favorite seasoning. I try to cook without salt and this is an excellent substitute. It is not over-heavy with oregano as most greek spice mixtures are. I use it every day. I just ordered two more online to replenish my supply!

The Salt free version has a very acidic taste that melts when in contact with your mouth.
Just my two cents ...
This is a must-have for Buffalo chicken wings. Most of the seasonings on the market have salt as the first ingredient. If not, no taste. Cavendar's is a staple in our pantry.
Cavender's All pupose salt free Greek Seasonings are great.  I use them for meat rubs and in recipies.  It's a very good product.
This is the best stuff!  I use it on everything.  Steaks, fish, casseroles, and just like salt and Pepper.  It has a great flavor and without all the salt.
It is difficult to find gluten free food that tastes good. This granola is exceptional! It is very tasty, with sweet cranberries and crunchy cashew nuts. Price is on a high end unfortunately.

with celiac disease, i have problems with travelling and finding appropriate breakfast foods.  love this granola and it is perfect with yogurt.  just wish i could get it in a large box rather than individual packets for home use.  thanks gluten freeda!
I order the plum bonsai tree and it was packed good the tree came happy and is growing beautiful I'm very satisfied I will buy more bonsai trees from this company.

great not the cheap kind - i bought the 6.5 gallon one
and has tons of caramel on the popcorn unlike cheaper products - brush brush brush LOL
taste and look fresh

These arrived intact and not melted.  I was happy with the product and the price, and Amazon's quick delivery.  These and the peanut butter eggs are my favorite because they seem to have more peanut butter than the regular PB cups.
Ordered these for my mom, they came quickly, and she loved their peanut butter filled taste.  Arrived in great shape.

Fed to dog and she got violently sick and vomited the whole this up after eating it. Don't buy this product if you love your pet!!Nylabone Healthy Edibles Bone, Roast Beef Flavored with Vitamins, Regular Size, Triple Pack
... but it's gone in 60 seconds :-).  Considering the cost of the bone and how fast it disappears I will only be buying intermittently,
Our black lab devoured this thing in 10 minutes, and at $6 a pop, that's way too much money for a dog treat.  Don't bother getting this.
My dog chewed it up & made it disappear in about 5 minutes, while I was emptying the box. He definitely likes it but its a little costly to go so fast.
The product was exactly as described.  Wolf is Healthy Edible's code for large.  I do wish that this vendor would sell more than 9 units of this item at a time.

I do NOT recommend these.  My six month old Golden Retriever, who is not a strong chewer, devoured this in less than five minutes.  It is a very expensive treat and I'm just hoping we don't have to pay a vet bill on top of the price of the Edible Nylabone.  I will never buy these again!!!
Good reviews and my Maltese loves it!  We buy and switch up all the flavors.  I usually mix with their dry small bites (also very good).
These cordials are very hard to find, so I was so excited to find them online, that I ordered 3 bags and have been enjoying them ever since.

fabulous and very tasty item. I imeeditaley stuffed a dozen with chopped lamb and rice and seasonings. let them sit in a pickling brine over night...
absolutely fantastic...
yummu

My cat, Mango, just loves this cat food.  It is the only brand of food that he will eat on a daily basis.  I have also purchased Fussie Cat brand "Tuna with Salmon" from Amazon.com and he loves this food also.  I try to alternate the food on a daily basis to give him variety.

My cat loves almost all the "Fussie Cat" flavors, and the this one most of all. He's very picky, so I'm pleased to find something he'll eat reliably. It also seems to be of good quality and is quite reasonably priced.
This is the best product for the best price esp without shipping.  Strictly uses products made in USA so it is safe for my pup.  Will buy again!!
this is the closest thing to  going  to norway..great taste, fresh and very satisfying ( if you appreciate pickled herring)..far better than anything available in your local supermarket..

I'm not a huge fan of flavored tea, but the Raspberry Black Tea K-cups are great! My Keurig machine has an iced-tea option, so maybe that is why I am satisfied with my brew each time. I can also use 1 K-cup twice. The second one is weaker, of course, but it's still has a great flavor.

I was excited to purchase this tea and found out thats its not good.  I brewed it on small setting and big, very weak, not of quality.  I have one of the Raspberry and one lemon I have to figure out how to get rid of.

Just got these in today and opened up 2 of the packages to put them in the cookie jar. They were not any broken and they are delicious. So full of chocolate chips!!!! I recommend these to anyone to get. They came to me in a large box with other things I ordered and they were in great shape.
I received these recently without any problem at all with the shipping. All cookies arrived intact and the taste is excellent. They are soooooo goood!!! They can be addicting.

Unlike some of the other reviewers, my cookies arrived in tact!  In fact, out of the 4 containers less than 6 cookies were broken.  The cookies were delightful.  So good in fact that these will be the cookie of choice for Santa this year.  So go grab a glass of milk and indulge in these cookies.
These were very good cookies. I loved the texture and flavor. a nice surprise from a packaged cookie. I would buy again.

Received product, which I purchased from Amazon.  Not a single cookie survived transit.  Nothing but crumbs.  Simply not worth getting from Amazon unless they do a better shipping job.  I would stay away from anything that is fragile at least in the sense of foods and groceries.
I enjoyed the cookies very much - in fact, I saw them on sale at the grocery store and bought more.  Good stuff.
Overall, a very good brand of store-bought cookiees. Nothing beats fresh homemade cookies, of course, but if you don't have the time, these cookies are actually pretty tasty.
well it was nice that they showed up early but they were all broken into itty bitty pieces. i didnt order pieces of cookies i ordered whole cookies.

Keebler Chips Deluxe Coconut,18-Ounce Packages (Pack of 4)
The cookies are great but someone in Amazon's shipping department took a pack for themselves! I only received 7 packs but paid for eight. The package had not been tampered with. The shame!

I searched and searched for a tea that tastes like the tea I get at my favorite Japanese restaurant and I was so happy to discover this brand.  I have turned several friends onto it also.  What I also appreciate is how affordable it is.  Sip and enjoy!

This is my favorite tea. Regular green tea tastes a little bitter to me. The addition of the brown rice gives this tea a nice smokey flavor. In the winter I drink at least two cups a day...I can't get enough!
I love this tea.  I can drink it all day long, and I find it very comforting and satisfying.  It is especially pleasant on a cool or stormy day.

The first time I tried this tea in the Japanese restaurant and fell in love to it.
It is my favorite tea.... I love it!
I drink a lot of tea and this was a nice tea for a change. Lightly flavored and quite tasty.
One of my favorite teas!  Shipping was great and very fast!  I could drink this tea all day long...And to think it is also so good for you.  Too  bad it is not available at nearby stores.

Ive been looking for this brown rice tea like forever! I just can't seem to find this in the groceries so i didn't hesitate getting one when i found out it was on amazon. thank goodness! it's so YUMMY! it feels like I'm in Japan

The Genmai Cha tea I purchased is quite wonderful.  It takes a few cups to get hooked on its delightful flavor but then it's terrific to start off a day with. I use honey and sometimes a bit of cream which adds to its richness.  I recommend it highly to tea enthusiasts.
At my local market, they sell this fragrant, nutty, excellent tea for $1.99 a box! $4.99 a box is highway robbery! Shop around!

Great prices on this product!

Prompt shipping and everything was as it should be.

This is one of the lowest calorie dressings I have found, and I was very excited to be able to buy it in bulk and save money.

Plus the delivery to my house is great!

It is not real macha.
I'm kinda disappointed with that.
I expect that is green, but actually it is dark.
I really like this snack.  It goes well with tea. Not too many calories and good flavor (a little spicy and a little sweet).
it was ok i thought it would be tastier i probably won't buy it again. it was very bland and didnt satisfy my taste buds
We often have a bag of this sitting around at work for snacking. Really a contrast from other snack foods.

I bought these on a whim and I have to say, worth it.
These are so tasty I have to keep them in stock. My new favorite comfort snack. Goes great with beer.
This is perhaps my favorite of all the Haldiram flavors. I don't eat spicy or too hot foods, and this has the perfect sweet and salt taste. Good as a snack or appetizer.

this is very good! I've used GNC products in the past, but I like this one because they have more and different flavors and it leaves me much more full than the GNC stuff. I will buy this from now on.
40g of protein, great nutrition, minimal sugar and fat, and excellent flavor.  What more can you ask for in a protein shake?  I've tried many other shakes and I always come back to Labrada Lean Body.

I drink one of these everyday. The strawberries and cream RTD is probably my favorite, which cookies and cream being second. These are perfect for when you are out and can't get some sort of healthy snack.

Can't drink this, have an allergy to BOTH Dairy & Soy Products!
Make it a true dairy and soy free product then i could buy and consume it!
I am very impressed with these country ham slices. A very high quality prooduct greatly exceeds standard racecar driver ham slices from the supermarket. Great flavor not too salty or too sweet.
This tea is very tasty. I drink one cup of hot tea in the morning and at night, with a little honey and equal. Makes me very relaxed and calm.
First found this marmalade at an Irish trade show. Loved it then, love it now.

This is really good with a rich and intense lemon flavor. I did not want to use alone as much as I wanted to use for a base for a dressing or glaze (ala recipes seen on cooking channel). I am well satisfied.
Very quick in getting my order to me.  Would order from them again
I love this seasoning for my chicken. So easy to make too! Great stuff!!!
This soup makes the greatest Pampered Chef Mediterranean Salad Dressing!
I love it. It makes a great cream sauce as well. I use it on chicken or to season potatos and there are never left overs! its great!
This is a great product, very fresh and all meat, thank you for such a healthy food for cats who need so much more protein than dogs, no grain fillers-- cats love it!
It looks like actual, human-grade food when you open the can. You can feed this to your cat with confidence.  My hard-to-please, anorexic cat really loved this food; I wish we'd found it sooner.

I love this in the morning.  Gives you some get up and go without caffeine, although it does taste good when added to coffee.  Best way to mix is to add to a little bit of water until fully disolved, then fill the cup up.

I am soon having bariatric surgery and have been trying many high protein supplements as I prepare for a new eating regimend.  This hot chocolate tastes great!  I would never guess that it is a protein product if someone gave it to me without my knowing what it is.

I like the convience of the McDougall soups.  This is not my favorite.  It seems to need bread with.  I use these soups for work.  Most of them are very filling and taste great.  This one taste really good.  But, I seem to be a little hungry.
I am always looking for good tasting vegan products.  Although I enjoy other Dr. McDougall soups, I didn't care much for the White Bean & Pasta soup. I would not buy it again.

I doubt this is something you are going to routinely fix at home (unless your a no-cook bachelor).  This is however tastey and great to keep in the desk drawer for those busy days when you can't break for lunch (Or forgot it like I do).

I like this soup very much.  The only other McDougall soup I've tried is the Lentil Couscous which is OK.  This one is much better IMO.  At only 170 calories, it's surprisingly filling.  I eat it with a salad and really enjoy it.

This white bean and pasta soup has a lot of vegetable pieces that I enjoy. Being low in sodium and still remaining vegan is very important to me. Make sure that you follow the directions about letting it sit for a few minutes. Otherwise the beans will not soften up.

our little family of three are all super health nuts, even my 4th grader. When she comes home from school and wants something warm in her stomach, she will just fix a Dr. McDougalls soup for herself. This is a great product for a quick wholesome meal.

I love this soup. I have it for lunch & it's helped me lose weight. Just keep it covered and heating ay least 5 extra minutes than it says on package directions or the pasta & carrots won't be cooked enough.
Flavorful and super healthy.  I highly recommend following the instructions.  If you deviate from them in the slightest way you will paint the inside of your microwave with this stuff.

I love this soup but like alot of these Dr. McDougall's soups you have to watch them when cooking and cut time off the full and 20% power.I also recondmend you let it sit for 5 minutes to soften beans up before cooking or after cooking with a 30 second 50% power after the soften time for heat.

There's nothing really wrong with this soup. It's a little bland, and there isn't enough there to make it a meal. It would be okay for an afternoon snack, though. The beans and pasta DO soften up fine, if you follow the directions.

We buy several flavors of McDougall's soups for winter outdoor activities. These are absolutely the greatest. They taste great, easy to carry in a backpack, no meat or dairy (vegan) and are ready in about 5 min after adding hot water.

Perfect for skiing!!!

I like just about all the Dr. McDougall foods. The taste of this one if pretty mild, but good.

I have a hard time getting the pasta to fully cook, and usually have to add more water and cook longer than indicated on the package.
This was just okay.  There are better choices like the Black Bean or Split Pea
i've tried every flavor of these mcdougall soups now and i really like them all.  they're the perfect eat-at-your-desk quick lunch!

I sent this to a friend who needs lower sodium items. Arrived right on time and she says it is very good. She is pleased and so am I.

Virginia Aucoin
Purchased these for first time.  No second time.  The beans will not soften up nor will the pasta.
I use the lemon and orange in a lot of things; esp iced tea. And orange in rice, oatmeal, other things to cut calories. One drop and delish!

I use lemon zest in a lot of my baking recipes.  I like to add a little bit of this lemon oil, in addition to lemon zest.  My results yield a heartier dose of lemon flavor, that taste completely natural-- which it is!
I really like this cocoa butter. It makes excellent chocolates! I would definately order again. Good quality. Shipped quickly. Very happy overall.

Very pretty to drop a few rose buds in a cup of tea but found it to have disappointedly weak rose flavor as a tea itself.
Perhaps the other rose teas I've had were infused with flavoring. Not sure.
Outstanding cheese with some personality.  Grates well for pasta, potatoes, omelettes.  Wine - while fine with some Spanish (and other) reds, this cheese is especially tasty with a peary Sauv Blanc.

THIS IS "GREEN GOLD"; I DISCOVERED IT WHILE LIVING IN CALIFORNIA AND ALWAYS KEPT IT IN THE KITCHEN; IT'S NOT SOLD DOWN HERE IN THE SOUTH THAT I KNOW OF; IT'S TASTY ON SO MANY FOODS; IT'S NOT ONE OF THOSE DELICIOUS GUILTY FOODS EITHER.
I used to buy this in the grocery store, but it looks like I'll be going online for it from now on.  This is the best taco sauce out there.  Even the La Victoria Red Mild doesn't compare.

My dogs are use to chicken jerky. They were apprehensive at 1st. I kept the buffalo put away for awhile, now they seem to love it. Go figure? Anyway it last longer than chicken jerky. I give them both alternataly. No jerky made in China, be careful of that.
I got my nestle nestum cerelac and my product was open one of the can was open. I would like to no if there is an reimburse.

Great flavors and crunchiness.  Sometimes gluten free food can be bland, but these are really flavorful.  This is also a great buy if you compare only buying one bag of these to the variety that you get.

Tea tastes wonderful! No weird "fishy" smell, or "muddy" taste like some have said about other suppliers. Individually wrapped 100 tea bags.

Shipping: Product came fast and in great condition.

This is the second time I have ordered this tea. It has a wonderful flavor and very smooth.
I drink two cups every morning instead of coffee now. I was drawn to this product because
of Dr. OZ.
The flavor is different,and a little 'earthy' for us, but we brew it together with another tea which works well.  This is a good value.
Great product and it came EARLY!!!! I wasn't sure I was going to get this product or even like it, but it has a great taste & it came early!

Exactly as I remembered as a child (50 years ago) and my mother and great nephew love this candy. I didn't have to wait long to receive the mints (8 pounds). great purchase.
thanks

These are hard to find flavor..My husband loves these....rec'd order fast & product was perfect....2nd time ordering and will continue ...My husband eats these like candy....don't know if thats good or bad... but I do know he loves them and his breath always smells great !

I like my tic tacs powerfully flavored and the cherry passion pack has two terrifically intense flavors.  The wild cherry are wonderful and the passion fruit are delicious, making this combination wonderfully delicious.
i keep a empty crystal lite see through container filled with tic tacs in my car i choose several different flavors and mix them up
Excellent service!  Excellent Price!  Excellent Product!  I can't keep the dog off the phone telling her friends how much she is enjoying her Best Buddy Treats!  I have a very happy dog!
My dog loves the treats!!! I have a yorkie and they are just the right size for him. I let a friend give her dog some and they loved them also.

I was introduced to Taj Mahal by an Indian women who used it as the base for a wonderfully flavored chai using mostly ginger and cardamom.  I have been a fan ever since.  It is strong - only for strong black tea drinkers.

I recently purchased a large box of Taj Mahal tea through Amazon.com. The order was promptly shipped and received, was fresh, and met my expectations. Taj Mahal is a superior import tea from India and I highly recommend it.

Indian tea with a delicious aroma and intense flavor. a brand that I have met often in India and which I had pleasant memories . often i prepare the variant " chai masala " with fresh milk , cardamom , cinnamon , fresh ginger root and sugar. warmly recommended .
I had to cook a few small batches to get them just right,  but I love the fresher, less salty taste. I do recommend putting the package in a ziplok bag since they exude fat.
These are a great source of protein and healthy alternative to potato chips. Will buy again. Nothing in this world taste like a warm fresh pork rind.

Purchased the individual microwave packs from another Amazon suoolier. They were great! Thought I'd try this brand since it was less expensive. I feel that these are just as tasty,have more flexability with serving size, and are a better value.
The pork rinds cooked up fairly well in the microwave, but the smell was less than appetizing and the taste was fair at best.

These pellets really popped well.  I've tried three different brands of pork rinds. These seem to fluff the best in the shortest time with the least salt taste.  I'm sorry I only bought one bag to try them but I will have to get more.
Truly a great product. We were amazed that it would have so much flavor after running it through the microwave. Awesome stuff

These taste fine and are less calories than the pre-fried ones.  Taste better plain than pre-fried ones as well.  Not all of them pop though, so there is a little waste.  One serving seems smaller after popping than the ones you buy at the store pre-popped.  Good deal though.
I purchased this jam for gifts for Christmas. Everyone loved the jam and my family thoroughly enjoyed it. Thank you so very much.

I was thrilled to find the Maury Island Jams on Amazon.
The items were received very quickly, packed very efficiently.
I will definitely purchase them again, as all the jams are
excellent!

This product that I recieved was old... My dogs turned their nose up at it... My dogs really love this when they are fresh... These must have been over 1 yr old... I can't believe that Amazon had sold these... Bad, Old, Products...

My dog really loves these, and I do think (with the help of the occasional brushing) that these help her teeth stay cleaner. She just loves to munch on one and it keeps her busy for a bit, which is more than i can say for some of those wimpy treats that just add sticky gunk to your dogs teeth...

My beagle loves these bones. We give them to her every sunday as a treat after clipping nails, getting a bath or cleaning her ears. She gets so excited when I pull one out of the bag. She loves them so much that I have signed up for subscribe and save to receive them every month.
I got this as a gift for my brother and he loves it!  He frequently pits and stuffs his own olives and loves this great kitchen tool.  Also good for stuffing dates!
If you like stuffed olives get this.  Only compliant is pain to clean.  Easy to use.  You can make much better olives then expensive ones in store.
The Olivator is fabulous! You can use it to put bleu cheese in olives for martinis. It works really well and is easy to clean.
This is an excellent product. Very nicely made and fits great into your hand. Very easy to stuff olives with this! Don't get those cheap looking stuffers, get this one!

I made excellent pie crust with Mochiko sweet rice flour, which was recommended by a recipe I had.  The crust was tender, moist and flaky.  It was so tender that it broke easily, but I was able to manage it by rolling it out on plastic wrap.  And the taste was to die for!

This was the least expensive of the sweet rice flours on Amazon.  I use sweet rice flour in most of my gluten free recipes...combined with various other ingredients as a regular wheat flour substitute.  I consider this a necessary ingredient to help things hold together.
I really like this kind of flax seed. I've been eating flax seed with my meals for 2 years and this is the best I've stumbled upon
I still have some of this; I didn't expect it to have much of a flavor, being so small, but it definitely is nutty. I have this as a snack for my daily fiber! :)

A bunch of flax seed in a sealed plastic bag.  I grind these up and put them in my morning oatmeal.  Nice source of fiber and good fats.  Barry Farms was great as always (3 orders with them so far), and I'm really liking the idea of flax seed in my diet.

I am currently deployed so getting good coffe like we can easily access back at home isn't always readily available. But this canister has still lasted us quite a bit and everyone loves the taste. and considering our location, it got here within a reasonable amount of time.
This coffee is great, don't buy it here, though.  Your local grocery store will have it for much less and your local Sam's club will have it for less than $13.
My Bengal kitten loves this stuff. His fur feels like mink/cashmere, and he has a very healthy diet with this brand wet food.

My 2 month old kitten loves this! I bought this to introduce her to canned food as I found nothing but dry food at my local store for kittens. I was excited to bring this home and have her try it. It was love at first taste...she gobbled it right up!

I DO NOT EVEN CARE IF THIS IS OVERPRICED, THESE ARE ABSOLUTELY DELICIOUS. THERE'S NOT A TON OF MEAT IN EACH PACKAGE, BUT IT HITS THE SPOT. GOOD LORD, THESE TASTE SO DELICIOUS, I DO NOT EVEN KNOW WHAT MORE TO SAY.
Best one yet.If you have not tried this one yet your missing out very tender and moist nuggets.The only negative is the 3.25 size bag is much to small.

I am an avid consumer of Jack Links Beef Steak Nuggets.  This batch is stale, dry and almost tasteless.  I can purchase these in even remote gas stations and they taste juicy and wonderful. I am too lazy to return them but will never buy them over the internet again.

I was expected a lot better. i LOVE the beef jerkey nuggets they are so juicy n flavorful and delicious, but when i ordered these just to try them cause i couldnt find them in any store i wasnt too happy. when i tried them they were extremely greasy and not that much flavor.

These are pretty good, but a little overpriced - I would only buy if there was a promotion. Some pieces are deliciously tender and seasoned perfectly, but there usually are more that are too dried out and tough, or overseasoned.

I wanted to get some jerky and since I like buffalo wings I tried these. The problem is there is way too much salt, it's disgustingly salty, way more than normal jerky. I can barely eat it. If you eat a 3.25 oz package of these you will have eaten 1840mg of sodium, instant high blood pressure.

I was a bit apprehensive ordering these from Amazon because I had read in other reviews that some of the jerky were moldy. I am happy to say that mine were absolutely mold-free! My family vanquished 2 packets on the spot LOL...
Absolutely love these steak nuggets! Everywhere around here they go for over 8 dollars, so I was thrilled when I found out I could buy these on here. Very tender and the spices are amazing.
I love the steak nuggets (and tenders) even better than their regular jerky.  I swear by all three of the Original, Peppered and Teriyaki Beef flavors.

The beef nuggets are soft and easy on the teeth and tasty. If they are slightly less salty, they will be excellent.Very good snack.
Johnson
These were good, but I really couldn't taste the A1 in them.  Tasted similar to the original steak nuggets to me

I find that the buffalo chicken jerky is great for when I'm craving buffalo wings late at night. Sure they're not the saucy goodness of wings at a bar but they definitely replicate the flavor. They are very hot but delicious.
I really like the product.  It was super easy to order online and have it delivered.  Much cheaper than buying in a gas station.  Stocking up is good for long drives, too.
The bite size chewables are wonderful - 2 or 3 every few hours lets yu diet and never feel hungry.
I purchased these to snack on after my workouts. Now I find myself just snacking on them all the time!! They're really good and come in a variety of flavors.
These are strangely addictive - and a good sugarless snack.  I like this flavor and the original, but the pepper is really strong.  Enjoy!

This is a nice tasty option that's totally different from jerky.  Convenient on the go just like jerky.  I would have given it five stars if not for the fact that it's quite salty, and that detracts from the flavor.
This is very good just a little too much of the A-1 flavor for us. Next time will order another flavor. If you really  love A-1 you will be pleased with it.

They are tasty, well flavored, always premium cuts, nothing tasted substandard.  On top of that high protein and low calorie! Only problem - everybody else thinks the same thing and its hard for Jack Links to keep them in stock.  You may have to wait a few extra days for the specialty orders.

I love this product! Tasty and soft (but not too soft). Very good flavor and it's safe to say, I can't "eat just one!" If you like the jerky, but not the dried up, tough stuff...you might want to give this stuff a try!
These are nice tender jerky nuggets, more tender than the usual beef jerky.  Flavor is very good, great for energy on hiking trips.
The Flamin Buffalo has just the right amount of heat and flavor combined.  I wish I could buy the flavor so I could put them on my wings.  Very good product.

These are really good. Not hard to chew like some other beef nuggets, and they don't dry out so much.

They only downside is that the bag stays very moist inside, so it can be a little messy. If you try to eat a bag while on the drive home you have grease all over your steering wheel.....
this is the best "jerky" product on the market .... I have tried them all... I hope the company will expand it's production and distribution of it !!

I love the Beef Teriyaki Nuggets and the Buffalo Chicken Nuggets. Now I have a 3rd kind to eat. These are great tasting and easy to eat (important for post bariatric surgery people). I love Jack Link's Nuggets line!
I love em.  I would give this 5 stars but there arent enough in the bag to warrent that.  they are good.

Oh my gosh, these are gross. I bought them because of Hungry Girl's glowing recommendation...and I gotta say, she steered me wrong this time. These are SUPER salty, and they taste like what I imagine dog kibbles would taste like.
these are good but verrry sweet.... they taste kind of chinese sweet bbq sauce... high protein
They have a funky flavour and really get all over you fingers. I bought these to eat while driving it it isn't going to work.

These syrups for Sno Cones are delicious. Our family loves them, we had also purchased a pack of the Hawaiian Ice syrups and we prefer these (and they are cheaper). A very good deal. I will be buying more soon.
EXCELLENT PRODUCT, SWEET TASTY AND THE KIDS LOVE THEM....GREAT FOR PARTIES OR ANY HOT SUMMER DAY....ALL OF THE FLAVORS TASTE GREAT...
These syrups are great for slushes. My kids love them and they are great for summer parties. Very good product.
I bought a 10 pack of quart bottles of Great Northern syrups for my Polar Ice Cub shaver and they are so good, we all love it.  Well worth it.
A very easy process with good communication and the product exactly as advertised.  I particularly appreciate the packing - very secure.
Worth every penny, a little goes a long way.  Ordered these and many snowcones later, still have plenty.  The taste is awesome, and the thicker syrup covers the ice great.
I bought a 10 pack of this snow cone syrup for my grandchildren & they just love it. The taste is great & it's nice having it already to go, no mixing. I would/will be buying from them again.

I had recently bought an Hawaiian Ice Machine from Great Northern which we love.  The kids loved the flavors and the added cones and straws are an added bonus.  A little pricey but delivered to your door and ready to go.
this product is the best in usa , We bought this for our grown-up snow cones. Absolutely yummy. Pour spouts are easy to use Flavours are delicious
This is by far the best truffle oil on the market.  It is the one we use at my restuarant and at my home.  It is very fragrant and has wonderful truffle flavor.

This product previously ordered and excellent but this time tasted old and was very hard---finally threw it away.

Still have not figured out how I ever got it in first place as ordered another product from Amazon and somehow got this as well?????
Sorry, no long winded review - it is what it says it is, Hamburger Helper.  It's dirt cheap and tasted great.

I love this coffee and the price is remarkable for a gourmet product. I have bought from other high-end coffee dealers and spent an arm and a leg and waited a lot longer to receive it. Very quick delivery. Excellent price and product. Can't wait to try the next flavor.
This coffee is the best I have ever had.  If you like good coffee you should try it.  I mix it with another coffee that is not as strong but the results are wonderful.

It is the best coffee I ever tasted.  I usually add a little sugar and French Vanilla cream, but it is delicious black.  I gave a bag of coffee to a friend and she was amazed at the great taste, flavor and aroma.  I will be ordering this coffee for holiday gifts.
Great taste,look forward to it every morning. We wish that when we dine out it was available. We also love automatic deliverys from Amazon.Did I say the price also is very good.

I enjoy the Coffee Master Flavored Coffee,"Jamaican Me Crazy".  It is very tasty and I will reorder when empty.  The "Butter Pecan"flavor is great also, and I will highly recommend both flavors. This is high premium coffee.  You will not be disappointed.  The flavor is just right not overbearing.
I really like this whole wheat orzo a lot.  Now if I could just find ditalini.  I would recommend this to anyone who loves orzo but does not want to eat white flour.  this is for you.
This was just too cute. Has a great story on the bottom to go along with the tug boat theme. The cookies were fresh and tasted good.
We ordered this product for our vacation rental property. It was delivered quickly and was exactly as expected. I will continue to order this item.

Each filter pack is perfect for brewing 4 cups of coffee. This is that great Maxwell House flavor from filter packs that are incredibly easy to use. My coffee making skills are very limited and I get compliments on my coffee now! Highly recommended
Too often someone does not bring all of the supplies.  These canisters make is so much easier to get a fresh cup of coffee without grounds to clean up afterwards!
I cannot find these in stores anymore and have used them for years. Hope they are available soon!
I like these cause I dont have to measure it. and its a good price on here.
This is a really good gum.  It lasts longer than any other gum we have tried and has a great flavor, too.

pit terrier and cockapoo loved these a bit more than the other treats we had.was it the ranch flavor? was it the texture? we can only speculate, but they know for sure!oooh, those nummerz treats they love to munch!grama even ate one by mistake!

Raving reviews made me buy this for dogs.
I have a lab mix a beagle and 2 Shepards that I got from impoundment and they're not spoiled.
One chewed it to crumbles but left it on the ground and my Shepards have been burying them in the backyard.
I wasted my money on this one.

I expect anything from Newman's Own to be a quality product, and according to Fluffy and Princess, these treats live up to this reputation. Not that they are particularly discriminating when
it comes to what they put in their mouths, but they did enjoy these and I will probably buy more.

This review is for Newman's Own Organics Lamb and Barley New Zealand Ranch Style Dog Treats. There is really not much to say here. The dogs loved the treats, and they didn't last long at all. My only complaint is that I don't thing the name of the product is long enough :)

My pup really liked these treats.  So much when I wasn't looking she somehow got them off "her shelf" & ate half the bag at on sitting.  She's pretty sneaky sometimes.  They didn't really smell or look appealing to me, but obviously to her she loves her new yummy treats.

I have two dogs-a Welsh Corgi and a medium sized mixed breed, and they both LOVE these treats! They smell good and are sturdy-not crumbly. The only thing I would change is to make them a little smaller, as I try to help my dogs watch their weight!

I have one doglet, a miniature schnauzer, who gulps down everything, so was not surprised when she inhaled these.  But my toy poodle is very picky, and even SHE loves these!  I will be buying more.  I love knowing they are GOOD for my dogs, too.

My dog loved these treats and I could feed it to him knowing they were good for him.  I trust Newman's Own to have exactly what they say on the package ingredients and to be wholesome.  They are scored so that you can break them in two if you want to.  They are easy to transport on a walk.

Length:: 1:15 Mins

These are great treats that will please the most discriminating canine palate.
these are really hard so, besides being good for them, they are great for their teeth. All three of my dogs love these treats, even my fussy Chi. I highly recommend these doggy treats.

The ingredients are natural and acceptable for my mutts. I always feed them natural or organic food and snacks.

They loved these Newman snacks. As I said, 4 Paws Up!

My puggle likes these but they are not her favorite. I like the fact they are a Newman's natural product and have lamb in them. They come in double squares you can break in half. My dog probably would like more if they were molded in a small or mini bone shape.
We gave these out to grooming customers, and the reports we got back were that the dogs loved them.  They're all natural, so I felt comfortable giving them out.

I really did not think my picky a** dogs would eat them. I tossed the treats to them and waited for the sniff of dis approval. Waiting...waiting.. chomp chomp and they are gone to another room to enjoy the treat in peace. Two dogs give them a paws up.
The ingedients and farming methods are impressive.  More impressive is the dog's reaction to these treats.  Wave one and I can get him to do almost anything.  Good dog.  Really good treats.

I fed these to a friends dog.  I really couldn't get much feedback from him as he was busy snarfing them down, but he seems to *really* like me now.  The bag only lasted a few weeks and the dog is now depressed.
The only treat my dog gets! Totally good, and well worth the subscription price. The snacks are a great nutrition benefit for him too.

I can't speak for myself, but my dog usually hates most "dog biscuit"  style treats.  In contrast to her usual preference, these were a strong favorite.  They don't smell or feel like meat, and have no greasy residue that many meaty treats have.  But the dog loves them like they are chunks of beef.

This is not for puppies. These are very hard and good for cleaning teeth. My 6 year old German Shepard and border collie mix loves these. The first time she had one, she played with it. Once she had the nerve to really chop down on it, she was in heaven and asked for more.
Don't know much to say except they smelled funny upon opening the bag and neither of our 2 dogs would go anywhere near them.

My dog likes these and they seem like they're relatively good quality so I will get them again. I have a large breed (Dalmatian) who is hypothyroid so he has some associated skin issues. These treats don't seem to bother his skin at all.

This will have to be short, but sweet as I have a tail to chase... Shockingly, as a dog that likes to eat unhealthy table scraps and turns his nose up to anything "organic" and "healthy", I have to admit that I really liked these treats! Woof! Woof!

Our lab/border collie mix is a big fan of these treats!  Of course, dogs are a fan of most treats, but these did not cost any 'ill' side effects / digestion problems.  I will definitely purchase more!
