Usually my dog is particular about his treats. When he got a whiff of these "treat time" was over quickly.  Just picking up the package got him excited. I will be buying these.
It seems dogs are more like people than we think, give them healthy treat, they have no interest in them, give em the junkie ones filled with chemicals, they eat those....oh welll...

My dog tends to get stomach problems if he's fed non-organic food, so I'm careful to always buy him organic (he probably eats better than I do). He snarfed up these treats readily and clearly enjoyed them, with no resulting tummy troubles that we saw.

My dogs couldn't eat these treats. They were far too large and hard. However my neighbors dogs (a lab and boxer) loved them. Don't get these unless your dog has large strong teeth. Otherwise they seem like a good and healthy treat for your pet.

Our 7-month old puppy, Banjo, loves these treats!!!

-1 star since these treats are really hard to break into smaller pieces.

These treats are well liked by dogs, the right size and don't smell or feel too gross in your hands.  Not really sure what else to say about them except that if organic is important to you, then these seem to be one of the few options for dog treats out there.  I will buy them again.

What can a person say about a dog treat?  My yellow lab loves these treats, and I like that they are an organic product.  I also like that Newmans Own donates to charity.  If these are important to you, I recommend the treats.
Our dog, Amber, totally loves these.  She hungrily crunched them down.  Highly recommended.  I'm sure your dog will really love them!
Bengal spice is just perfect either for Ice tea or for hot tea! Also it make the Chai latte special! Thanks!
I love this tea.  It is very rich in taste, smells wonderful, and doesn't leave a funny after taste.  It's my favorite herb tea.

This tea has been a favorite in my family for years. It's difficult to find locally, so I was so happy to find it at the Vitamin Shoppe and at such a great price. It's a spicy tea, great with toast or crackers or just by itself.  If you like Chai, you'll love this bolder version.
I always found green tea to be bitter.  Not this tea.  It actually tastes good.  I love almost all of the flavors of Yogi tea.
Great alternative to fettuccine if you have gluten problems. Sauce is a big helper for taste and don't boil them to long. They will clump. Overall I am very happy with them.
DE BOLES MAKES THE BEST GLUTEN FREE PRODUCTS.  I HAVE BEEN USING THIS STYLE AND OTHER VARITIES FOR YEARS.  SO GLAD TO GET THEM ON AMAZON AT SUCH A GREAT PRICE.
Basket was smaller than anticipated for the price, bought it for a raffle and was disappointed. It also came in a different basket than was shown.

What else can I say? No other candy bar has this great taste of divine chocolate with the perfect combination of raisins and nuts. A favorite of mine since a little girl. Arrived fine when I bought them but watch out for hot weather deliveries.
We got this to make homemade Sushi rice.  It does it's job flavoring the rice and you get quite a bit to a package.  Thankfully Amazon had this because our Asian supermarket didn't!
This product is amazing! It came quickly and taistes delicious. I have ground it up and put it in my smoothies and oatmeal and lots of other dishes. Very delicious and healthy.
Far and away some of the best chocolate available. This product needs to return to store shelves for purchase anytime. Becoming harder to find. These chocolates are an old time favorite.
I love brewing chamomile tea from scratch, it's one of the best things to help me fall asleep after a stressful day at work. This is great stuff and has a great price!: )

My son's celiac so we're very familiar with gluten free products.  I bought these because I trust the Glutino brand name but really, they're just not that great.  We tried them once and that was it because they're bland and tasteless.  There are better gluten free alternatives out there.
We have five family members on the GF diet.  These are their favorite crackers.  Even those in our family who are not on GF diet like these crackers.  Highly recommended.

These are great - I don't much like the other gluten-free cracker options (e.g. rice crackers, etc.) but these taste pretty close to "normal."  I've also used them in recipes, like as a topping for broccoli casserole, and they worked great.
These are the best gluten free crackers I have had so far.  I saved $5.00 by buying them through amazon than buying them at the grocery stores.
Texture and taste most similar to the stuff with gluten. Rice crackers always had a weird texture and had sharp edges that hurt my mouth, these are perfect and hold up well. Quite yummy with cheese!
My six year old son loves these crackers.  They are the only kind he'll eat and I 've tried at least half a dozen.  I've used them as substitutions in several recipes without anyone noticing.
I love these crackers, but recently ordered a case for my daughter's baby shower - Out of 6 boxes I got about 24 whole crackers - the rest were broken, most were crumbs. Very disappointing.

The taste is great but most of the crackers are broken.  I am maybe getting 12 whole crackers per box.  The first time I ordered these there were several broken but this time there are more broken than whole.
I love these crackers and decided it's best just to buy in bulk.  The crackers came fast and they are in tact.  Very fresh and delicious!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
There is not a gluten-free cracker any better than this one: I LOVE these crackers because they are so tasty & order them via subscription so I always have a supply.
excellent product, my kids and myself love it- the right texture/ the right btaste.  Will buy it again, stays fresh for a couple of days
Glutino crackers taste better than any of the other gluten free crackers that I have tried. It is nice that there are so many choices available for those that need alternatives.
One word, yuk. OK, based on the 20 word minimum; barely edible dry, chalky, flavorless, not even improved or masked with a good slice of cheddar cheese.

These are some of the tastiest GF crackers. My 6 year old daughter loves them. They also look the most like non-GF crackers, which helps my daughter feel a little less self conscious when she takes them to school. Amazon sells them for a great price. Thanks Amazon!

I've tried and tried to convince myself that these crackers are acceptable but they just aren't. If you are desperate for a cracker find another. I rarely throw any food out but I made an exception in this case. It is terrible.
If you want a good plain cracker that won't compete with your topping of choice, this is a good option.  Not a lot of flavor, but sometimes that's a good thing :-)
Great taste for a glutin-free alternative. Still have some of the symptoms w/this as I do w/foods made from wheat flour. :(

These crackers are the tastiest gluten-free crackers I have found, and I have been looking for 25 years.  They do break easy, though, so spreading anything firmer than peanut butter on them will often result in breakage.  Because of the great taste, I'm willing to overlook this flaw.

I've been gluten-free for 4 months and was dying for some cheese and crackers.  These are amazing!!! I had them on vacation with some friends who aren't eating gluten-free and they still loved these crackers.  I'm going to order a few cases of these and stock up!
Good for wheat free diets. My son likes them.good choice for kids on this type of a diet.I recommend  them.
These are the closest thing to real crackers you're going to find in the Gluten Free world. If you can't have the real thing, buy these...

I have tried several snacks and crackers that are gluten free. They are, for the most part, tasteless and dry.
These crackers have great taste and can be eaten by themselves or with dips and sweets. They are delicious!
We love these crackers but getting them through the mail doesn't work - all the crackers were broken and crumbly.
They were okay when you first bit into them but then chewing them made them gummy & nasty.  I'd rather do without.
I was realy impressed with these they do not taste like the old GF crackers I have bought before. They are actualy good and does remind me of wheat crackers like I use to eat. Thank you Amazon.
These crackers rule!!  All I can say is yum yum yum!!!  The best cracker that I have had in a long time.  Thank you Glutino for making such a good product that takes like "gluten" crackers!!

I couldn't believe it the first time i tried Glutino crackers.  It actually tastes like a RITZ cracker.  No flaxseed or pine-nut flavors to overpower what you put on the cracker.  It's just a great cracker with just the right flavor for snacking!  I love this product!!!

Even in the stores, they tend to be broken, but these on average are worse. Given the price per cracker, that makes them really expensive.

Love the crackers themselves. They are the best vehicle for peanut butter and jam that I've found.
Our 8 yr old with celiac loves this cracker. Great with soup or for PB&J.

These are no good. I got them thinking they would be a great snack with cheese or meat or jelly...  My kid won't eat them at all and I don't blame him.  They have no flavor, and nothing seems to help. I wouldn't buy them again.
I ordered 6 boxes of these crackers. The crackers are very good, however, all of the crackers (in all 6 boxes) were nothing but crumbs when I received them!

They seem a bit pricey, but they don't have the aftertaste other GF crackers have had.  It was nice to get a case so we don't run out so fast and I can share them with friends.  It will be great when GF products are so popular the price comes down.
These crackers are just like I remember crackers tasting like before I went gluten free.  They are a crunchy mix between a buttery Ritz and saltine.  Delicious!
These crackers have the texture of ritz and a very pleasant flavor.  I am so happy I tried them!
These are the closest to regular crackers I have found yet.  Great flavor and consistency.
but the price is too high.It's food with no real nutrition, simple to make,should be not more then $2.

My daughter has eaten gluten free for 8 years now (she's 13).  These are her favorite crackers and the only ones we eat in the house (I don't have any wheat here).  We use them for all occassions, recipe's, and recently started making smores with a marshmallow and melted Hershey's chocolate-  YUM!!

Food is very much a personal preference but I really don't like any of these crackers made by this company. They taste like flavored paper. Someone said better than nothing but I'd rather have something else.
Glutino crackers are among our favorite GF crackers, but if you have a store in your area that sells them, that might be a better bet. About half of our crackers (in all 6 boxes) arrived broken.

these crackers are great, but the packaging is so poor that you are lucky if you get 5 crackers from one bag that are not broken!  I really wish this company would change their packaging, so that you would get whole crackers not broken ones.
These are the best tasting GFCF crackers on the market.  They do not fall apart, they are flavorful, and taste just like "REAL CRACKERS"  My son who is a picky eater LOVES them!!!

Much more roses than I expected & I was very pleased with the color & aroma.  The only drawback for me is that there is a lot of the green stuff (the flower bases) & for a lot of recipes I just want the petals.
I was disappointed by these eucalyptus leaves - they have a stale, oregano-like smell. Ask your local florist to get you some fresh leaves!
I received my ordered and many of the peach gummis were stuck together and could not be picked apart.  I am not very happy as these were supposed to be favors for a birthday party.

Received package and was just as I wanted plus!  I enjoyed getting a piece of the candy from the box.  It arrived on time and I am ordering another box!  Just wish shipping was not so high but is not their fault.

A big box of my favorite candy at a very good price.

The candy is as you would expect from a store-bought package, individually wrapped silvery-plastic wrappers (not the foil like the picture seems to indicate).
How can you go wrong with peppermint patties? The box of candy is the size that you see sitting in stores for a single-piece purchase. Perfect for the pantry!
My sweet and genius husband bought me this as one of my Valentine's Day this year! Amazingly, it lasted me a month. And they were delicious!
Sorry, but I dont eat mexican or chinese made candies. I now buy pearsons or palmers peppermint patties. Check the labels folks foreign factories dont have food safety regulations.
Both my dogs love these treats.  They are a bit pricey if you have an aggressive chewer.  However, they are great and the dogs go crazy for them.
My dog cannot get enough of these and I feed him 1 everyday and have been buying them for a few years.  Every year my vet asked what I dog to keep my dogs teeth clean!?
My puppies go nuts for these things. They seem to really satisfy the urge to chew. I'd give them 5 stars, but I think they're a bit overpriced. Still, this is a much better deal than at Petsmart.
My Rottie puppy expects one of these each night when I turn off the lights for her to go to sleep.  I sure hope they're good for her 'cuz she loves them.

I was happy to fine a product that is easily digestible by dogs. too many products out there can cause internal problems and even death to you pet if you are not careful.

Bill Drews

Hot springs, AR
When we adopted our 8 year old Basset Hound, her back teeth were solid dark brown and crusted.  After about 5 months giving her one of these per day, the teeth are about 80% cleaned.

I buy the medium treats for my 19 lb Long Hair Chihuahua mix and he loves these! They are pricey but cheaper than what you will find at the store or Pet store. He gets one every other day...it actually helps his digestion in my opinion. If you get them on Subscription they are even cheaper.
My dog is very picky, but he loves this green bone. The bone has 360 spike which can clean his teeth no matter which way he chew the bone.
These are softer and seem easier to digest than the Greenies brand.  I really like the Greenies, but my dogs were unable to completely chew them as well as the Nylabones.
Good product poor packing from shipper.  Had several leaking into box which made them all sticky.  Had to wash off before storing for use.

This was exactly what I was looking for so that I don't have to use up fridge space for my coffee condiments.  They all came to me with no damage what-so-ever.  Not a single one that I have seen yet has been broken.
this item arrived with a horrible mess. broken and sticky. i want my money back! i am so dissappointed. i expected better from amazon.

Good price, great product and very convenient.  My daughter in college was running to the grocery every week to buy creamer and put it in her roommate's fridge.  Not anymore. She keeps these in a container near the coffee maker in her dorm.

Good. Exactly as advertised. I was surprised that not a single one broke open during shipping, so A+ on the durability of each individual packet.

Be warned though, that these creamers are not very sweet.
Perfect coffee creamer for my coffee. Perfect addition to my coffee. Would recommend to anyone who needs a perfect compliment to your morning coffee.
I love International Delight French Vanilla, lots better than Coffee Mate brand. I will only purchase International Delight Creamer. It works great when I travel except on an airplane.

I ordered these for work and they came all in a box, no problem.
There was a problem with some of them being broken and leaking all over. I wrote an email to the seller letting them know that but to this date, still havent heard a word from, them.. Good customer service.

We like this coffee creamer and have been using it for years. So our main concern with ordering it was would any of the individual containers break. We received the item with none of the containers broken. So for the cost this is a great buy.
Got hooked on this when I was traveling the US, now I can't live without it. Packaging has improved, and everything arrived in one piece.

I have ordered this product on a monthly basis. I love that it comes to my home.  I have read other reviews and have read that they recieve them damaged. I have to tell you mine come in perfect order. I hope for those of you who order this product the same results.

THE CREAMER IS HIGHLY INDIVIDUALIZED AND PORTABLE
EASY TO STORE WITHOUT REFRIGERATION. GOOD PRICE & HIGHLY RECOMMENDED FOR OFFICE AND HOME USES

The product does come in one bag then boxed. I was fortunate that I did not have any come open in transit. Also I am loving the fact that they do not have to be refrigerated (so I can keep them at work).
Very convenient for me because I don't have to keep running to the store and purchase these small boxes that only have about 24 individuals and expensive.

My first box came with some of the packets opened and they were all sticky.  I contacted you and the recieved another box free.  They were packed much better, and arrived intact.  Thank you so much.  We love these!!
Ordered two for my partner who is on a navy cruise and he said that none of them broke and wanted more already lol (i guess they took to long to get there...so here's to purchasing more)
This is a great buy for the price.  I can't get this kind of deal anywhere local.  I will buy my cream this way as long as I can get it here.

Excellent vanilla flavor. However I was not "delighted" that it curdled in hot coffee!!! Nasty and very unappetizing in appearance. I gave up using for hot coffee and use it for "iced coffee" with great results.
Mine showed up fine with no damage. Not packed well, so I could see how these could show up squashed or leaking, but mine were fine. Saved money by using the subscription discount off of Amazon.
This product was what I like. But this shipment looks like 2eds. not good enough for the store shelves. Containers were dented and some had leaked out making everything sticky.
Don't bother getting these. You'll spend more time cleaning up the mess due to the poor packaging then you'll spend enjoying them.
Long story short.  Creamers thrown into single box, no protection.  Opened box and there was liquid creamer all over the contents.  Think twice before oredering or subscribing.

The creamer is fine, it was the creamers that had exploded in the box that were the problem. The few that did break open left the whole box covered and sticky. So I had to go and hand wash all of them before putting them out for our staff and clients. Simply irritating...

MORE OF THE PRODUCT IN THE PACKING BOX ARE LEAKING OUT, AT LEAST 10 OF THE SINGLE SERVE PACKAGES LEAK OUT IN THE BOX. WITH ALL THE CREAMERS I HAVE ORDERED THROUGH YOU HAVE PACKAGES THAT HAVE LEAKED ALL OVER THE BOX. I AM LOOKING AT OTHER SOURCES FOR MY PRODUCT.

As other reviewers noted, more than dozen of items were broken, so the box was sticky and some of them still had creamer on them. Also the expiration date is June 2010 which less than 6 months away, I wont be able to use them before the sell by date.

This item arrived when it was supposed to. It is so convenient. You don't even have to refrigerate it. So, that is one less step you have to take in the morning just to get a cup of coffee. It tastes exactly like the refrigerated stuff. It is so good.

I purposely bought this packet of individual creamers to keep track of calories. Not only is one creamer 30 calories, they are DELICIOUS and add a great flavor to your coffee. Definitly recommended. You can also store them for a while, since they last for quite some time. Enjoy your cup of coffee!

After getting used to using product where I live, and with everyone else using it they would run out witin 2 days.  so, now when thry run out, I have my own. You should see the looks on their faces when I still have some....

I received the item and found 10 of them were crushed and spilled onto others.
My mother spent about 30 minutes to clean.
Didn't want to return as it is not worth my while.
Always liked this particular creamer but wasn't happy to see a lot of them crushed inside the box.

but be aware.  It is addictive.  I love this stuff in anything from beverages to my instant oatmeal.  Try it and you will agree. And by signing up for scheduled delivery I am never without it in the house
These are chocolatey with a touch of spice. Tasty but expensive, I imagine this is something you could make at home! But these are good overall.
I've never found anything that works better than this for mild tummy trouble.  Tums, Mylanta, etc. etc. have never worked well for me.  This tea settles my stomach right away.
I love this tea, it is great for people who suffer from IBS.  It helps relieve bloating and gas from foods.  Great tasting too!
It works. Everybody at work comes and asks me for this tea when their stomach is upset or when they eat too much or have gas. Also it has a nice sweet taste. No sugar required.
It's an acquired taste, but it works.  For IBS sufferers with few other options for stomach relief I'd definately give it a try.

I have had alot of stomach problems over many years and this is an excellent tea for settling my stomach quickly. It also works great if you have overeaten and feel uncomfortable - so good I buy it by the case!
One of my favorite teas for digestion.  I probably drink 4-5 cups of this tea every day.
This tea is great for nausea, or any stomach discomfort.  One cup and I feel great.  I add a little honey and some lemon for flavor, but the results are fantastic.

I found Yogi Tea at the local grocery store & from then on we began an amazing love affair! (shhh, don't tell my husband!) I love all their teas & this Stomach Ease one is perfect for those times when I'm not feeling so hot "south of the belly-button" ;o) (my kids even love it!)
I love this tea so much. It is like magic. And the taste is WONDERFUL! Thank you so much for making my new favorite tea.
Very good tea to relieve stomach upset, the feeling of bloating and general digestive unease.

I have had mystery stomach issues since my early teens (I'm 43). Nothing has helped.  Then I tried this tea.  I was already a Yogi Tea fan.  Just one cup of this when I have stomach "issues" and they just go away in a matter of about 30 minutes.  Love it.
I tend to get upset stomach/nausea in the evennings. This NEVER fails to make me feel better. I love it. They don't sell it at stores in my area anymore, so I was fine with buying a case of it!
Having tried many indigestion products, this tea really soothes and relieves stomach and indigestion problems plus it tastes great also.

This is my favorite tea and I have tried dozens of different flavors and brands.  I have a sensitive stomach and sometimes this tea soothes my stomach.  It's cheaper ordering it from Amazon than buying it from my local supermarket.

I got this for Father's day and my dad loved it and did not mention one thing about it being small or anything. This really made his day so I am pleased with the idea to order the gift for him. I would recommend it!
my cat absolutely loves these treats & they were first givin to mr by my vet who is also a friend. musc less expensive with amazon

Cats have many things that pass through their mouths causing tartar buildup and eventual decay of teeth. Just like with people they need a little help with their dental hygiene. These tidbits - shaped like litte fish - are a tasty and effective solution. Difficulty is ignoring the crys for more.

I have several very, very finicky cats and they ALL are absolutely crazy for these Butler Tartar Control treats ! The best part (to me) is that these are healthy treats, as well.

I highly recommend this for any cat "parent" !!
My cats go insane over these treats. As soon as they hear the bag rattle, they dart to wherever it is. Purchasing through [...]  was easy, cost-efficient and the shipping was fast.
I was really looking for the larger cans but could not locate any.  These are perfect for someone who occasionally has a need for a New Mexico chili with each can containing 2-3 chilis.

After living in New Mexico for 4 years, the green chili withdrawal was BRUTAL! The canned version of anything is never as good as getting it fresh, but this brand is far superior to anything available locally where we're living now and the small can is perfect for a 2-person household.
As with the Thai Peanut flavor, this hot-n-spicy vegan jerky is a winner! The spice is nice and a great addition to any meal.
Great, high- protein snack without meat.  I would give it 5 starts if it were not so sweet.
Mix this half and half with Orange Crush over ice and it tastes just like a creamiscle.  It's very yummy, but gets you drunk pretty quickly.

I love the bold flavors of K*Cups and this way you get 50 of them for so much less that other places.

http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B004M5W7YQ/ref=cm_cr_rev_prod_title
Never went wrong with this kcup. I usually buy this and Donut shop and get this because it is a strong coffee. Not to bitter either
I have ordered this several times and like the fairly rich taste without any bitterness. It is also very smooth and is one of the better K-cups that I have found so far.
I was very impressed with how bold this coffee is. This is easily my new favorite early morning brew. Bam!

If you enjoy a bold coffee, this is a great pick!  I purchased a Keurig brewer this spring and I order different types of coffee to experiment to find the "perfect" cup.  I will definately reorder Emerill's Big Easy
The coffee is dark and rich, without being acid. This coffee is for those who like their brew to fill their nose as well as their cup.
It's a nice bold, strong flavored cup of coffee.  Goes great with a sweet breakfast.  Also a good strong kick in the pants in the morning.  This is one of my favorite K-cups.
what's not to like??????? pleasingly great bold taste.....and price is quite lower than in the stores, even Wal-mart!!!....will definitely purchase again!
This is by far my favorite bold coffee!!  It is rich, bold and holds up well with my flavored creamer!!

We've tried many different K-Cup blends, but this one by far (or, rather, so far) is our favorite.  We like a bold taste and Emeril's is both bold enough and flavorful.  Newman's Special blend was our previous favorite, but this far outshines it, I believe.
A rich bold taste that maintains smoothness.  No bitter aftertaste.  Have nver had a better K-cup.  If they had six stars this one would receive it.
The order came as described.  Packing was perfect.  No problems whatsoever with it.  The taste is great for a strong decent cup of coffee.
This is the better coffee I have found in a K Cup. Deep, rich, smooth flavor. No bitterness. Worth the few extra cents per cup.

I like the flavor of coffee, but Emeril's doesn't have that traditional coffee flavor. It's pretty bitter--so much so, that 2 Splenda packets in a 16 oz cup don't mask the bitterness. Three stars because it's tolerable, but I'm holding out for tastier coffee.
I always drink one cup of coffee on the way to work.  Emerils coffee is bold and full of flavor and with a little vanilla creamer added it's the perfect way to get my day started.
I FOUND EMERILS COFFEE TO BE ONE OF THE BEST TASTING COFFEE IF YOU LIKE A BOLD COFFEE,,I ALWAYS KEEP THIS PRODUCT IN MY HOME,,
Emeril's Big Easy Bold is very bold and tasty and a great way to start the day! Not an expert on New Orlean's style coffee, but I love it's flavor!
I have been ordeing this product for about a year now.  It is great coffee.  You should buy if you bold coffee.
This is great robust coffee (my favorite), and the price per k-cup is the best I've found so far.  I'll buy it again.

My order is a repeat order as we have enjoyed this coffee for a long time.  The price offered at Amazon is good and the delivery is very quick.  I do recommend this product to anyone who enjoys a good cup of coffee each morning and at coffee-break time.  MLF
This is very good coffee.  I enjoy the bold taste and I look forward to making a cup or two daily!
Went through virtually every bold, dark coffee for my Keurig.  Emerils Big Easy Bold is the best dark coffee in the class, not in the slightest way bitter.  The pack of 50 is a great bargain,
This is always my first cup of coffee for the day - strong, but very smooth. It never fails to wake me up and get me going. And it's very nice to have the 50 pack available.
I received a Kuerig machine for my birthday and a variety pack came with it. So far I like Emeril's coffee the best,I will be purchasing more.

We get this on a regular monthly shipment and enjoy a decent discount. Coffee has gone up some , but we love this and Amazon has the best deal ! Wish Costco or Sam's would carry it like some others as their deals are the best!

Price keeps going up, up, up. Next price increase
and I'm out of here. Product is good but getting too
expensive.

Due to my 8 year exposure to Louisiana, I can reliably say this coffee is the best substitute for a Keurig based cafe au lait attempt. Aside from that, it is a tasty dark blend, you just have to look at Emeril each time, then jab him in the head with the K-cup assembly.
I don't really drink this coffee, but my hubby has at least 2 cups a day of it and says it's a really great bold coffee. We use subscribe and save for it because it is a "regular" at our house.
I purchased Emeril's Bold for a vacation with 14 people.  For the person who wants a stronger flavor Emerils is just right. I would purchase this again.
My favorite so far.  Bold but smooth with no bitter after taste. Highly recommend if you like a bold coffee.
Excellent BOLD coffee ... if you're a weak coffee drinker, then this coffee isn't for you ... if you love tasting coffee ... you'll love this blend ...

Bold is Bold is Bold yet smooth. Typically I am leery  of celebrity products but I have ordered and reordered this product and it has been consistent over time, well priced and is bold but not overly "barky" enjoy.

My husband and I always a cup of Big Easy Bold every morning.  Its quality has been consistent over the past several years we have ordered.  If you like a dark roast, without the bitterness sometimes found in dark roasts, this is the coffee for you.
Had a cup of low grade restaurant coffee yesterday morning.  Made me realize just how spoiled I am to have the opportunity to drink Emeril's Big Easy Bold every morning.  It has become our favorite!
The Emeril Lagasse coffee has good flavor - I would compare it to Dunkin' Donuts coffee in terms of flavor / strength. This pack of 50 is priced well and contains less packaging a win-win for us!
Not very good and I love bold coffee. Kona coffee and pretty much Tulleys brand in general is MUCH better.
Just the way I like it. Bold and full flavored.  I drink it black and love the taste.  A favorite around the house.

This is the best way to go for your Keurig Coffee Maker.  Amazon ever writes a week earlier reminding you they are shipping and asks you if you want to skip this shipment, go ahead with it, or ship one week earlier (just in case you're running out).  Great great service. Go for it.

Emeril's Big Easy is a stong, dramatic coffee with a lot of kick.  It will wake you up and keep you going all day long.  I love everything about this coffee.  If you like your coffee to be like colored water, don't order this one..it is only for real coffee lovers.
Excellent coffee flavor - robust without being bitter.  I'd give this a five star rating were it not for the amount of grounds and sludge that are produced.  Don't drink the last quarter of your cup!

Love this Keurig Coffee; of course when they started offering it in a 50 pack just could not resist!!! You get a real coffee with robust taste and smoothness! Can't get enough of it. We have many Keurigs and even the small one for on the go! This coffee is good all day long!

This is a delicious cup of coffee, not for the weak at heart.  Bam!  Emeril maintains his reputation with this brew.  And the pack of 50 from Amazon is the best deal in town.  We will definitely buy these K-Cups for the Keurig Brewer again and again.
This coffee delivers just what it promises...a strong, bold and rich flavor. If you're a fan of Starbucks coffee, you should enjoy Emeril's brew!

If you're looking for a good strong cup of coffee from your Keurig brewer, this is it! Nice and strong, but not bitter. Much better than any of the samples that come with the brewer. I highly recommend it!
I paid for 100 k cups but received only 98! This is the second time this has happened.I didn't think such about it the first time. Now I wonder if this happens often or even all the time.

We're really enjoying our new coffee maker, trying different types of coffee. This one wasn't our favorite. We figured from Louisiana it would be stronger, but it wasn't. We're going to keep trying others, looking for a favorite.

I don't know what it was about this Emeril's big easy blend, if perhaps there was a hint of chicory, but I really did not enjoy this style of coffee people k cup whatsoever. Something was just off about it. I would try other flavors instead.
Coffee tasted bitter and burnt.  Didn't like the 1st cup; kept open mind; 2nd cup not any better. Wish I could return the remaining 48 cups.  One star for fast shipment.

I am sure that this coffee tastes good, but I am not sure I will ever get to find out. Each cup I insert into my Keurig busts open when it is brewing.  I don't think the seal can withstand the heat, and so it opens up and oozes grounds into my coffee! YUCK!!

Love the k-cup coffee maker and this strong coffee, but the k-cups from this order leak. The seal comes loose so coffee grounds come through around the edges, giving my coffee an extra undesired crunch.
I ordered a 50 pack of these k-cup and the coffee it self probly good but the seal on everyone of them breaks during brewing and every cup is full of grounds.. ugh and there not returnable !!!!!

These Emerils Gourmet Coffee, Emeril's Big Easy Bold, K-Cups for Keurig Brewers (Pack of 50) are defective!!! Almost half of them blew the tops off in brewing and filled the coffee mug with coffee grounds, and had to throw away. WILL NOT BY AGAIN!!!
Very good taste strong to make a 8 oz  cup.  Green mountain you need two k cups to make a 8oz  the medium strength
Wonderful bold flavor. Really gets me going in the morning. I've tried about a dozen other K-cup coffee flavors and this is my favorite.
Coffee arrived in a few days and it is fresh.  Great price for what is a great cup of coffee.

I was afraid of bold because I think of bitter starbucks coffee but this was great.  It is strong and bursting with flavor in a good way, not bitter at all.  I got a sample with my coffee make and went out and bought a box.
My wife loves this coffee.  She won't drink any other brand.  I don't like it because it is too strong for my taste.
Arrived on time.  The flavor comes through, which is important when using a K-cup.  It is bold, and sometimes slighly acidic.  It doesn't taste as smooth as the Newman's Bold.
If you like weak, diner coffee, this is not for you! But if you enjoy the boldness of Starbucks, this comes close. We're hooked-- fantastic flavor! The decaf version is good too.
Excellent bold coffee with full flavor. Keeps our office staff and clients happy. First timers always compliment the great coffee no matter how they take it. Thanks Emerils!
This coffee is bold and strong, just how I like it.  If you don't like bold/strong coffee, this is not for you.
Not just a name (Emeril's), this was a pleasant surprise the first time we tried it.  You will not be disappointed if you like a bold-flavor yet smooth experience.
My husband loves this rich bold coffee.  He drinks it every morning without fail!

Very very bold coffee.  But that isn't the problem.  I like bold, this just tastes horrible.  I was able to try this flavor because it came in a sample pack with my Keurig.  I will not be buying ever.  I wasn't even able to finish my cup.
Coffee was good but every cup broke during use, making a mess inside the cup and out, will not purchase again.

This makes a nice robust cup of coffee without being bitter or tasting scorched, just a good coffee taste. Its not overpriced; and will please most anyone you serve it to. I will be buying this again, pleased with this purchase.

If you like dark coffee this is a good one. I tried a sample with my new Keurig and
fell in love with this coffee.
I found the best price through Amazon.
My order came quickly and will order again from this company.
I made purchased this coffee a number of times.....this is an excellent value for a coffee with an excellent taste......will certainly purchase again
I have found Emeril's Big Easy Bold coffee to be one of my favorites.  I prefer coffees dark and bold and this fits the bill! Very good product.

While my husband and daughter have tried several different k-cup coffee choices, their favorite, hands down, is Emeril's Big Easy Bold. The added chicory gives it the home-grown flavor of New Orleans and blends well with the boldness of the coffee. Give it a try, you may like it too.

I love the Emeril's Big Bold K cups.I get my money's worth from them .My brother likes it straight ,
I like it a little weaker ,so I can get 2 cups out of it,saves me $$$$,when I get them on special at Amazon.
Not the best nor the worst.  In the middle of the road.  Slightly bitter finish.  Bold brew smell but flavor is somewhat lacking.
This coffee is pretty good. One of the better Keurig coffees. I've tried many of them and a lot I find to be weak. This is more comparative to a brewed coffee.
I bought this product for my son who is in grad school. He said Emeril's K-cups were the best tasting ones he has tried so far. I will definitely buy them for him again.
Great coffee it remindes me of the coffee i had in New Orleans when i was stationed there in the navy, You had to go to Jackson square to get some good coffee after church.

I give this coffee five stars, but I like a really bold bitterness to my coffee.  This coffee is super flavorful, but if you like your coffee medium roast then you should go with another flavor.  This coffee will wake you up, if that's what you are looking for.
This coffee is the best K cup we have tried.  It is big and bold and we love it.  STill looking for variety in the bold area but this will be hard to beat.
I don't drink much coffee from our Keurig machine, sometimes tea.... but my wife is the coffee aficionado, and she thinks this stuff is the best coffee ever. Take that, you lucky so-and-so!
Enjoy this coffee very much good flavor one of our favorites.  We like stronger coffer and this fits the bill.

i am very particular about dark roast.
This brew stands top shelf with tullys french roast and starbucks pike roast
good good good
Great rich cup of coffee, smooth and bold flavor.  Best K-cup I have found so far.  Low price as well!

I have been buying this for over a year now and love it,
the best wake me up coffee I have tried .
Try it just once ,, you will not be sorry...
Tried a new coffee recently and have to say that Emerils Gourmet Coffee was just what I expected, a dark bold flavor that I love.
I have ordered several different brands of coffee on Amazon.  This is a great coffee, but the box was short two units and there was one cup that was ripped and empty.

Got this for Christmas, I'm addicted.  Just ordered another two boxes. Coffee tastes great, gives out an aroma that fills the whole house. I've gotten great  reviews on my coffee since I started using my new coffee machine.
We have bought this product a few times now, and we love it!  Will be ordering again soon.  Have also sent it as a thank you gift.

Emerils Gourmet Coffee, Emeril's Big Easy Bold, K-Cup Portion Pack for Keurig K-Cup Brewers (Pack of 50) If you enjoy strong coffee like i do, this is a great coffee. Priced right and you get fast shipping. Try this and enjoy!

All but a handful of the shipment were defective.  When brewing the water flowed through very slowly and large quantities of grounds were released into my cup - Gross.  The only way to use them is to empty the contents into a reusable k-cup.
Emeril's Big Easy Bold is my favorite. It is full flavored and robust yet smooth, and never bitter. Shopping online is hassle free and convenient!
Big bold coffee flavor and taste. Smooth and rich and dark, A very good Keurig K Cup. Excellent prices on this quanity.I will be buying this again
This is our all-time favorite coffee blend for our Keurig coffee maker! We subscribe to a regular shipment of it so we never run out!
I have used Amazon many times for K-cups for my Keurig and every time I am satisfied with both the price and the item that I get.  This is just another case of a great coffee at a great price!
Have tried a half dozen K cup flavors, and have found this to be the most substantial. Many of the others are very weak brews.

The containers explode at the end of the brewing cycle. The grinds fill the cradle that the K-Cup sits in and it is messy to clean up. Newmans and Tilly's work fine, but Emeril's does not. I have a Mr. Coffee powered by Keuring coffee maker.
Emeril's Big Easy Bold is my husband's favorite. It's not easily found in grocery stores, so I was excited to order a box from Amazon!

The product is very good.  We had tried it at a relative's house and enjoyed it.  However, the case of 50 that we ordered contained only 47 cups.  Not worth the hassle of sending it back; however, I would hesitate to order this item from Amazon again.
My husband Loves this coffee he says to so smooth.  He loves the extra zing it give him in the morning.

All I can say is BAM! The flavor and the buzz is totally Emeril. I drink enormous amounts of coffee daily (trucker) and this is by far the best I've tried in a quick K cup format. The cups work fine (no grounds) and the price is right.
I like the robust flavor of Emerils coffee and it has enough flavor to give a good cup of coffee in the 10 oz size of my keurig machine
I love this vendor ~ the price is very reasonable and I get free shipping.  What more can you ask, great price and it being delivered to your door.  Also, quick shipping, thank you!
I purchased this product as a gift. Shipped as promsed. Recipient loves this coffee and will not use other brands or flavors.
excellent coffee in a pod! would buy it again. price point is good. fast delivery. packaged well, love the convenience of the whole concept!
Watch out, these brownies will make you gain weight.  The fudgy ones are especially great.  Easy to make.
This brownie mix is great, we have tasted so many brands and so far Pamela's products (brownie mix, bread mix, pancake mix, and chocolate chip cookies) are the best, I really recommend this items!!

I usually use two packages of the mix and bake the mix in a 9 X 13 cake pan.  It is easy to mix up and can be frozen for eating later on.  Of course, they must be refrigerated but travel well for on-the-road meals.  I highly recommend this mix to the chocaholics out there!
We've eaten Pamela's Brownie mix for years.  My kids actually prefer it now to wheat brownies. And now at Amazon, buying by the case AND via autoship, its the best price I've ever found!
The ingredients shown on Pamela's website did not show any corn in the mix.  The package lists corn derivatives in the mix.  My grandson is allergic to corn, so this is a problem.

This is one of the best gluten-free brownies that are just as good as or even better than the brownies that are made from wheat. Excellent treat for people who cannot tolerance gluten. A must buy for the gluten sensitive person
I bought several baking goods from Pamela's and all of them are really good!! It shows that healthy doesn't have to taste bad.
These brownies are a hit every time I take them to an event.  Everyone is always surprised that they are gluten-free. With a bit of gooey, chocolate icing, they're extremely decadent!
Superb! These are amazingly good. I'd eat them even if I could eat regular wheat flour based brownies. The egg free option is superb too which is also important to me.
Pamela's chocolate brownie mix is my favorite GF brownies to date. Very chocolatey with chunks of chocolate throughout. They are easy to mix, and a fast treat.
Pamela's brownie mix does everything I want it to do.  Pamela"s prcoducts now replace all my previous baking products and even my grandchildren love them.  Great consistency and value.

Pamela's products can't be beat. I've tried other gluten-free products and none have been as good.
Not only the brownies, but all of the products from this company have
proven to be flavorful.

And I LOVE brownies. I got this gluten-free mix so my husband could eat them, and I couldn't believe it when I tried them. SOOO good, just how a brownie should be. Chewy, fudgey, with chunks of chocolate, yum! Best brownies ever, gluten-free or not.
This brownie mix doesn't bake at 7000 feet altitude, but it works super well as chocolate/chocolate chip cookies. Makes 24.

You won't miss the gluten in this mix...in fact, your non-gluten-free friends will love this as much or more than their favorite brownie recipe.  These bake up moist and rich, with none of those chemical ingredients you will find in other commercial brownie mixes.  YUM!!

These gluten-free brownies match up with Ghiardhelli's Triple Chunk Brownie Mix.  I add chocolate chips to give them a little twist.  My whole family enjoys these.  This is the best gluten-free dessert I've found.
Granddaughter requires gluten free so thought we would try this - big success - actually tasted pretty good.
this popular desert was gone almost as quick as it came out of the oven..everyone loved..Pamela's you're the best!
These brownies had that 'off' taste that you sometimes get with GF baked goods.  I prefer the Bob's Red Mill mix.
The wheat free brownie mix is not to my liking.  I won't be reordering. I'd rather not eat chocolate than to eat these brownies.
I love licorice but soft types have wheat as a main ingredient.  I was so happy to discover these subtly flavored hard candies available in the U.S.

Love Calif Natural venison dry.  Prior to this, had to run to vet for anal gland problems.  Since switching to venison, no more problems. No more loose stools or anal gland cleaning.  Thank you Calif. Natural.  Dog loves it and I'm real happy.

I ordered this for my father, who likes to use tea for his digestion. He's been very pleased with the flavor and the freshness. The packaging does an excellent job of preserving the tea, and our order has been refilled promptly.

These chicken wrapped rawhide twists are difficult to find. The ones from Staples are only available in their store, not online, and don't have as mush chicken wrapped around them as these do. Highly recommended.

My pom loves these wraps, I have already reordered them. They are just her size and she really enjoys
ripping them apart.

My dogs really love this item.  They are hard to find.  One of my dogs enjoys eating just the chicken jerky off the stick.  The other gladly finishes eating her and his unwanted portion too.  A nice treat for them.
My cat had periodental disease. He had to have teeth removed. This dental diet helps keep his teeth and gums healthy.
I TRIED IT IN 2003 AND SINCE THEN - I USE IT EVERY DAY ! THAT'S THE BEST THING MONEY CAN BUY !!! HUGE AND ULTRA-MULTI HOT !
I like hot stuff but this thing was a killer.  I put a tiny dab of it on a toothpick and was sick the rest of the day.

Package arrived on time and in one piece, but after eating some I noticed the flavor of some is stronger than in others.  About 1 in 5 has no flavor and I end up spitting it out.  If they all tasted as good as the few good ones I would have given 5 stars.  Maybe I just got a bad batch.

I don't know if I love the jokes or the candy the best.  Both have made me a hit with my great grandson Caleb.  Captain Caleb and I sitting on the couch watching Doctor Who and eating laffy taffy..what a great treat.

I'm drinking my first cup right now.  The rest of the package is going in the freezer for emergency use only.  It is NOT full bodied, it is NOT full flavored .... maybe they think dark roast refers to color?  Don't waste your money on this one!  Blech.... weak brown water...

We had the Lava cake last night and it was wonderful.  The chocolate flowed out of the cake as pictured!  And so easy to prepare.  The ramekins that came in the kit are a great little dish to have for other desserts too!
I thought this product was superior in every way.  Packaging, color, taste, etc.  Will buy again as soon as needed.

Every year I look forward to when these bad boys come out. The peanut butter to chocolate ratio is perfection! Perfect size for sharing (although I have a hard time with that) I usually cut into sections and eat over a period of a few days.

The packaging was okay on the Easter eggs but they were all melted and the chocolate was white, very grose! We couldn't even eat them we had to throw them away. It would have been the same as throwing the money in the trash.
The picture doesn't show the very good detail in the decorating.  Very nice and very tasty.  A tad bit over priced but for the special occasion it was worth it.
I ordered this as a gift for a friend and he loved it!  The designs were well done and the chocolate taste was great.

My 8 month old loves the food, especially the pumpkin (squash) and sweet potato.  I like it because it's easy to mix, organic, lightweight and environmentally friendly.  When she is older, I will use it in the other foods as well.  It tastes like "real" food, not "baby food".  It smells better too!

The peas are a BRIGHT fresh looking green color not anything like a store bought peas would be. My son loves all of the flavors. The apples do get clumpy and kind of hard so it's a little harder to mix those up the the other flavors. Over all I LOVE these.

I should have read more closely.  This is dried packet of mix that can be added to yogurt or milk.  Not what I wanted.  I am going to have give them away to so someone with a 'new eater'.  Missed the mark for me.

This is a rare and wonderful honey that I first sampled in Idylewild, CA. I am NEVER going back to supermarket honey! Star Thistle honey is definitely a must try especially if you use it in teas since the flavor is mild and has no aftertaste!!!!! Awesome flavor!
This bbq sauce is the best I have ever purchased. It comes highly recommended. We made ribs using this sauce and were very impressed. They were better than most restaurants.
This is the best deal for this kind of coffee I have found yet.  Our Local stors including WallMart do not always carry it and my husband will only drink this kind.
Im not buying anything from british delights. Or amazon ever again.their portions are wayyy tooo small.goodbye rip offs :) both companies Do not care about their customers.its kind of sad:(

I did nto like this coffee. its too dark for my taste but my brother loves it and swears by it so for him it was great! for me not so much!
This is the only place to buy Black Silk. The shipping was Xtra fast. This is the best coffee I have had. Amazon is great & highly recommended.

Robust and aromatic from the time you pop the container top to the last drops in the pot.

Great flavor black or mixed with cream and/or sugar.
This is the first time I tasted the silk, try it...you'll like it! really great looking for more.
My Wife is a coffee snab and she loves Dunkin Donuts Coffee and she feels Folgers Black Silk is a very very close second!!!!!!!!!!!
I love this coffee.  I have used Folgers Coffee for many years but this one "Black Silk" is the best yet.

We like the smaller cans because you don't have to worry about all of it going stale. This has a good flavor and the containers are the right size to create storage bins for nuts, bolts, nails, jewelry or whatever fits.

I usually prefer a strong coffee without tasting bitter and this is it. Also, another plus,is the price even though the size is slightly smaller the taste is BIG and delivered to your doorstep. Save your time and gas.

I don't know what kind of coffee these people giving this stuff 5 stars were drinking but this coffee honestly tastes like the beans were roasted to the point of charcoal.  Out of 54 people that I work with, only two like it.  I think somebody is getting paid to give this stuff a good review.

The product arrived in good shape and in a timely fashion.

I did not find this product to have the taste or aroma that its name and roast would warrant. I would not likely order this product again.
Almost hate to let people know about this one. One of the best lemon cakes I've ever had. The fact that it is gluten free is just a bonus!

My dog has trouble digesting too much rawhide, so bully sticks are our bone of choice.  Not only is this more economical than buying them in the store, they were delivered very quickly and my dog's tail couldn't stop wagging when they arrived.  I highly recommmend them.

My dogs love this product; however, it's too smelly and too expensive for me, their owner to purchase. I'll take smelly or expensive, but not BOTH!

My boyfriend uses this stuff religously, in everything!!! Just be cautious it seeps thru in your frig. an burns the heck outta anything you touch!! Max 1 cap full will set ya on fire!!Oh! And the next day stay near the pot.....cuz if you think it's hot goin down it'z even hotter comin out!!!!

Without words! the best of the best. If you like hot sauce try it.
Is really hot, spicy and delicious.

My whole family loves these. They are tasty and convenient and the packaging is recyclable to boot. Perfect for in the kids lunch and to take in the car, as they are not messy like a cup of applesauce and a spoon.

i was disapointed in this salt. since it is a truffle salt i expected to taste at least a hint of Truffle but didnt. if you want a really good Truffle flavored salt order Fusion Black Truffle salt it has a wonderfully strong aroma and great flavor!

This product has been excellent for our dogs for the past four years.
Keeps their energy up and their health is great.
This jerky tastes pretty good.  I bought some from the grocery store prior to purchasing in bulk.  The small packages are convenient and each package has an O2 absorber to prevent molding.
I am always looking for value and I buy in bulk.  This product is a great product with great taste, but the price is too much.  You are better shopping this item at a local grocery store.

I love the 100 calorie packs. They limit my intake so I don't eat a huge bag. Bring them to lunch with me to get a good amount of protein. I like how they are smaller bite size pieces of jerky. It makes it easier to eat and not so gamey. They are delicious too! A little pricey though.
pieces are small, not like a regular piece of jerky.  It had a good flavor though.  After purchasing them here, found them a lot cheaper at local warehouse store.
it's a very nice little snack. Good quality and excellent taste. It's in fact cheaper to buy in amazon than in glossary market. I love it.

When i read that these were "long lasting" i was hoping for a chew that would take my take more than 2 minutes for my 9 month old chocolate lab and 9 year old lab to chew. Not happy with this nylabone purchase!
I can eat this straight from the can.  It needs no other additives to make it delicious!!
My pets love these Bully Springs. Apart from the smell and the price (Should be lower) they are great treats for the dogs.
So I bought these to give them to homeless people on the street. They seem to really appreciate it. Nice thing about M&M's is that they don't melt into goo when you put them in your pocket.

Very affordable product. Works well and is quite accurate! I like that it is very discreet and you have enough for 5 plants. No reason to spend money on expensive moisture meters. This is a cheap and effective product, 5 starts!!!
Taste is very good.  With any gluten free product, the texture is different. i feel the taste more than compensated for that.  Lots of choc chips and nuts.  Would definitely buy again.

This is one of the few products I would buy even if I could have wheat products.  The cookie is not a "soft" type cookie.  I've had good luck with shipping, they are packaged well from the factory, and amazon does a fair job in packaging for shipping.
It's hard to find crunchy items in the gluten free world, this hits the spot and doesn't melt in the summer heat of Vegas. Thank You
Pamelas Chocolate Chip Walnut Cookies were both affordable and delicious.  Everyone that I gave one to simply raved about the taste.

Great cookies. But BEWARE. If you buy them from the warehouse (at reduced rate), the expiration dates may only be 30 days away. Pretty short for six boxes of cookies. I bought cookies through the regular site and the expiration date was 6 months away.
I really love the oatmeal raisin cookies I ordered from Pamela's, but these were really bad - they were dry, tasteless and seemed old.  Going back to Pamela's oatmeal raisin - if I can find them.
These cookies were better than the lemon ones, but still not as tasty as some of the other ones.

Pamela's Chocolate Chip Walnut cookie are wonderful as a final touch to a good day, as a pick-me-up when I need one, or as a bribe that I use to make myself finish an unpleasant task. Sometimes I have one just because it's there and so am I.

P.S. My family loves them, too.
These are the best gluten free cookies I have eaten.  They are wonderful.  I have to hide them from the kids across the street, or they would eat them all.
This product is excellent for folks with food sensitivies...gluten/wheat free...it satisfies...the urge for chocolate...and it tastes yummy...recommneded very highly

Have always loved apple butter not just in PB & J but makes a great glaze for pork and also a touch to apple salad or just plain apple.Have always trusted the Smuckers brand for quality and taste.

Cheap white rice has no flavor and has no substance.  This is good, organic white rice with a nice nutty flavor.  It's worth the price if rice is the bulk of the dish you are preparing.
I love this rice - it never comes out sticky.  I purchased it here because it is a speciality item at our local grocery store and therefor expensive.
We just love this rice at our house. Perfect. It is what Basmati is supposed to be. We will order often.

I found out about this rice about 3 years ago, and i have'nt went back to regular rice since. The flavor is second to none. It might be a little more expensive than regular rice, but it's worth it. You won't be dissapointed.

This is great tasting rice! have been using it for a while now use to purchase it at the supermarket! This is better now we don't run out with the shippment! We are big rice eaters in our house and the kids love it!
It's even going on vacation with us with the rice pot :)!!
Tasty and flavored, perfect to cook or make flour, excellent for general purpose. 100% organic, no gmo! Try it you won't be disappointed

This is by far the best green tea I have ever had and at a price much lower than that of a local grocery store.  I have ordered more.

i don't know why one reviewer said the orange flavor was overpowering.  i find it has an excellent taste and nice orange aroma.  love the tea and have been drinking it several times a day.  i'm buying more.
Smoothest green tea yet....good all day
I could do without the cocoa in the batter because it makes them look burned when they are not, but very tasty.
This Pamela's dough produces an excellent-tasty cookie.  This gluten-free product is kind to my sensitive digestive system.

I recently found out that I was allergic to Wheat, Gluten and Milk and I love baking, so I was very excited when i found Pamela's Chocolate chip cookie mix. My friends didn't even notice the difference! This is a wonderful mix so good and easy. I highly recommend this mix!

This cookie mix isn't just the best gluten-free mix, it's the best chocolate chip cookie I've ever had.  Easy to make, they bake in no time and make a perfect cookie everytime.  I will choose these over a homemade variety without question.
these disappeared so quickly i barely got a taste! easy to make and taste great! Taste very similar to non-gluten free chocolate chip cookies I used to bake

This is a great product for people wanting gluten free cookies.  It goes together easily and the cookies are delicious!!!!!!  Add some walnuts or pecans to the mixture if you like nuts, that tastes great too.
These cookies are every bit as good as their gluten counter part.  Simple to make. Delicious and much cheaper than purchasing the already made, pre packaged gluten free cookies.

These are by far the most delicious gluten-free chocolate chip (chunk) cookies out there. Easy to make as well. Super fast shipment from the seller and packed nicely. Easy transaction. Buying more today.

So good that even those who do not need gluten free will also enjoy them.
That is the ultimate complement for a gluten free product. Well done Pamela's!
I have these on subscription with Amazon. Great deal.

Best cookies ever!  Every time we have an invite to a party I am always asked to bring these cookies.  In fact if I don't I get a lot of grumbling and disappointed comments.  So I never go to a party without them now :-)

This cookie mix is by far the best I have ever used and tasted for Gluten free products. Everyone loves them and I will continue to order them.

Pamela's Products Cookie Mix Chocolate Chunk -- 13.6 ozThese are the best Gluten Free Cookie Mixes. I bring them to church regularly and people really look forward to them! Love them and they are highly requested.

Dear Pamela ...dont know if i should say THANK YOU?? lol or shake my fist at you..these cookies ..easy to make ..Gluten Free...are Way too yummy ..they have to be considered dangerous :)..so we shall leave it as a THANK YOU PAMELA..Highly recomend trying these
I love these cookies. They aren't grainy and are really moiste and tasty! They are easy to make and enjoy. I used an extra amount of chips, but you wouldn't need to. They are good on their own!

After trying a number of other chocolate chip cookie mixes, my husband and I were beginning to wonder if any gluten, wheat and dairy free cookies could taste better than sawdust. Pamela's Chocolate Chunk Cookie Mix was a revelation! Tastes as good as regular chocolate chip cookies,,,,delicious!

Love this wrap.  Better than most for can fit a lot of veggies on it and it's only 100 calories for a full sheet.  Gald to see Amazon has it for bought it at BJs discount store on a temporary membership and notsure if we will get a full one.

my dog loves these, they are so expensive to buy individually. these are great and clean the teeth. i hold onto one end and rotate it around, kinda like a toothbrush so it cleans her teeth!

I give each of my three dogs one a day and they just love them, and I have noticed that their breath is better and their teeth and gums are clean. My vet even noticed how great they looked. I will continue to buy these for a long time.

My dog loves these dental bones. They take him a while to eat and he spends a lot of time chewing them up. Be sure to supervise your dog while he/she eats these, just in case. They seem to be good for him and make him happy!
the Bookdinders (old original) snapper soup was just aweful...threw all remaining cans in trash. No one in the family liked it. Waste of money

I buy these all the time. They taste great. I've tried another organic brand & they tasted stale (but were not out of date).

Good chocolate. You can actually taste the orange citrus flavor. It complements the chocolate and doesn't dominate the flavor.  Great treat.

And these are great. Just like fresh roasted off the grill without having to peel them.

Order lots of them because 3.5 Ounces add up to about 10-12 chestnuts.
These are great for eating out of the package or using in stuffing, etc.
definitely don't taste like the freshly prepared chestnuts. they've got their distinct own taste, but still delicious on their own accords! note that they are made in china.
We first saw this product in Costco but being Costco was 25 miles away we ordered through Amazon, received the chestnuts the following day,  I eat a package a week.  Love the texture and taste.

These have a fresher chestnut taste than others I have tried.  For people who are looking for a healthy snack, chestnuts are probably closer to brown rice than they are nuts.  They are pretty low in fat.  I would recommend these.

I like this product, not bad taste at all plus good value.I like it.
Mailing is fast as well.: )satified with what i got.

These are a great deal, yummy and healthy too! I give them as a snack/ desert for my kids to have at school, serve them with dark chocolate sauce as a desert or eat them while watching TV.  Love my chestnuts!
I bought Gefen and it sucked I shoulda stuck with Hesse! Subscribe and Save I'd rather buy bulk it sucks when I run out! I'm addicted and even lost lbs munching on these!!!!
